text.7: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^T0.0001^ea^ ^a^P5.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ tena bhagavataa  jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thama.m paaraajika.m kattha  pa~n~natta.m, ka.m aarabbha, kismi.m vatthusmi.m? atthi tattha pa~n~natti,  anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~natti? sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~natti?  saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~natti? ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~natti?  pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapanna.m? katamena  uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati? catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipatti?  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m ^a^V0.0002^ea^ katamo aapattikkhandho? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati?  ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo? ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m,  ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkha.m? kaa vipatti? kaa sampatti? kaa  pa.tipatti? kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m?  ke sikkhanti? ke sikkhitasikkhaa? kattha .thita.m? ke  dhaarenti? kassa vacana.m? kenaabhatanti?
text.8: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena pa.thama.m ^a^T0.0002^ea^ paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? sudinna.m kalandaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sudinno kalandaputto puraa.nadutiyikaaya methuna.m ^a^P5.0002^ea^  dhamma.m pa.tisevi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. atthi tattha pa~n~natti,  anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo.  anuppannapa~n~natti ^a^M0.0002^ea^ tasmi.m natthi. sabbatthapa~n~natti,  padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti. saadhaara.napa~n~natti,  asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? saadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti,  ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ubhatopa~n~natti. pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m  katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m, nidaanapariyaapanna.m.  katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? dutiyena uddesena uddesa.m  aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti? siilavipatti.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti?  paaraajikaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.nanti?  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammatiiti?  dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca.  ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? pa~n~natti vinayo,  vibhatti abhivinayo. ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m, ki.m tattha  adhipaatimokkhanti? pa~n~natti paatimokkha.m, vibhatti adhipaatimokkha.m.  kaa vipattiiti? asa.mvaro vipatti. kaa ^a^T0.0003^ea^ sampattiiti? sa.mvaro  sampatti. kaa pa.tipattiiti? na evaruupa.m karissaamiiti yaavajiiva.m  aapaa.nako.tika.m samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. {a0 ni0  10.31} kati atthavase  pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~nattanti? dasa atthavase pa.ticca  bhagavataa pa.thama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya,  dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya,  di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m  pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya,  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. ke sikkhantiiti? sekkhaa ca  puthujjanakalyaa.nakaa ca sikkhanti. ke sikkhitasikkhaati?  arahanto sikkhitasikkhaa ^a^V0.0003^ea^. kattha .thitanti? sikkhaakaamesu .thita.m.  ke dhaarentiiti? yesa.m vattati te dhaarenti. kassa vacananti?  bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. kenaabhatanti?  paramparaabhata.m --

text.42: [03] 4^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena dutiya.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? dhaniya.m kumbhakaaraputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? dhaniyo kumbhakaaraputto ra~n~no daaruuni adinna.m  aadiyi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati ^a^P5.0004^ea^,  na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato;  siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.43: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ tatiya.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule ^a^V0.0005^ea^ bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu a~n~nama~n~na.m jiivitaa  voropesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  channa.m ^a^T0.0006^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.44: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ catuttha.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? vaggumudaatiiriyaa bhikkhuu gihiina.m  a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa  kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.50: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocentassa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~natto? ka.m aarabbha? kismi.m vatthusmi.m? atthi tattha pa~n~natti,  anupa~n~natti ^a^T0.0007^ea^, anuppannapa~n~natti? sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~natti?  saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~natti? ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~natti?  pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapanna.m? katamena  uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati? catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipatti?  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandho? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati?  ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo? ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m,  ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkha.m ^a^V0.0006^ea^? kaa vipatti, kaa sampatti, kaa pa.tipatti?  kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocentassa  sa"nghaadiseso pa~n~natto? ke sikkhanti, ke sikkhitasikkhaa?  kattha .thita.m? ke dhaarenti? kassa vacana.m? kenaabhatanti?
text.51: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocentassa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? asaadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti,  ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ekatopa~n~natti. pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m  katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m nidaanapariyaapanna.m.  katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? tatiye ^a^M0.0006^ea^ uddesena  uddesa.m aagacchati ^a^P5.0005^ea^. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa  vipattiiti? siilavipatti. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo  aapattikkhandhoti? sa"nghaadiseso aapattikkhandho. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.nanti? aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m  samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammatiiti? dviihi samathehi sammati --  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko  tattha abhivinayoti? pa~n~natti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. ki.m  tattha paatimokkha.m, ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkhanti? pa~n~natti  paatimokkha.m, vibhatti adhipaatimokkha.m. kaa vipattiiti? asa.mvaro  vipatti. kaa sampattiiti? sa.mvaro sampatti. kaa pa.tipattiiti? na  evaruupa.m karissaamiiti yaavajiiva.m aapaa.nako.tika.m samaadaaya sikkhati  sikkhaapadesu. {a0 ni0  10.31} kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa upakkamitvaa asuci.m  mocentassa sa"nghaadiseso pa~n~nattoti? dasa atthavase pa.ticca  bhagavataa upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocentassa sa"nghaadiseso pa~n~natto --  sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya,  pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya,  samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m ^a^T0.0009^ea^ pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m  bhiyyobhaavaaya, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. ke sikkhantiiti?  sekkhaa ca puthujjanakalyaa.nakaa ca sikkhanti. ke  sikkhitasikkhaati? arahanto sikkhitasikkhaa. kattha .thitanti?  sikkhaakaamesu .thita.m. ke dhaarentiiti? yesa.m vattati ^a^V0.0007^ea^, te dhaarenti.  kassa vacananti? bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa.  kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m --

text.84: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena maatugaamena saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjantassa  sa.m"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha ^a^M0.0008^ea^. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa udaayii maatugaamena ^a^T0.0010^ea^ saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m  samaapajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.85: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasantassa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa ^a^V0.0009^ea^ udaayii maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato;  siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato  ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.86: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya  va.n.na.m bhaasantassa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa ^a^T0.0011^ea^ udaayii maatugaamassa santike  attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m abhaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.92: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ sa"nghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  raajagahe pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? devadatta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? devadatto samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkami, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.93: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ bhedaanuvattakaana.m ^a^M0.0010^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m  yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantaana.m sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti? raajagahe pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu devadattassa  sa"nghabhedaaya parakkamantassa ^a^T0.0013^ea^ anuvattakaa ahesu.m vaggavaadakaa, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.94: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ dubbacassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaa  ^a^P5.0007^ea^ na pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  kosambiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m channa.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa channo bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m  vuccamaano attaana.m avacaniiya.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.95: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ kuladuusakassa ^a^V0.0011^ea^ bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu  sa"nghena pabbaajaniiyakammakataa bhikkhuu chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa  mohagaamitaa bhayagaamitaa paapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.99: [22] sa~ncaritta.m ku.tii ceva, vihaaro ca amuulaka.m..
text.103: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^M0.0011^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa  arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thamo ani.myato kattha pa~n~natto? ka.m aarabbha?  kismi.m vatthusmi.m? atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti,  anuppannapa~n~natti, sabbatthapa~n~natti padesapa~n~natti, saadhaara.napa~n~natti  asaadhaara.napa~n~natti, ekatopa~n~natti ubhatopa~n~natti, pa~ncanna.m  paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapanna.m, katamena uddesena uddesa.m  aagacchati, catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipatti, sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  katamo aapattikkhandho, channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati, catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m, sattanna.m samathaana.m  katihi samathehi sammati, ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo,  ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m, ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkha.m, kaa vipatti, kaa  sampatti, kaa pa.tipatti, kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thamo  aniyato pa~n~natto, ke ^a^T0.0015^ea^ sikkhanti, ke sikkhitasikkhaa, kattha .thita.m,  ke dhaarenti, kassa vacana.m kenaabhatanti.
text.104: [03] 22^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena pa.thamo aniyato kattha ^a^V0.0012^ea^ pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa udaayii maatugaamena saddhi.m eko ekaaya raho  pa.ticchanne aasane ala"nkammaniye nisajja.m kappesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa  pa~n~natti. anupa~n~natti anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi.  sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti.  saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? asaadhaara.napa~n~natti.  ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ekatopa~n~natti. pa~ncanna.m  paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m  nidaanapariyaapanna.m. katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? catutthena  uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti?  siyaa siilavipatti siyaa aacaaravipatti. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  katamo aapattikkhandhoti? siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandho siyaa  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandho siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandho. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? eke ^a^M0.0012^ea^  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca ^a^T0.0016^ea^ cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.nanti?  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammatiiti?  tiihi samathehi sammati -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.  ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? pa~n~natti vinayo,  vibhatti abhivinayo. ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m, ki.m tattha  adhipaatimokkhanti? pa~n~natti paatimokkha.m, vibhatti adhipaatimokkha.m.  kaa vipattiiti? asa.mvaro vipatti. kaa sampattiiti? sa.mvaro  sampatti. kaa pa.tipattiiti? na evaruupa.m karissaamiiti yaavajiiva.m  aapaa.nako.tika.m samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. {a0 ni0  10.31} kati atthavase  pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thamo aniyato pa~n~nattoti ^a^P5.0008^ea^? dasa  atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thamo aniyato pa~n~natto -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya,  sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m  phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m  aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya,  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. ke sikkhantiiti? sekkhaa ca  puthujjanakalyaa.nakaa ca sikkhanti. ke sikkhitasikkhaati?  arahanto sikkhitasikkhaa. kattha .thitanti? sikkhaakaamesu .thita.m.  ke dhaarentiiti? yesa.m vattati te dhaarenti. kassa vacananti?  bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. kenaabhatanti?  paramparaabhata.m --

text.144: [03] 24^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena atirekaciivara.m dasaaha.m atikkaamentassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu atirekaciivara.m dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti,  ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi ^a^M0.0015^ea^  samu.t.thaati ^a^T0.0019^ea^ -- siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na  cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.145: [03] 25^b^.^eb^ ekaratta.m ticiivarena vippavasantassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu  bhikkhuuna.m hatthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena janapadacaarika.m  pakkami.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato  ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.146: [03] 26^b^.^eb^ akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa maasa.m atikkaamentassa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuu akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa maasa.m atikkaamesu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti ^a^V0.0016^ea^, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.147: [03] 27^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m  dhovaapentassa ^a^P5.0009^ea^ nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa ^a^T0.0020^ea^ udaayii a~n~naatikaaya  bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.148: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa hatthato ciivara.m  pa.tigga.nhantassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa udaayii a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa hatthato  ciivara.m pa.tiggahesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.149: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ a~n~naataka.m ^a^M0.0016^ea^ gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m  vaa ciivara.m vi~n~naapentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto  a~n~naataka.m se.t.thiputta.m ciivara.m vi~n~naapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.150: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ a~n~naataka.m gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m vaa tatuttari  ciivara.m vi~n~naapentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu na matta.m jaanitvaa bahu.m  ciivara.m ^a^T0.0021^ea^ vi~n~naapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.153: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ atirekatikkhattu.m codanaaya atirekachakkhattu.m  .thaanena ciivara.m abhinipphaadentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m ^a^T0.0022^ea^ ^a^P5.0010^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto upaasakena -- ``ajja.nho, bhante,  aagamehii''ti ^a^M0.0017^ea^ vuccamaano naagamesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.156: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ kosiyamissaka.m santhata.m kaaraapentassa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? aa.laviya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kosiyakaarake upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu ``bahuu,  aavuso, kosakaarake pacatha. amhaakampi dassatha. mayampi icchaama  kosiyamissaka.m santhata.m kaatu''nti, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.159: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ anuvassa.m santhata.m kaaraapentassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu  anuvassa.m santhata.m kaaraapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m ^a^M0.0018^ea^. ekaa  pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.160: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ anaadiyitvaa puraa.nasanthatassa saamantaa  sugatavidatthi.m nava.m nisiidanasanthata.m kaaraapentassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha ^a^T0.0024^ea^. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu  santhataani ujjhitvaa aara~n~nika"nga.m pi.n.dapaatika"nga.m pa.msukuulika"nga.m  samaadiyi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.161: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ e.lakalomaani pa.tiggahetvaa tiyojana.m  atikkaamentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu e.lakalomaani pa.tiggahetvaa  tiyojana.m atikkaamesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi ^a^P5.0011^ea^ samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.162: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa e.lakalomaani  dhovaapentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu a~n~naatikaahi bhikkhuniihi  e.lakalomaani dhovaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.163: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ ruupiya.m pa.tigga.nhantassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m ^a^V0.0019^ea^. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m  upananda.m ^a^T0.0025^ea^ sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  upanando sakyaputto ruupiya.m pa.tiggahesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.164: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ naanappakaaraka.m ruupiyasa.mvohaara.m samaapajjantassa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0019^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu naanappakaaraka.m ruupiyasa.mvohaara.m  samaapajji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.165: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ naanappakaaraka.m kayavikkaya.m samaapajjantassa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto paribbaajakena saddhi.m  kayavikkaya.m samaapajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.168: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ atirekapatta.m ^a^T0.0026^ea^ dasaaha.m atikkaamentassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu atirekapatta.m dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato  ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.169: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ uunapa~ncabandhanena pattena a~n~na.m nava.m patta.m  cetaapentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu appamattakenapi bhinnena  appamattakenapi kha.n.dena vilikhitamattenapi bahuu patte vi~n~naapesu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.170: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ bhesajjaani ^a^V0.0020^ea^ pa.tiggahetvaa sattaaha.m atikkaamentassa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu ^a^P5.0012^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhesajjaani pa.tiggahetvaa sattaaha.m  atikkaamesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.171: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ atirekamaase ^a^T0.0027^ea^ ^a^M0.0020^ea^ sese gimhaane  vassikasaa.tikaciivara.m pariyesantassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu  atirekamaase sese gimhaane vassikasaa.tikaciivara.m pariyesi.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.172: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ bhikkhussa saama.m ciivara.m datvaa kupitena  anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m  sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando  sakyaputto bhikkhussa saama.m ciivara.m datvaa kupito anattamano  acchindi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.173: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ saama.m sutta.m vi~n~naapetvaa tantavaayehi ciivara.m  vaayaapentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu saama.m sutta.m vi~n~naapetvaa  tantavaayehi ciivara.m vaayaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.174: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ pubbe appavaaritassa a~n~naatakassa gahapatikassa  tantavaaye upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T0.0028^ea^ ciivare vikappa.m aapajjantassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavaarito a~n~naatakassa  gahapatikassa tantavaaye upasa"nkamitvaa ciivare vikappa.m aapajji, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.175: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ accekaciivara.m ^a^V0.0021^ea^ pa.tiggahetvaa ciivarakaalasamaya.m  atikkaamentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu accekaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa  ciivarakaalasamaya.m atikkaamesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.176: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ ti.n.na.m ^a^M0.0021^ea^ ciivaraana.m a~n~natara.m ciivara.m  antaraghare nikkhipitvaa atirekachaaratta.m vippavasantassa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu  ti.n.na.m ciivaraana.m a~n~natara.m ciivara.m antaraghare nikkhipitvaa  atirekachaaratta.m vippavasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa ^a^P5.0013^ea^  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.177: [03] 53^b^.^eb^ jaana.m ^a^T0.0029^ea^ sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m attano  pari.naamentassa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m  attano pari.naamesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.182: [22] a~n~naata.m ta~nca {a~n~naataka~nca (ka0)} uddissa, ubhinna.m duutakena ca..
text.184: [22] dve ca lomaani ugga.nhe, ubho naanappakaarakaa..
text.185: [21] dve ca pattaani bhesajja.m, vassikaa daanapa~ncama.m.
text.189: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^V0.0022^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena sampajaanamusaavaade paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati ^a^M0.0022^ea^? hatthaka.m  sakyaputta.m aarabbha ^a^T0.0030^ea^. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa hatthako  sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhi.m sallapanto avajaanitvaa pa.tijaani,  pa.tijaanitvaa avajaani, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.190: [03] 55^b^.^eb^ omasavaade paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pesalehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m  bha.n.dantaa {bha.n.dentaa (ka0)} pesale bhikkhuu omasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.191: [03] 56^b^.^eb^ bhikkhupesu~n~ne paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m  kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m pesu~n~na.m upasa.mhari.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.192: [03] 57^b^.^eb^ anupasampanna.m padaso dhamma.m vaacentassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu ^a^T0.0031^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu upaasake padaso dhamma.m vaacesu.m ^a^P5.0014^ea^, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa vaacato samu.t.thaati, na kaayato na cittato; siyaa  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato...pe0....
text.193: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ anupasampannena uttaridirattatiratta.m sahaseyya.m  kappentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? aa.laviya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuu anupasampannena sahaseyya.m kappesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti ^a^V0.0023^ea^, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m ^a^M0.0023^ea^  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.194: [03] 59^b^.^eb^ maatugaamena sahaseyya.m kappentassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  anuruddho maatugaamena sahaseyya.m kappesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.195: [03] 60^b^.^eb^ maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m  desentassa paacittiya.m ^a^T0.0032^ea^ kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa udaayii maatugaamassa dhamma.m desesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati padasodhamme...pe0....
text.196: [03] 61^b^.^eb^ anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhamma.m bhuuta.m  aarocentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  vaggumudaatiiriyaa bhikkhuu gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa  uttarimanussadhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa  kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa vaacato samu.t.thaati,  na kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na  cittato...pe0....
text.197: [03] 62^b^.^eb^ bhikkhussa du.t.thullaapatti.m anupasampannassa  aarocentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhussa du.t.thullaapatti.m anupasampannassa aarocesu.m,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.198: [03] 63^b^.^eb^ pathavi.m ^a^T0.0033^ea^ kha.nantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  aa.laviya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aa.lavake bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aa.lavakaa ^a^M0.0024^ea^ bhikkhuu pathavi.m  kha.ni.msu ^a^V0.0024^ea^, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.201: [03] 64^b^.^eb^ bhuutagaamapaatabyataa ^a^P5.0015^ea^ paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? aa.laviya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aa.lavake  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aa.lavakaa bhikkhuu rukkha.m  chindi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.202: [03] 65^b^.^eb^ a~n~navaadake vihesake paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? kosambiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m  channa.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa channo sa"nghamajjhe  aapattiyaa anuyu~njiyamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticari, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^T0.0034^ea^ tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.203: [03] 66^b^.^eb^ ujjhaapanake khiyyanake paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? mettiyabhuumajake  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu  aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m bhikkhuu ujjhaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.204: [03] 67^b^.^eb^ sa"nghika.m ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa bhisi.m vaa koccha.m  vaa ajjhokaase santharitvaa anuddharitvaa anaapucchaa pakkamantassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu  sa"nghika.m senaasana.m ajjhokaase santharitvaa anuddharitvaa anaapucchaa  pakkami.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.205: [03] 68^b^.^eb^ sa"nghike ^a^M0.0025^ea^ vihaare seyya.m  santharitvaa anuddharitvaa anaapucchaa pakkamantassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sattarasavaggiye  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu  sa"nghike vihaare seyya.m santharitvaa anuddharitvaa ^a^V0.0025^ea^ anaapucchaa pakkami.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti ^a^T0.0035^ea^. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.206: [03] 69^b^.^eb^ sa"nghike vihaare jaana.m pubbupagata.m bhikkhu.m  anupakhajja seyya.m kappentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu there bhikkhuu anupakhajja  seyya.m kappesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.207: [03] 70^b^.^eb^ bhikkhu.m kupitena anattamanena sa"nghikaa vihaaraa  nikka.d.dhantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu kupitaa anattamanaa bhikkhuu sa"nghikaa vihaaraa  nikka.d.dhi.msu ^a^P5.0016^ea^, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.208: [03] 71^b^.^eb^ sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa  aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa abhinisiidantassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu  sa"nghike vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m sahasaa  abhinisiidi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa ^a^T0.0036^ea^ pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.209: [03] 72^b^.^eb^ dvattipariyaaye adhi.t.thahitvaa tatuttari  adhi.t.thahantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? kosambiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m channa.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa channo katapariyosita.m vihaara.m punappuna.m chaadaapesi, punappuna.m  limpaapesi, atibhaariko vihaaro paripati ^a^M0.0026^ea^, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.210: [03] 73^b^.^eb^ jaana.m sappaa.naka.m udaka.m ti.na.m vaa mattika.m vaa  si~ncantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? aa.laviya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aa.lavake bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti ^a^V0.0026^ea^?  aa.lavakaa bhikkhuu jaana.m sappaa.naka.m udaka.m ti.nampi mattikampi  si~nci.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.213: [03] 74^b^.^eb^ asammatena ^a^T0.0037^ea^ bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu asammataa bhikkhuniyo ovadi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. atthi  tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti,  ekaa anupa~n~natti. anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa vaacato  samu.t.thaati, na kaayato na cittato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na kaayato...pe0....
text.214: [03] 75^b^.^eb^ attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m cuu.lapanthaka.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  cuu.lapanthako attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  padasodhamme...pe0....
text.215: [03] 76^b^.^eb^ bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo  ovadantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu ^a^T0.0038^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhunupassaya.m ^a^P5.0017^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa  bhikkhuniyo ovadi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  kathinake...pe0....
text.216: [03] 77^b^.^eb^ ``aamisahetu ^a^M0.0027^ea^ bhikkhuu  bhikkhuniyo ovadantii''ti bha.nantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ``aamisahetu bhikkhuu  bhikkhuniyo ovadantii''ti bha.ni.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.217: [03] 78^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya ^a^V0.0027^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m dentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu  a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m adaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.218: [03] 79^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m sibbentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  udaayii a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m sibbesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati ^a^T0.0039^ea^ ...pe0....
text.219: [03] 80^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m  pa.tipajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m  pa.tipajji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.220: [03] 81^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya eka.m naava.m  abhiruhantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya eka.m naava.m  abhiruhi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.221: [03] 82^b^.^eb^ jaana.m ^a^M0.0028^ea^ bhikkhuniparipaacita.m  pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? devadatta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  devadatto jaana.m bhikkhuniparipaacita.m ^a^T0.0040^ea^ pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~nji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato...pe0....
text.222: [03] 83^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuniyaa ^a^P5.0018^ea^ ^a^V0.0028^ea^ saddhi.m eko  ekaaya raho nisajja.m kappentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa udaayii bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m eko  ekaaya raho nisajja.m kappesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.225: [03] 84^b^.^eb^ tatuttari aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njantassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu ^a^T0.0041^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu anuvasitvaa anuvasitvaa aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.226: [03] 85^b^.^eb^ ga.nabhojane paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? devadatta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? devadatto sapariso kulesu vi~n~naapetvaa vi~n~naapetvaa  bhu~nji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, satta anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.227: [03] 86^b^.^eb^ paramparabhojane paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0029^ea^ a~n~natra  nimantitaa a~n~natra bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti,  catasso anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.228: [03] 87^b^.^eb^ dvattipattapuure puuve pa.tiggahetvaa tatuttari  pa.tigga.nhantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuu na matta.m jaanitvaa pa.tiggahesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa ^a^T0.0042^ea^ pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.229: [03] 88^b^.^eb^ bhuttaavinaa ^a^V0.0029^ea^ pavaaritena anatiritta.m khaadaniiya.m vaa  bhojaniiya.m vaa bhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhuttaavii pavaaritaa a~n~natra bhu~nji.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.230: [03] 89^b^.^eb^ bhikkhu.m bhuttaavi.m pavaarita.m anatirittena  khaadaniiyena vaa bhojaniiyena vaa abhiha.t.thu.m pavaarentassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhikkhu.m  bhuttaavi.m pavaarita.m anatirittena bhojaniiyena abhiha.t.thu.m pavaaresi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.231: [03] 90^b^.^eb^ vikaale ^a^P5.0019^ea^ khaadaniiya.m vaa  bhojaniiya.m vaa bhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sattarasavaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu vikaale bhojana.m  bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.232: [03] 91^b^.^eb^ sannidhikaaraka.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa  bhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m bela.t.thasiisa.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa bela.t.thasiiso sannidhikaaraka.m bhojana.m ^a^M0.0030^ea^ bhu~nji,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.233: [03] 92^b^.^eb^ pa.niitabhojanaani attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa  bhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu pa.niitabhojanaani attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa  bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.234: [03] 93^b^.^eb^ adinna.m mukhadvaara.m aahaara.m aaharantassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu ^a^V0.0030^ea^   adinna.m mukhadvaara.m ^a^T0.0044^ea^ aahaara.m aahari, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.237: [03] 94^b^.^eb^ acelakassa vaa paribbaajakassa vaa  paribbaajikaaya vaa sahatthaa khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa dentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m aananda.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  aanando a~n~natarissaa paribbaajikaaya eka.m ma~n~namaano dve puuve  adaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.238: [03] 95^b^.^eb^ bhikkhu.m ``ehaavuso, gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa  pi.n.daaya pavisissaamaa''ti tassa daapetvaa vaa adaapetvaa vaa  uyyojentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti ^a^T0.0045^ea^? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto bhikkhu.m ``ehaavuso,  gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisissaamaa''ti, tassa adaapetvaa uyyojesi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.239: [03] 96^b^.^eb^ sabhojane ^a^M0.0031^ea^ kule anupakhajja  nisajja.m kappentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule  anupakhajja nisajja.m kappesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti  ^a^P5.0020^ea^. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.240: [03] 97^b^.^eb^ maatugaamena saddhi.m raho pa.ticchanne aasane  nisajja.m kappentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto maatugaamena saddhi.m raho  pa.ticchanne aasane nisajja.m kappesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.241: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ maatugaamena ^a^V0.0031^ea^ saddhi.m eko ekaaya raho nisajja.m  kappentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto maatugaamena saddhi.m eko  ekaaya raho nisajja.m kappesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.242: [03] 99^b^.^eb^ nimantitena sabhattena santa.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa  purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m  upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samaano purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m  kulesu caaritta.m aapajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, catasso  anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  kathinake...pe0....
text.243: [03] 100^b^.^eb^ tatuttari bhesajja.m vi~n~naapentassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu mahaanaamena  sakkena ``ajja.nho, bhante, aagamethaa''ti ^a^M0.0032^ea^ vuccamaanaa  naagamesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.244: [03] 101^b^.^eb^ uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya gacchantassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti ^a^T0.0047^ea^? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu uyyutta.m sena.m dassanaaya agama.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.245: [03] 102^b^.^eb^ atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasantassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.246: [03] 103^b^.^eb^ uyyodhika.m gacchantassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^P5.0021^ea^. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu uyyodhika.m ^a^V0.0032^ea^ agama.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.249: [03] 104^b^.^eb^ suraamerayapaane ^a^T0.0048^ea^ paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  kosambiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m saagata.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa saagato majja.m pivi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa  kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.250: [03] 105^b^.^eb^ a"ngulipatodake paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa ^a^M0.0033^ea^ bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m  a"ngulipatodakena haasesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.251: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ udake hasadhamme {hassadhamme (sii0 syaa0)} paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sattarasavaggiye bhikkhuu  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sattarasavaggiyaa bhikkhuu  aciravatiyaa nadiyaa udake kii.li.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  kaayato ca cittato ^a^T0.0049^ea^ ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.252: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ anaadariye paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  kosambiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m channa.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa channo anaadariya.m akaasi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.253: [03] 108^b^.^eb^ bhikkhu.m bhi.msaapentassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu  bhikkhu.m bhi.msaapesu.m ^a^V0.0033^ea^, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.254: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbentassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? bhaggesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu joti.m  samaadahitvaa visibbesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, dve  anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.255: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayantassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu raajaanampi  passitvaa na ^a^T0.0050^ea^ matta.m jaanitvaa nahaayi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, cha anupa~n~nattiyo. sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti?  padesapa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.256: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ anaadiyitvaa ^a^P5.0022^ea^ ^a^M0.0034^ea^  ti.n.na.m dubba.n.nakara.naana.m a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na.m nava.m ciivara.m  paribhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuu attano ciivara.m na sa~njaani.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.257: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa sikkhamaanaaya  vaa saama.nerassa vaa saama.neriyaa vaa saama.m ciivara.m vikappetvaa  appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~njantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa saama.m  ciivara.m vikappetvaa appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~nji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  kathinake...pe0....
text.258: [03] 113^b^.^eb^ bhikkhussa patta.m vaa ciivara.m vaa nisiidana.m vaa  suucighara.m vaa kaayabandhana.m vaa apanidhentassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m ^a^T0.0051^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu  bhikkhuuna.m pattampi ciivarampi apanidhesu.m ^a^V0.0034^ea^, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.261: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropentassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  udaayii sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.262: [03] 115^b^.^eb^ jaana.m sappaa.naka.m udaka.m paribhu~njantassa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti ^a^M0.0035^ea^?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m sappaa.naka.m ^a^T0.0052^ea^ udaka.m paribhu~nji.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.263: [03] 116^b^.^eb^ jaana.m yathaadhamma.m nihataadhikara.na.m puna kammaaya  ukko.tentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m yathaadhamma.m nihataadhikara.na.m puna kammaaya  ukko.tesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.264: [03] 117^b^.^eb^ bhikkhussa jaana.m du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m pa.ticchaadentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m ^a^P5.0023^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhikkhussa jaana.m du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m pa.ticchaadesi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.266: [03] 119^b^.^eb^ jaana.m ^a^T0.0053^ea^ theyyasatthena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya  ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu jaana.m theyyasatthena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya  ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.267: [03] 120^b^.^eb^ maatugaamena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m  pa.tipajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m ^a^M0.0036^ea^  vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu maatugaamena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya  ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.268: [03] 121^b^.^eb^ paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya  na pa.tinissajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo paapikaaya  di.t.thiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati. kaayato ca vaacato ^a^T0.0054^ea^ ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.280: [03] 131^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m  vivaadaapannaana.m ^a^P5.0025^ea^ upassuti.m {upassuti (?)} ti.t.thantassa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu  bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m upassuti.m  ti.t.thahi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.281: [03] 132^b^.^eb^ dhammikaana.m kammaana.m chanda.m datvaa pacchaa  khiiyanadhamma.m {khiyyadhamma.m (ka0)} aapajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu dhammikaana.m kammaana.m chanda.m datvaa  pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.282: [03] 133^b^.^eb^ sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya vattamaanaaya chanda.m  adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^T0.0058^ea^. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha ^a^V0.0038^ea^.  kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya  vattamaanaaya chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati  -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.283: [03] 134^b^.^eb^ samagge ^a^M0.0039^ea^ sa"nghena ciivara.m datvaa  pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu samaggena sa"nghena ciivara.m  datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.284: [03] 135^b^.^eb^ jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa  pari.naamentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa  pari.naamesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.287: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ pubbe ^a^T0.0059^ea^ appa.tisa.mviditena ra~n~no antepura.m  pavisantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m aananda.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa aanando pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito ra~n~no antepura.m paavisi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.288: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ ratana.m ugga.nhantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^P5.0026^ea^. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro bhikkhu ratana.m  uggahesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.289: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ santa.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa vikaale gaama.m  pavisantassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti ^a^V0.0039^ea^? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vikaale gaama.m pavisi.msu, tasmi.m ^a^T0.0060^ea^ vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, tisso anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.290: [03] 139^b^.^eb^ a.t.thimaya.m ^a^M0.0040^ea^ vaa dantamaya.m vaa  visaa.namaya.m vaa suucighara.m kaaraapentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  sakkesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu na matta.m jaanitvaa bahuu  suucighare vi~n~naapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.291: [03] 140^b^.^eb^ pamaa.naatikkanta.m ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa kaaraapentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto ucce ma~nce sayi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.292: [03] 141^b^.^eb^ ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa tuulonaddha.m kaaraapentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa tuulonaddha.m kaaraapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.293: [03] 142^b^.^eb^ pamaa.naatikkanta.m ^a^T0.0061^ea^ nisiidana.m kaaraapentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu appamaa.nikaani nisiidanaani dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.294: [03] 143^b^.^eb^ pamaa.naatikkanta.m ka.n.duppa.ticchaadi.m kaaraapentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuu appamaa.nikaayo ka.n.duppa.ticchaadiyo dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.295: [03] 144^b^.^eb^ pamaa.naatikkanta.m ^a^V0.0040^ea^ vassikasaa.tika.m kaaraapentassa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha ^a^M0.0041^ea^. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu appamaa.nikaayo vassikasaa.tikaayo dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.296: [03] 145^b^.^eb^ sugataciivarappamaa.na.m ^a^P5.0027^ea^ ciivara.m  kaaraapentassa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m nanda.m ^a^T0.0062^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa nando sugataciivarappamaa.na.m ciivara.m dhaaresi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.302: [22] a~n~natra vi~n~nunaa bhuutaa {desanaarocanaa ceva (sii0 syaa0)}, du.t.thullaapatti kha.nanaa..
text.303: [21] bhuuta.m a~n~naaya ujjhaayi {bhuuta~n~navaadaujjhaayi (sii0)}, ma~nco seyyo ca vuccati.
text.306: [22] dade sibbe vidhaanena, naavaa bhu~njeyya ekato..
text.307: [21] pi.n.da.m ga.na.m para.m puuva.m, pavaarito pavaarita.m.
text.308: [22] vikaala.m sannidhi khiira.m, dantaponena te dasa..
text.311: [21] suraa ^a^V0.0041^ea^ a"nguli haaso ca, anaadariya~nca bhi.msana.m.
text.312: [22] joti nahaana dubba.n.na.m, saama.m apanidhena ca..
text.318: [27] ra~n~na~nca ratana.m santa.m, suuci ma~nco ca tuulikaa.
text.321: [21] musaa bhuutaa ca ovaado, bhojanaacelakena ca.
text.322: [22] suraa sappaa.nakaa dhammo, raajavaggena te navaati..
text.324: [03] 146^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaaya hatthato  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njantassa  paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  a~n~natara.m ^a^T0.0063^ea^ bhikkhu.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataro  bhikkhu a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaaya hatthato aamisa.m  pa.tiggahesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi ^a^P5.0028^ea^ samu.t.thaati --  siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.325: [03] 147^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuniyaa vosaasantiyaa na nivaaretvaa  bhu~njantassa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo vosaasantiyo na nivaaresu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa ^a^V0.0042^ea^ pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato;  siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.326: [03] 148^b^.^eb^ sekkhasammatesu ^a^M0.0043^ea^ kulesu  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njantassa  paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuu na matta.m jaanitvaa pa.tiggahesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na  cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ^a^T0.0064^ea^ ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.327: [03] 149^b^.^eb^ aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu pubbe appa.tisa.mvidita.m  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ajjhaaraame sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa  bhu~njantassa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti.  sambahulaa bhikkhuu aaraame core pa.tivasante naarocesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na  cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.334: [03] 150^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^V0.0043^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena anaadariya.m pa.ticca purato vaa pacchato vaa olambentena  nivaasentassa dukka.ta.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu puratopi pacchatopi olambentaa nivaasesu.m, tasmi.m ^a^T0.0065^ea^  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^M0.0044^ea^  ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato...pe0....
