text.433: [22] hattho ^a^P5.0033^ea^ patto ca o.t.tho ca, saamisa.m  sitthakena ca..
text.442: [22] kaba.laa surusuru ca, paadukena ca sattamaati..
text.446: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0056^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanto kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanto tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  akkhaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti paaraajikassa;  yebhuyyena khaayite ^a^T0.0081^ea^ sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti  thullaccayassa; va.t.takate {viva.takate (syaa0)} mukhe acchupanta.m a"ngajaata.m paveseti, aapatti  dukka.tassa -- methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanto imaa tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.447: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ adinna.m aadiyanto kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  adinna.m aadiyanto tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. pa~ncamaasaka.m vaa  atirekapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati,  aapatti paaraajikassa; atirekamaasaka.m vaa uunapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m  adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti thullaccayassa; maasaka.m vaa  uunamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti  dukka.tassa -- adinna.m aadiyanto imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.448: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ sa~ncicca ^a^M0.0056^ea^ manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa  voropento kati aapattiyo aapajjati? sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m  jiivitaa voropento tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. manussa.m odissa  opaata.m kha.nati ``papatitvaa marissatii''ti, aapatti dukka.tassa;  papatite dukkhaa vedanaa uppajjati, aapatti thullaccayassa; marati,  aapatti paaraajikassa -- sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa voropento  imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.449: [03] 160^b^.^eb^ asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanto kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? asanta.m ^a^V0.0057^ea^ abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanto  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m  uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati, aapatti paaraajikassa; ``yo te vihaare ^a^T0.0082^ea^  vasati, so bhikkhu arahaa''ti bha.nati, pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti  thullaccayassa; na pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti dukka.tassa -- asanta.m abhuuta.m  uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanto imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.452: [03] 161^b^.^eb^ upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocento tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati. ceteti upakkamati ^a^P5.0034^ea^ muccati, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa; ceteti upakkamati na muccati, aapatti thullaccayassa;  payoge dukka.ta.m.
text.453: [03] maatugaamena saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjanto tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati. kaayena kaaya.m aamasati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa;  kaayena kaayapa.tibaddha.m aamasati, aapatti thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddhena  kaayapa.tibaddha.m aamasati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.454: [03] maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasento tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati. vaccamagga.m passaavamagga.m aadissa va.n.nampi bha.nati,  ava.n.nampi bha.nati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; vaccamagga.m passaavamagga.m  .thapetvaa adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m aadissa va.n.nampi bha.nati  ava.n.nampi bha.nati, aapatti thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddha.m aadissa  va.n.nampi bha.nati ava.n.nampi bha.nati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.455: [03] attakaamapaaricariyaa ^a^M0.0057^ea^ va.n.na.m bhaasanto tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati ^a^T0.0083^ea^. maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya  va.n.na.m bhaasati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; pa.n.dakassa santike  attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati, aapatti thullaccayassa;  tiracchaanagatassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati,  aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.456: [03] sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjanto tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  pa.tigga.nhaati viima.msati paccaaharati ^a^V0.0058^ea^, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa;  pa.tigga.nhaati viima.msati na paccaaharati, aapatti thullaccayassa;  pa.tigga.nhaati na viima.msati na paccaaharati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.457: [03] sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kaaraapento tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m anaagate, aapatti thullaccayassa;  tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.458: [03] mahallaka.m vihaara.m kaaraapento tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m anaagate, aapatti thullaccayassa;  tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.459: [03] bhikkhu.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msento tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati. anokaasa.m kaaraapetvaa caavanaadhippaayo vadeti,  aapatti sa"nghaadisesena dukka.tassa; okaasa.m kaaraapetvaa akkosaadhippaayo  vadeti, aapatti omasavaadassa.
text.460: [03] bhikkhu.m a~n~nabhaagiyassa adhikara.nassa ki~nci desa.m lesamatta.m  upaadaaya paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msento tisso aapattiyo aapajjati  ^a^T0.0084^ea^. anokaasa.m kaaraapetvaa caavanaadhippaayo vadeti, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesena dukka.tassa; okaasa.m kaaraapetvaa akkosaadhippaayo vadeti,  aapatti omasavaadassa.
text.461: [03] sa"nghabhedako bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanto tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi  kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.462: [03] bhedakaanuvattakaa ^a^P5.0035^ea^ bhikkhuu yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya {samanubhaasiyamaanaa (syaa0)} na pa.tinissajjantaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjanti.  ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi ^a^M0.0058^ea^ thullaccayaa;  kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.463: [03] dubbaco bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya {samanubhaasiyamaano (syaa0)} na pa.tinissajjanto  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati ^a^V0.0059^ea^. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi  thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.464: [03] kuladuusako bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanto tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi  kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.468: [03] 162^b^.^eb^ atirekaciivara.m ^a^T0.0085^ea^ dasaaha.m atikkaamento eka.m  aapatti.m aapajjati. nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.469: [03] ekaratta.m ticiivarena vippavasanto eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.470: [03] akaalaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa maasa.m atikkaamento eka.m aapatti.m  aapajjati. nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.471: [03] a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa puraa.naciivara.m dhovaapento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. dhovaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; dhovaapite  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.472: [03] a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa hatthato ciivara.m pa.tigga.nhanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. ga.nhaati, payoge dukka.ta.m; gahite nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m.
text.473: [03] a~n~naataka.m ^a^V0.0060^ea^ gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m vaa ciivara.m vi~n~naapento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. vi~n~naapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; vi~n~naapite  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.474: [03] a~n~naataka.m ^a^M0.0059^ea^ gahapati.m vaa gahapataani.m vaa tatuttari  ciivara.m vi~n~naapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. vi~n~naapeti, payoge  dukka.ta.m; vi~n~naapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.475: [03] pubbe appavaarito a~n~naataka.m gahapatika.m upasa"nkamitvaa ciivare  vikappa.m aapajjanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. vikappa.m aapajjati ^a^T0.0086^ea^,  payoge dukka.ta.m; vikappa.m aapanne nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.476: [03] pubbe appavaarito a~n~naatake gahapatike upasa"nkamitvaa ciivare  vikappa.m aapajjanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. vikappa.m aapajjati,  payoge dukka.ta.m; vikappa.m aapanne nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.477: [03] atirekatikkhattu.m codanaaya atirekachakkhattu.m .thaanena ciivara.m  abhinipphaadento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. abhinipphaadeti, payoge  dukka.ta.m; abhinipphaadite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.480: [03] 163^b^.^eb^ kosiyamissaka.m santhata.m kaaraapento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.481: [03] suddhakaa.lakaana.m e.lakalomaana.m santhata.m kaaraapento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m.
text.482: [03] anaadiyitvaa ^a^P5.0036^ea^ tula.m odaataana.m tula.m gocariyaana.m  nava.m santhata.m kaaraapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. kaaraapeti, payoge  dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.483: [03] anuvassa.m santhata.m kaaraapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.484: [03] anaadiyitvaa ^a^T0.0087^ea^ ^a^V0.0061^ea^ puraa.nasanthatassa saamantaa sugatavidatthi.m nava.m  nisiidanasanthata.m kaaraapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. kaaraapeti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.485: [03] e.lakalomaani ^a^M0.0060^ea^ pa.tiggahetvaa tiyojana.m  atikkaamento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m tiyojana.m  atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m.
text.486: [03] a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa e.lakalomaani dhovaapento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. dhovaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; dhovaapite  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.487: [03] ruupiya.m pa.tigga.nhanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ga.nhaati,  payoge dukka.ta.m; gahite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.488: [03] naanappakaaraka.m ruupiyasa.mvohaara.m samaapajjanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. samaapajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; samaapanne nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m.
text.489: [03] naanappakaaraka.m kayavikkaya.m samaapajjanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  samaapajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; samaapanne nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.492: [03] 164^b^.^eb^ atirekapatta.m dasaaha.m atikkaamento eka.m aapatti.m  aapajjati. nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.493: [03] uunapa~ncabandhanena ^a^T0.0088^ea^ pattena a~n~na.m nava.m patta.m cetaapento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.494: [03] bhesajjaani pa.tiggahetvaa sattaaha.m atikkaamento eka.m aapatti.m  aapajjati. nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.495: [03] atirekamaase ^a^V0.0062^ea^ sese gimhaane vassikasaa.tikaciivara.m pariyesanto  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pariyesati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pariyi.t.the  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.496: [03] bhikkhussa saama.m ciivara.m datvaa kupito anattamano acchindanto  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. acchindati, payoge dukka.ta.m; acchinne  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.497: [03] saama.m ^a^M0.0061^ea^ sutta.m vi~n~naapetvaa tantavaayehi ciivara.m  vaayaapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. vaayaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m;  vaayaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.498: [03] pubbe appavaarito a~n~naatakassa gahapatikassa tantavaaye  upasa"nkamitvaa ciivare vikappa.m aapajjanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  vikappa.m aapajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; vikappa.m aapanne nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m.
text.499: [03] accekaciivara.m ^a^P5.0037^ea^ pa.tiggahetvaa ciivarakaalasamaya.m  atikkaamento eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati. nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.500: [03] ti.n.na.m ^a^T0.0089^ea^ ciivaraana.m a~n~natara.m ciivara.m antaraghare nikkhipitvaa  atirekachaaratta.m vippavasanto eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati. nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m.
text.501: [03] jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m attano pari.naamento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. pari.naameti, payoge dukka.ta.m; pari.naamite  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.506: [03] 165^b^.^eb^ sampajaanamusaavaada.m bhaasanto kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? sampajaanamusaavaada.m bhaasanto pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.  paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ^a^V0.0063^ea^ ullapati,  aapatti paaraajikassa; bhikkhu.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena  anuddha.mseti, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; ``yo te vihaare vasati, so  bhikkhu arahaa''ti bha.nati, pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti thullaccayassa; na  pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti dukka.tassa; sampajaanamusaavaade paacittiya.m --  sampajaanamusaavaada.m bhaasanto imaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.507: [03] omasanto ^a^M0.0062^ea^ dve aapattiyo aapajjati. upasampanna.m  omasati, aapatti paacittiyassa; anupasampanna.m omasati, aapatti  dukka.tassa.
text.508: [03] pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. upasampannassa ^a^T0.0090^ea^  pesu~n~na.m upasa.mharati, aapatti paacittiyassa; anupasampannassa pesu~n~na.m  upasa.mharati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.509: [03] anupasampanna.m padaso dhamma.m vaacento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  vaaceti, payoge dukka.ta.m; pade pade aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.510: [03] anupasampannena uttaridirattatiratta.m sahaseyya.m kappento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. nipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nipanne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.511: [03] maatugaamena sahaseyya.m kappento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  nipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nipanne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.512: [03] maatugaamassa uttarichappa~ncavaacaahi dhamma.m desento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. deseti, payoge dukka.ta.m; pade pade aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.513: [03] anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhamma.m bhuuta.m aarocento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. aaroceti, payoge dukka.ta.m; aarocite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.514: [03] bhikkhussa du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m anupasampannassa aarocento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. aaroceti, payoge dukka.ta.m; aarocite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.515: [03] pathavi.m ^a^T0.0091^ea^ ^a^V0.0064^ea^ kha.nanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. kha.nati, payoge  dukka.ta.m; pahaare pahaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.518: [03] 166^b^.^eb^ bhuutagaama.m ^a^P5.0038^ea^ paatento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. paateti, payoge dukka.ta.m; pahaare pahaare aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.519: [03] a~n~nena~n~na.m ^a^M0.0063^ea^ pa.ticaranto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  anaaropite a~n~navaadake a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, aapatti dukka.tassa;  aaropite a~n~navaadake a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.520: [03] bhikkhu.m ujjhaapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ujjhaapeti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; ujjhaapite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.521: [03] sa"nghika.m ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa bhisi.m vaa koccha.m vaa ajjhokaase  santharitvaa anuddharitvaa anaapucchaa pakkamanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  pa.thama.m paada.m le.d.dupaata.m atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m  atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.522: [03] sa"nghike vihaare seyya.m santharitvaa anuddharitvaa anaapucchaa  pakkamanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m parikkhepa.m  atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.523: [03] sa"nghike vihaare jaana.m pubbupagata.m bhikkhu.m anupakhajja seyya.m ^a^T0.0092^ea^  kappento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. nipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nipanne  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.524: [03] bhikkhu.m kupito anattamano sa"nghikaa vihaaraa nikka.d.dhento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. nikka.d.dhati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nikka.d.dhite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.525: [03] sa"nghike ^a^V0.0065^ea^ vihaare uparivehaasaku.tiyaa aahaccapaadaka.m ma~nca.m vaa  pii.tha.m vaa abhinisiidanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. abhinisiidati,  payoge dukka.ta.m; abhinisinne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.526: [03] dvattipariyaaye adhi.t.thahitvaa tatuttari adhi.t.thahanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. adhi.t.theti, payoge dukka.ta.m; adhi.t.thite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.527: [03] jaana.m sappaa.naka.m udaka.m ti.na.m vaa mattika.m vaa si~ncanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. si~ncati, payoge dukka.ta.m; si~ncite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.530: [03] 167^b^.^eb^ asammato ^a^M0.0064^ea^ bhikkhuniyo  ovadanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ovadati, payoge dukka.ta.m;  ovadite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.531: [03] attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. ovadati, payoge dukka.ta.m; ovadite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.532: [03] bhikkhunupassaya.m ^a^T0.0093^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. ovadati, payoge dukka.ta.m; ovadite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.533: [03] ``aamisahetu bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovadantii''ti bha.nanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. bha.nati, payoge dukka.ta.m; bha.nite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.534: [03] a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m dento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. deti, payoge dukka.ta.m; dinne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.535: [03] a~n~naatikaa ^a^P5.0039^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m sibbento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. sibbeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; aaraapathe aaraapathe  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.536: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ^a^V0.0066^ea^ saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.tipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tipanne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.537: [03] bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya eka.m naava.m abhiruhanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. abhiruhati, payoge dukka.ta.m; abhiru.lhe aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.538: [03] jaana.m bhikkhuniparipaacita.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. ``bhu~njissaamii''ti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa;  ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.539: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ^a^T0.0094^ea^ saddhi.m eko ekaaya raho nisajja.m kappento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. nisiidati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nisinne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.542: [03] 168^b^.^eb^ tatuttari ^a^M0.0065^ea^ aavasathapi.n.da.m bhu~njanto  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.543: [03] ga.nabhojana.m bhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti  pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.544: [03] paramparabhojana.m bhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.545: [03] dvattipattapuure puuve pa.tiggahetvaa tatuttari pa.tigga.nhanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. ga.nhaati, payoge dukka.ta.m; gahite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.546: [03] bhuttaavii pavaarito anatiritta.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa  bhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati ^a^V0.0067^ea^. bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati,  aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.547: [03] bhikkhu.m bhuttaavi.m pavaarita.m anatirittena khaadaniiyena vaa  bhojaniiyena ^a^T0.0095^ea^ vaa abhiha.t.thu.m pavaarento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. tassa  vacanena khaadissaami bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa;  bhojanapariyosaane aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.548: [03] vikaale khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa bhu~njanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. khaadissaami bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.549: [03] sannidhikaaraka.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa bhu~njanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. khaadissaami bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati,  aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.550: [03] pa.niitabhojanaani attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.551: [03] adinna.m ^a^M0.0066^ea^ mukhadvaara.m aahaara.m aaharanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa;  ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.554: [03] 169^b^.^eb^ acelakassa, vaa paribbaajakassa vaa  paribbaajikaaya vaa sahatthaa khaadaniiya.m ^a^P5.0040^ea^ vaa bhojaniiya.m  vaa dento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. deti, payoge dukka.ta.m; dinne  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.555: [03] bhikkhu.m -- ``ehaavuso, gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya  pavisissaamaa''ti ^a^T0.0096^ea^ tassa daapetvaa vaa ^a^V0.0068^ea^ adaapetvaa vaa uyyojento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. uyyojeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; uyyojite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.556: [03] sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajja.m kappento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. nisiidati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nisinne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.557: [03] maatugaamena saddhi.m raho pa.ticchanne aasane nisajja.m kappento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. nisiidati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nisinne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.558: [03] maatugaamena saddhi.m eko ekaaya raho nisajja.m kappento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. nisiidati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nisinne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.559: [03] nimantito sabhatto samaano purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m  aapajjanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m ummaara.m atikkaameti,  aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.560: [03] tatuttari bhesajja.m vi~n~naapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  vi~n~naapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; vi~n~naapite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.561: [03] uyyutta.m ^a^M0.0067^ea^ sena.m dassanaaya gacchanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati ^a^T0.0097^ea^. gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa; yattha .thito passati,  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.562: [03] atirekatiratta.m senaaya vasanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  vasati, payoge dukka.ta.m; vasite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.563: [03] uyyodhika.m gacchanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. gacchati,  aapatti dukka.tassa; yattha .thito passati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.566: [03] 170^b^.^eb^ majja.m ^a^V0.0069^ea^ pivanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  ``pivissaamii''ti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare  ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.567: [03] bhikkhu.m a"ngulipatodakena haasento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  haaseti, payoge dukka.ta.m; hasite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.568: [03] udake kii.lanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. he.t.thaagopphake udake  kii.lati, aapatti dukka.tassa; uparigopphake kii.lati, aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.569: [03] anaadariya.m karonto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. karoti, payoge  dukka.ta.m; kate aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.570: [03] bhikkhu.m bhi.msaapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. bhi.msaapeti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; bhi.msaapite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.571: [03] joti.m samaadahitvaa visibbento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  samaadahati ^a^T0.0098^ea^, payoge dukka.ta.m; samaadahite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.572: [03] orenaddhamaasa.m nahaayanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. nahaayati,  payoge dukka.ta.m; nahaanapariyosaane aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.573: [03] anaadiyitvaa ^a^P5.0041^ea^ ti.n.na.m dubba.n.nakara.naana.m  a~n~natara.m dubba.n.nakara.na.m nava.m ciivara.m paribhu~njanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. paribhu~njati, payoge dukka.ta.m; paribhutte aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.574: [03] bhikkhussa ^a^M0.0068^ea^ vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa sikkhamaanaaya  vaa saama.nerassa vaa saama.neriyaa vaa saama.m ciivara.m vikappetvaa  appaccuddhaara.na.m paribhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. paribhu~njati,  payoge dukka.ta.m; paribhutte aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.575: [03] bhikkhussa ^a^V0.0070^ea^ patta.m vaa ciivara.m vaa nisiidana.m vaa suucighara.m vaa  kaayabandhana.m vaa apanidhento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. apanidheti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; apanidhite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.578: [03] 171^b^.^eb^ sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropento kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropento catasso  aapattiyo aapajjati. anodissa opaata.m kha.nati -- ``yo koci  papatitvaa marissatii''ti, aapatti dukka.tassa; manusso tasmi.m papatitvaa  marati, aapatti paaraajikassa; yakkho vaa peto vaa  tiracchaanagatamanussaviggaho vaa tasmi.m ^a^T0.0099^ea^ papatitvaa marati, aapatti  thullaccayassa; tiracchaanagato tasmi.m papatitvaa marati, aapatti  paacittiyassa -- sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropento imaa catasso  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.579: [03] jaana.m sappaa.naka.m udaka.m paribhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  paribhu~njati, payoge dukka.ta.m; paribhutte aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.580: [03] jaana.m yathaadhamma.m nihataadhikara.na.m punakammaaya ukko.tento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. ukko.teti, payoge dukka.ta.m; ukko.tite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.581: [03] bhikkhussa jaana.m du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m pa.ticchaadento eka.m aapatti.m  aapajjati. paacittiya.m.
text.582: [03] jaana.m uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. upasampaadeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; upasampaadite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.583: [03] jaana.m ^a^M0.0069^ea^ theyyasatthena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m  pa.tipajjanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.tipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m;  pa.tipanne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.584: [03] maatugaamena saddhi.m sa.mvidhaaya ekaddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.tipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tipanne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.585: [03] paapikaaya ^a^V0.0071^ea^ di.t.thiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanto ^a^T0.0100^ea^ dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.586: [03] jaana.m tathaavaadinaa bhikkhunaa aka.taanudhammena ta.m di.t.thi.m  appa.tinissa.t.thena saddhi.m sambhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  sambhu~njati, payoge dukka.ta.m; sambhutte aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.587: [03] jaana.m ^a^P5.0042^ea^ tathaanaasita.m sama.nuddesa.m upalaapento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. upalaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; upalaapite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.590: [03] 172^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m vuccamaano -- ``na  taavaaha.m, aavuso, etasmi.m sikkhaapade sikkhissaami yaava na a~n~na.m  bhikkhu.m byatta.m vinayadhara.m paripucchissaamii''ti bha.nanto dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. bha.nati, payoge dukka.ta.m; bha.nite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.591: [03] vinaya.m viva.n.nento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. viva.n.neti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; viva.n.nite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.592: [03] mohento dve aapattiyo aapajjati. anaaropite mohe moheti,  aapatti dukka.tassa; aaropite mohe moheti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.593: [03] bhikkhussa ^a^M0.0070^ea^ kupito anattamano pahaara.m dento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. paharati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pahate aapatti  paacittiyassa ^a^T0.0101^ea^.
text.594: [03] bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattika.m uggiranto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. uggirati, payoge dukka.ta.m; uggirite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.595: [03] bhikkhu.m ^a^V0.0072^ea^ amuulakena sa"nghaadisesena anuddha.msento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. anuddha.mseti, payoge dukka.ta.m; anuddha.msite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.596: [03] bhikkhussa sa~ncicca kukkucca.m upadahanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  upadahati, payoge dukka.ta.m; upadahite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.597: [03] bhikkhuuna.m bha.n.danajaataana.m kalahajaataana.m vivaadaapannaana.m upassuti.m  ti.t.thanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ``sossaamii''ti gacchati,  aapatti dukka.tassa; yattha .thito su.naati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.598: [03] dhammikaana.m kammaana.m chanda.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjanto  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. khiyyati, payoge dukka.ta.m; khiyyite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.599: [03] sa"nghe vinicchayakathaaya vattamaanaaya chanda.m adatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa  pakkamanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. parisaaya hatthapaasa.m vijahantassa  aapatti dukka.tassa; vijahite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.600: [03] samaggena ^a^T0.0102^ea^ sa"nghena ciivara.m datvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjanto  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. khiyyati, payoge dukka.ta.m; khiyyite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.601: [03] jaana.m sa"nghika.m laabha.m pari.nata.m puggalassa pari.naamento dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. pari.naameti, payoge dukka.ta.m; pari.naamite  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.604: [03] 173^b^.^eb^ pubbe ^a^M0.0071^ea^ appa.tisa.mvidito ra~n~no  antepura.m pavisanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m ummaara.m  atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.605: [03] ratana.m ^a^P5.0043^ea^ ^a^V0.0073^ea^ ugga.nhanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  ga.nhaati, payoge dukka.ta.m; gahite aapatti paacittiyassa.

text.607: [03] a.t.thimaya.m vaa dantamaya.m vaa visaa.namaya.m vaa suucighara.m kaaraapento  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.608: [03] pamaa.naatikkanta.m ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa kaaraapento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite ^a^T0.0103^ea^ aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.609: [03] ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa tuulonaddha.m kaaraapento dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite aapatti paacittiyassa.

text.613: [03] ciivara.m kaaraapento kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  sugataciivarappamaa.na.m ciivara.m kaaraapento dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  kaaraapeti ^a^M0.0072^ea^, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite aapatti  paacittiyassa -- sugataciivarappamaa.na.m ciivara.m kaaraapento imaa dve  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.616: [03] 174^b^.^eb^ a~n~naatikaaya ^a^T0.0104^ea^ ^a^V0.0074^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaaya  hatthato khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njanto  kati aapattiyo aapajjati? a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m  pavi.t.thaaya hatthato khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa  bhu~njanto dve aapattiyo aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati,  aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa --  a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaaya hatthato khaadaniiya.m vaa  bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njanto imaa dve aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.617: [03] bhikkhuniyaa vosaasantiyaa na nivaaretvaa bhu~njanto dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa.

text.619: [03] aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu pubbe appa.tisa.mvidita.m khaadaniiya.m vaa  bhojaniiya.m vaa ajjhaaraame sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njanto kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu pubbe appa.tisa.mvidita.m  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ajjhaaraame sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa ^a^T0.0105^ea^ bhu~njanto  dve aapattiyo aapajjati ^a^P5.0044^ea^. bhu~njissaamiiti  pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ^a^M0.0073^ea^ ajjhohaare  aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa -- aara~n~nakesu senaasanesu pubbe  appa.tisa.mvidita.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ajjhaaraame sahatthaa  pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njanto imaa dve aapattiyo aapajjati.

text.709: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karonto kati aapattiyo aapajjati? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake  uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karonto eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  dukka.ta.m -- anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karonto ima.m eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.
text.714: [03] 182^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0083^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo catunna.m  vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m...pe0....

text.718: [03] 183^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0084^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? methuna.m dhamma.m  pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m tiihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena...pe0....
text.719: [03] anaadariya.m ^a^P5.0047^ea^ pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m  vaa khe.la.m vaa karontassa aapatti sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa  passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karontassa aapatti sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  ekena aapattikkhandhena sa"ngahitaa -- dukka.taapattikkhandhena.
text.722: [03] 184^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0085^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti {samu.t.thahanti (sii0 syaa0)}? methuna.m dhamma.m  pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato...pe0....
text.723: [03] anaadariya.m ^a^M0.0081^ea^ pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa  khe.la.m vaa karontassa aapatti channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi ^a^T0.0115^ea^  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m  vaa khe.la.m vaa karontassa aapatti channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato.
text.726: [03] 185^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0086^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa  aapattiyo catunna.m adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0....
text.727: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karontassa aapatti catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m?  anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karontassa  aapatti catunna.m adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m.
text.730: [03] 186^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0087^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa aapattiyo sattanna.m  samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevantassa  aapattiyo sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca...pe0....
text.731: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karontassa aapatti sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati?  anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m ^a^T0.0116^ea^ vaa karontassa  aapatti sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammati -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.734: [03] 187^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ^a^V0.0088^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanto kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanto tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati. akkhaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti  paaraajikassa; yebhuyyena khaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati,  aapatti thullaccayassa; va.t.takate mukhe acchupanta.m ^a^P5.0048^ea^  a"ngajaata.m paveseti, aapatti dukka.tassa -- methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanto  imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.735: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti,  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa, channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti, catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m, sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m tiihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m.  sattanna.m ^a^T0.0117^ea^ samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena  ca...pe0....
text.736: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karonto kati aapattiyo aapajjati? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake  uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karonto eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  dukka.ta.m -- anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karonto ima.m eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.
text.737: [03] saa ^a^V0.0089^ea^ aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajati, sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa, channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati, catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m, sattanna.m, samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati? saa  aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajati -- aacaaravipatti.m.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m ekena aapattikkhandhena sa"ngahitaa --  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m ^a^M0.0083^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato.  catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi  samathehi sammati -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca,  siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.745: [03] 188^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^V0.0090^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta.m,  ka.m aarabbha, kismi.m vatthusmi.m...pe0... kenaabhatanti?
text.746: [03] ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena methuna.m  dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa paaraajika.m ^a^P5.0049^ea^ kattha pa~n~nattanti?  vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sudinna.m kalandaputta.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sudinno kalandaputto puraa.nadutiyikaaya  methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. atthi tattha pa~n~natti,  anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo.  anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi. sabbattha pa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti?  sabbatthapa~n~natti. saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti?  saadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ubhatopa~n~natti.  pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti?  nidaanogadha.m nidaanapariyaapanna.m. katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti?  dutiyena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa  vipattiiti? siilavipatti. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo ^a^T0.0119^ea^  aapattikkhandhoti? paaraajikaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  kaayato ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0...  kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m --
text.747: [21] upaali daasako ceva, so.nako siggavo tathaa.
text.751: [03] 189^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena adinna.m aadiyanapaccayaa paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? dhaniya.m kumbhakaaraputta.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? dhaniyo kumbhakaaraputto ra~n~no daaruuni adinna.m  aadiyi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.752: [03] 190^b^.^eb^ sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa  voropanapaccayaa paaraajika.m ^a^T0.0120^ea^ kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuu a~n~nama~n~na.m jiivitaa voropesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.753: [03] 191^b^.^eb^ asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanapaccayaa  paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  vaggumudaatiiriyaa bhikkhuu gihiina.m a~n~nama~n~nassa uttarimanussadhammassa  va.n.na.m bhaasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa  kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.756: [03] 192^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^M0.0085^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa  arahataa sammaasambuddhena upakkamitvaa^bb^asuci.m mocanapaccayaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~natto, ka.m aarabbha, kismi.m vatthusmi.m...pe0...  kenaabhatanti?
text.757: [03] ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena  upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  saavatthiya.m ^a^T0.0121^ea^ pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m seyyasaka.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa seyyasako upakkamitvaa asuci.m  mocesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti,  anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti.  anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi. sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti?  sabbatthapa~n~natti. saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti?  asaadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~nattiiti?  ekatopa~n~natti. pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha  pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m nidaanapariyaapanna.m. katamena uddesena  uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? tatiyena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati. catunna.m  vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti? siilavipatti. sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti?  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0... kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m  --
text.758: [21] upaali daasako ceva, so.nako siggavo tathaa.
text.762: [03] maatugaamena saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso  kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa  udaayii maatugaamena saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati  -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.763: [03] maatugaama.m ^a^M0.0086^ea^ du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasanapaccayaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m ^a^V0.0093^ea^ pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa udaayii maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato;  siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato  ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.764: [03] maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasanapaccayaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  aayasmaa udaayii maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m  bhaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m ^a^T0.0123^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.765: [03] sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa udaayii sa~ncaritta.m samaapajji, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa vaacato samu.t.thaati, na  kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na  cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.766: [03] sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kaaraapanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti ^a^P5.0050^ea^? aa.laviya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aa.lavake bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aa.lavakaa  bhikkhuu sa~n~naacikaaya ku.tiyo kaaraapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.767: [03] mahallaka.m ^a^M0.0087^ea^ vihaara.m kaaraapanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso  kattha pa~n~nattoti? kosambiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati?  aayasmanta.m channa.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? aayasmaa channo  vihaaravatthu.m sodhento a~n~natara.m cetiyarukkha.m chedaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa ^a^T0.0124^ea^ pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.768: [03] bhikkhu.m ^a^V0.0094^ea^ amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msanapaccayaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? raajagahe pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati?  mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m amuulakena  paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.769: [03] bhikkhu.m a~n~nabhaagiyassa adhikara.nassa ki~ncidesa.m lesamatta.m  upaadaaya paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti? raajagahe pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? mettiyabhuumajake  bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? mettiyabhuumajakaa bhikkhuu  aayasmanta.m dabba.m mallaputta.m a~n~nabhaagiyassa adhikara.nassa ki~nci desa.m  lesamatta.m upaadaaya paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.770: [03] sa"nghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? raajagahe  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? devadatta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  devadatto samaggassa sa"nghassa bhedaaya parakkami, tasmi.m ^a^T0.0125^ea^ vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati  -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.771: [03] bhedakaanuvattakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? raajagahe  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahule bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuu devadattassa sa"nghabhedaaya  parakkamantassa anuvattakaa ahesu.m vaggavaadakaa, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m eke ^a^M0.0088^ea^ samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.772: [03] dubbacassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? kosambiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? aayasmanta.m channa.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? aayasmaa channo bhikkhuuhi sahadhammika.m vuccamaano  attaana.m avacaniiya.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.773: [03] kuladuusakassa ^a^V0.0095^ea^ bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu aarabbha.  kismi.m ^a^T0.0126^ea^ vatthusminti? assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu sa"nghena  pabbaajaniiyakammakataa bhikkhuu chandagaamitaa dosagaamitaa mohagaamitaa  bhayagaamitaa paapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.774: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa dukka.ta.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? chabbaggiye bhikkhuu aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu udake uccaarampi passaavampi khe.lampi aka.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.778: [03] 193^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0096^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo  aapajjati ^a^P5.0051^ea^? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa catasso  aapattiyo aapajjati -- akkhaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati,  aapatti paaraajikassa; yebhuyyena khaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m  pa.tisevati, aapatti thullaccayassa ^a^M0.0089^ea^; va.t.takate mukhe  acchupanta.m a"ngajaata.m paveseti, aapatti dukka.tassa; jatuma.t.thake paacittiya.m  -- methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa imaa ^a^T0.0127^ea^ catasso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.779: [03] adinna.m aadiyanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati? adinna.m  aadiyanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. pa~ncamaasaka.m vaa  atirekapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati,  aapatti paaraajikassa; atirekamaasaka.m vaa uunapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m  adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti thullaccayassa; maasaka.m vaa  uunamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti  dukka.tassa -- adinna.m aadiyanapaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.780: [03] sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa voropanapaccayaa kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa  voropanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. manussa.m odissa  opaata.m kha.nati ``papatitvaa marissatii''ti, aapatti dukka.tassa;  papatite dukkhaa vedanaa uppajjati, aapatti thullaccayassa; marati,  aapatti paaraajikassa -- sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa  voropanapaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.781: [03] asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? asanta.m ^a^V0.0097^ea^ abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanapaccayaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati -- paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m  uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati, aapatti paaraajikassa, ``yo ^a^T0.0128^ea^ te vihaare  vasati so bhikkhu arahaa''ti bha.nati, pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti  thullaccayassa; na pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti dukka.tassa -- asanta.m abhuuta.m  uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapanapaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.784: [03] 194^b^.^eb^ upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocanapaccayaa kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? upakkamitvaa asucimocanapaccayaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati -- ceteti upakkamati muccati, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa; ceteti ^a^M0.0090^ea^ upakkamati na muccati, aapatti  thullaccayassa; payoge dukka.ta.m -- upakkamitvaa asucimocanapaccayaa imaa  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.785: [03] kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjanapaccayaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati -- avassutaa  bhikkhunii avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m  gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa; bhikkhu kaayena kaaya.m  aamasati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; kaayena kaayapa.tibaddha.m aamasati,  aapatti thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddhena kaayapa.tibaddha.m aamasati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; a"ngulipatodake paacittiya.m -- kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjanapaccayaa  imaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.786: [03] maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati -- vaccamagga.m passaavamagga.m aadissa va.n.nampi bha.nati  ava.n.nampi bha.nati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; vaccamagga.m passaavamagga.m  .thapetvaa adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m aadissa va.n.nampi bha.nati ^a^T0.0129^ea^  ava.n.nampi bha.nati, aapatti thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddha.m aadissa  va.n.nampi bha.nati ava.n.nampi bha.nati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.787: [03] attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati -- maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m  bhaasati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; pa.n.dakassa ^a^V0.0098^ea^ santike  attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati, aapatti thullaccayassa;  tiracchaanagatassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati,  aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.788: [03] sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati --  pa.tigga.nhaati viima.msati paccaaharati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa;  pa.tigga.nhaati viima.msati na paccaaharati, aapatti thullaccayassa;  pa.tigga.nhaati na viima.msati na paccaaharati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.789: [03] sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kaaraapanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati -- kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m {ekapi.n.de (syaa0)} anaagate aapatti  thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.790: [03] mahallaka.m ^a^M0.0091^ea^ vihaara.m kaaraapanapaccayaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati -- kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m  anaagate, aapatti thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.791: [03] bhikkhu.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msanapaccayaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati -- anokaasa.m kaaraapetvaa caavanaadhippaayo ^a^T0.0130^ea^ vadeti,  aapatti sa"nghaadisesena dukka.tassa; okaasa.m kaaraapetvaa akkosaadhippaayo  vadeti, aapatti omasavaadassa.
text.792: [03] bhikkhu.m a~n~nabhaagiyassa adhikara.nassa ki~nci desa.m lesamatta.m  upaadaaya paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati -- anokaasa.m kaaraapetvaa caavanaadhippaayo vadeti, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesena dukka.tassa; okaasa.m kaaraapetvaa akkosaadhippaayo vadeti,  aapatti omasavaadassa.
text.793: [03] sa"nghabhedako bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati -- ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.794: [03] bhedakaanuvattakaa bhikkhuu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo ^a^V0.0099^ea^ aapajjati -- ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.795: [03] dubbaco bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati -- ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.796: [03] kuladuusako bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati -- ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa...pe0....
text.797: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  ^a^P5.0052^ea^ kara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m ^a^M0.0092^ea^ vaa khe.la.m  vaa kara.napaccayaa eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati. dukka.ta.m -- anaadariya.m  pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa kara.napaccayaa ima.m eka.m  aapatti.m aapajjati.
text.800: [03] 195^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0100^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa aapattiyo catunna.m  vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m siyaa aacaaravipatti.m...pe0....
text.801: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajati?  anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa kara.napaccayaa  aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajati -- aacaaravipatti.m.
text.804: [03] 196^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0101^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa aapattiyo sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? methuna.m dhamma.m  pa.tisevanapaccayaa ^a^T0.0132^ea^ aapattiyo sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m catuuhi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena...pe0....
text.805: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa aapatti sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi  sa"ngahitaa? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m  vaa kara.napaccayaa aapatti sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m ekena  aapattikkhandhena sa"ngahitaa -- dukka.taapattikkhandhena.
text.808: [03] 197^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^M0.0093^ea^ ^a^V0.0102^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa  aapattiyo channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti?  methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa aapattiyo channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na  vaacato...pe0....
text.809: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa aapatti channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa aapatti channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0....
text.812: [03] 198^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^T0.0133^ea^ ^a^V0.0103^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa aapattiyo catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa  aapattiyo catunna.m adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0....
text.813: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa aapatti catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m?  anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa kara.napaccayaa  aapatti catunna.m adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m.
text.816: [03] 199^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0104^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa aapattiyo sattanna.m  samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa  aapattiyo sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca; siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ti.navatthaarakena ca...pe0....
text.817: [03] anaadariya.m ^a^M0.0094^ea^ pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa  khe.la.m vaa kara.napaccayaa aapatti sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi  sammati? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa aapatti sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammati --  siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena caati.
text.820: [03] 200^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^T0.0134^ea^ ^a^V0.0105^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa catasso aapattiyo ^a^P5.0053^ea^  aapajjati. akkhaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati,  aapatti paaraajikassa; yebhuyyena khaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m  pa.tisevati, aapatti thullaccayassa; va.t.takate mukhe acchupanta.m a"ngajaata.m  paveseti, aapatti dukka.tassa; jatuma.t.thake paacittiya.m -- methuna.m dhamma.m  pa.tisevanapaccayaa imaa catasso aapattiyo aapajjati. taa aapattiyo  catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti? sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m?  sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa aapattiyo catunna.m  vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa siilavipatti.m siyaa  aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m catuuhi aapattikkhandhehi  sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m, tiihi samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca, pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca...pe0....
text.821: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca ^a^T0.0135^ea^ udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati? anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake  uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa kara.napaccayaa eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  dukka.ta.m -- anaadariya.m pa.ticca ^a^M0.0095^ea^ udake uccaara.m vaa  passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa kara.napaccayaa ima.m eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati. saa  aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajati? sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m ^a^V0.0106^ea^ adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati? saa  aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajati -- aacaaravipatti.m.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m ekena aapattikkhandhena sa"ngahitaa --  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi  sammati -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena caati.
text.829: [03] 201^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^T0.0136^ea^ ^a^P5.0054^ea^ ^a^M0.0096^ea^ ^a^V0.0107^ea^ tena  bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena bhikkhuniina.m pa~ncama.m  paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta.m? ka.m aarabbha? kismi.m vatthusmi.m? atthi  tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~natti? sabbatthapa~n~natti,  padesapa~n~natti? saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~natti?  ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~natti? catunna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m  kattha pariyaapanna.m? katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati? catunna.m  vipattiina.m katamaa vipatti? sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo  aapattikkhandho? channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m  katihi samathehi sammati? ko tattha vinayo? ko tattha  abhivinayo? ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m? ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkha.m?  kaa vipatti? kaa sampatti? kaa pa.tipatti? kati atthavase  pa.ticca bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m pa~ncama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m? kaa  sikkhanti? kaa sikkhitasikkhaa? kattha .thita.m? kaa dhaarenti?  kassa vacana.m? kenaabhatanti?
text.830: [03] 202^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena bhikkhuniina.m pa~ncama.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m ^a^T0.0137^ea^ vatthusminti? sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  atthi tattha pa~n~natti anupa~n~natti anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti.  anupa~n~natti anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi. sabbatthapa~n~natti ^a^V0.0108^ea^,  padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti. saadhaara.napa~n~natti,  asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? asaadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti,  ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ekatopa~n~natti. catunna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m  katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m nidaanapariyaapanna.m.  katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? dutiyena uddesena uddesa.m  aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti? siilavipatti.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti?  paaraajikaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaane ^a^M0.0097^ea^ samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m  adhikara.nanti? aapattaadhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi  sammatiiti? dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti?  pa~n~natti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m,  ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkhanti? pa~n~natti paatimokkha.m, vibhatti  adhipaatimokkha.m. kaa vipattiiti? asa.mvaro vipatti. kaa  sampattiiti ^a^T0.0138^ea^? sa.mvaro sampatti. kaa pa.tipattiiti? na evaruupa.m  karissaamiiti yaavajiiva.m aapaa.nako.tika.m samaadaaya sikkhati  sikkhaapadesu. {a0 ni0  10.31} kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m pa~ncama.m  paaraajika.m pa~n~nattanti? dasa atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m  pa~ncama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m  bhikkhuniina.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuniina.m phaasuvihaaraaya,  di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m  pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya,  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. kaa sikkhantiiti? sekkhaa ca  puthujjanakalyaa.nikaa ca sikkhanti. kaa sikkhitasikkhaati?  arahantiyo {arahantaa (ka0)} sikkhitasikkhaa. kattha .thitanti? sikkhaakaamaasu  .thita.m. kaa dhaarentiiti? yaasa.m vattati taa dhaarenti. kassa  vacananti? bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. kenaabhatanti?  paramparaabhata.m --
text.831: [21] upaali daasako ceva, so.nako siggavo tathaa.

text.842: [22] tissatthero ca medhaavii, devatthero ca pa.n.dito..

text.853: [21] punadeva abhayo medhaavii, pi.take sabbattha kovido.

text.863: [03] 203^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^T0.0139^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena bhikkhuniina.m cha.t.tha.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m  ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodesi ^a^M0.0099^ea^ ga.nassa  aarocesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.864: [03] 204^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuniina.m sattama.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii samaggena sa"nghena  ukkhitta.m ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m anuvatti, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati  -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.865: [03] 205^b^.^eb^ bhikkhuniina.m a.t.thama.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo a.t.thama.m  vatthu.m paripuuresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.872: [03] 206^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena ussayavaadikaaya bhikkhuniyaa a.d.da.m karontiyaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~natto? ka.m aarabbha? kismi.m  vatthusmi.m...pe0... kenaabhatanti?
text.873: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena ussayavaadikaaya bhikkhuniyaa a.d.da.m karontiyaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii ussayavaadikaa vihari, tasmi.m ^a^M0.0100^ea^  vatthusmi.m. atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti?  ekaa pa~n~natti. anupa~n~natti anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi.  sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti.  saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? asaadhaara.napa~n~natti.  ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ekatopa~n~natti. catunna.m  paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m  nidaanapariyaapanna.m ^a^T0.0141^ea^. katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? tatiyena  uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti?  siilavipatti. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti?  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa  kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ^a^P5.0056^ea^ ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0...  kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m --
