text.878: [03] 208^b^.^eb^ cori.m ^a^V0.0112^ea^ vu.t.thaapentiyaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  cori.m vu.t.thaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.879: [03] 209^b^.^eb^ ekaaya gaamantara.m gacchantiyaa sa"nghaadiseso  kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii  ekaa gaamantara.m gacchi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, tisso  anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati ^a^T0.0142^ea^  -- pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.880: [03] 210^b^.^eb^ samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitta.m bhikkhuni.m dhammena  vinayena satthusaasanena anapaloketvaa kaarakasa"ngha.m ana~n~naaya ga.nassa  chanda.m ^a^M0.0101^ea^ osaarentiyaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii samaggena  sa"nghena ukkhitta.m bhikkhuni.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena  anapaloketvaa kaarakasa"ngha.m ana~n~naaya ga.nassa chanda.m osaaresi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.881: [03] 211^b^.^eb^ avassutaaya bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa  purisapuggalassa hatthato khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa  pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njantiyaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato aamisa.m pa.tiggahesi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.882: [03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo  karissati avassuto vaa anavassuto vaa, yato tva.m anavassutaa!  i"ngha, ayye, ya.m te eso purisapuggalo deti khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m  vaa, ta.m tva.m ^a^T0.0143^ea^ sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaada vaa bhu~nja vaa''ti uyyojentiyaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  arabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  a~n~nataraa ^a^V0.0113^ea^ bhikkhunii --``ki.m te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo  karissati avassuto vaa anavassuto vaa, yato tva.m anavassutaa!  i"ngha, ayye, ya.m te eso purisapuggalo deti khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m  vaa, ta.m tva.m sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaada vaa bhu~nja vaa''ti uyyojesi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.883: [03] 213^b^.^eb^ kupitaaya anattamanaaya bhikkhuniyaa yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantiyaa ^a^P5.0057^ea^  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii kupitaa anattamanaa eva.m avaca -- ``buddha.m  paccaacikkhaami, dhamma.m paccaacikkhaami, sa"ngha.m paccaacikkhaami, sikkha.m  paccaacikkhaamii''ti, tasmi.m ^a^M0.0102^ea^ vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.884: [03] 214^b^.^eb^ kismi~ncideva adhikara.ne paccaakataaya  bhikkhuniyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantiyaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m ^a^T0.0144^ea^ bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii kismi~ncideva adhikara.ne paccaakataa kupitaa  anattamanaa eva.m avaca -- ``chandagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,  dosagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,  bhayagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo''ti, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.885: [03] 215^b^.^eb^ sa.msa.t.thaana.m bhikkhuniina.m yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya  na pa.tinissajjantiina.m sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo sa.msa.t.thaa vihari.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.886: [03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``sa.msa.t.thaava, ayye, tumhe viharatha. maa tumhe  naanaa viharitthaa''ti uyyojentiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantiyaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii -- ``sa.msa.t.thaava ayye, tumhe  viharatha, maa tumhe naanaa viharitthaa''ti uyyojesi, tasmi.m ^a^V0.0114^ea^ vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.890: [22] ki.m te kupitaa kismi~nci, sa.msa.t.thaa ~naayate dasaati..
text.892: [03] 217^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^M0.0103^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa  passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pattasannicaya.m karontiyaa nissaggiya.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo pattasannicaya.m aka.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- kathinake...pe0....
text.893: [03] akaalaciivara.m ``kaalaciivara''nti adhi.t.thahitvaa bhaajaapentiyaa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii ^a^P5.0058^ea^ akaalaciivara.m  ``kaalaciivara''nti adhi.t.thahitvaa bhaajaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.894: [03] bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m ciivara.m parivattetvaa acchindantiyaa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m ciivara.m parivattetvaa acchindi,  tasmi.m ^a^T0.0146^ea^ vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.895: [03] a~n~na.m vi~n~naapetvaa a~n~na.m vi~n~naapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa ^a^V0.0115^ea^ bhikkhunii  a~n~na.m vi~n~naapetvaa a~n~na.m vi~n~naapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.896: [03] a~n~na.m cetaapetvaa a~n~na.m cetaapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  a~n~na.m cetaapetvaa a~n~na.m cetaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.897: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena sa"nghikena a~n~na.m  cetaapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha.m pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati ^a^M0.0104^ea^? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo  a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena sa"nghikena a~n~na.m cetaapesu.m,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi  samu.t.thaanehi ^a^T0.0147^ea^ samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.898: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena sa"nghikena  sa~n~naacikena a~n~na.m cetaapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena sa"nghikena  sa~n~naacikena a~n~na.m cetaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.899: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena mahaajanikena a~n~na.m  cetaapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo a~n~nadatthikena  parikkhaarena ^a^V0.0116^ea^ a~n~nuddisikena mahaajanikena a~n~na.m cetaapesu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.900: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena mahaajanikena  sa~n~naacikena a~n~na.m cetaapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena mahaajanikena  sa~n~naacikena ^a^T0.0148^ea^ a~n~na.m cetaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.901: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena puggalikena  sa~n~naacikena a~n~na.m cetaapentiyaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena puggalikena sa~n~naacikena  a~n~na.m cetaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.902: [03] atirekacatukka.msaparama.m ^a^M0.0105^ea^ garupaavura.na.m cetaapentiyaa  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii raajaana.m kambala.m vi~n~naapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.903: [03] atirekaa.d.dhateyyaka.msaparama.m lahupaavura.na.m cetaapentiyaa ^a^P5.0059^ea^  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii raajaana.m khoma.m vi~n~naapesi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati ^a^T0.0149^ea^ ...pe0....
text.906: [21] patta.m akaala.m kaala~nca, parivatte ca vi~n~naape.
text.911: [03] 218^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena lasu.na.m khaadantiyaa paacittiya.m ^a^V0.0117^ea^ kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii na matta.m jaanitvaa lasu.na.m  haraapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.912: [03] sambaadhe loma.m sa.mharaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo sambaadhe  loma.m sa.mharaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.913: [03] talaghaatake ^a^M0.0106^ea^ paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? dve bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti ^a^T0.0150^ea^? dve bhikkhuniyo talaghaataka.m aka.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.914: [03] jatuma.t.thake paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii jatuma.t.thaka.m aadiyi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.915: [03] atirekadva"ngulapabbaparama.m udakasuddhika.m aadiyantiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii  atigambhiira.m udakasuddhika.m aadiyi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.916: [03] bhikkhussa bhu~njantassa paaniiyena vaa vidhuupanena vaa  upati.t.thantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii bhikkhussa bhu~njantassa paaniiyena ca vidhuupanena ca  upati.t.thi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.917: [03] aamakadha~n~na.m ^a^T0.0151^ea^ ^a^P5.0060^ea^ ^a^V0.0118^ea^ vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aamakadha~n~na.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.918: [03] uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa sa"nkaara.m vaa vighaasa.m vaa tiroku.t.te {tiroku.d.de (sii0  syaa0)} cha.d.dentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii uccaara.m {uccaarampi passaavampi sa"nkaarampi vighaasampi  (ka0)} tiroku.t.te cha.d.desi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.919: [03] uccaara.m ^a^M0.0107^ea^ vaa passaava.m vaa sa"nkaara.m vaa vighaasa.m vaa  harite cha.d.dentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo uccaarampi passaavampi  sa"nkaarampi vighaasampi harite cha.d.desu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.920: [03] nacca.m vaa giita.m vaa vaadita.m vaa dassanaaya gacchantiyaa paacittiya.m ^a^T0.0152^ea^  kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo naccampi giitampi vaaditampi dassanaaya agama.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.923: [03] 219^b^.^eb^ rattandhakaare appadiipe purisena saddhi.m ekenekaaya  santi.t.thantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii rattandhakaare appadiipe purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa  santi.t.thi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- theyyasatthake...pe0....
text.924: [03] pa.ticchanne ^a^V0.0119^ea^ okaase purisena saddhi.m ekenekaaya santi.t.thantiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa  bhikkhunii pa.ticchanne okaase purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa santi.t.thi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- theyyasatthake...pe0....
text.925: [03] ajjhokaase purisena saddhi.m ekenekaaya santi.t.thantiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati ^a^T0.0153^ea^? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii  ajjhokaase purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa santi.t.thi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- theyyasatthake...pe0....
text.926: [03] rathikaa ^a^M0.0108^ea^ vaa {rathiyaaya vaa (ka0)} byuuhe vaa si"nghaa.take vaa purisena  saddhi.m ekenekaaya santi.t.thantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii rathikaayapi byuuhepi  si"nghaa.takepi purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa santi.t.thi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- theyyasatthake...pe0....
text.927: [03] purebhatta.m kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa aasane nisiiditvaa saamike  anaapucchaa pakkamantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m ^a^P5.0061^ea^. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii purebhatta.m  kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa aasane nisiiditvaa saamike anaapucchaa  pakkaami, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- kathinake...pe0....
text.928: [03] pacchaabhatta.m kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa saamike anaapucchaa aasane  abhinisiidantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^T0.0154^ea^.  ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii pacchaabhatta.m kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa  saamike anaapucchaa aasane abhinisiidi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  kathinake...pe0....
text.929: [03] vikaale kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa saamike anaapucchaa seyya.m  santharitvaa vaa santharaapetvaa vaa ^a^V0.0120^ea^ abhinisiidantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo vikaale kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa saamike anaapucchaa seyya.m  santharitvaa abhinisiidi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- kathinake...pe0....
text.930: [03] duggahitena duupadhaaritena para.m ujjhaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii  duggahitena duupadhaaritena para.m ujjhaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.931: [03] attaana.m ^a^M0.0109^ea^ vaa para.m vaa nirayena vaa brahmacariyena  vaa abhisapantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m ^a^T0.0155^ea^ aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii attaanampi parampi nirayenapi  brahmacariyenapi abhisapi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.932: [03] attaana.m vadhitvaa vadhitvaa rodantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii  attaana.m vadhitvaa vadhitvaa rodi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.935: [03] 220^b^.^eb^ naggaaya nahaayantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo naggaa nahaayi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.936: [03] pamaa.naatikkanta.m udakasaa.tika.m kaaraapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^V0.0121^ea^. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo appamaa.nikaayo udakasaa.tikaayo dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa ^a^T0.0156^ea^ pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.937: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ^a^P5.0062^ea^ ciivara.m visibbetvaa vaa  visibbaapetvaa vaa neva sibbentiyaa na sibbaapanaaya ussukka.m  karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m visibbaapetvaa neva sibbesi  na sibbaapanaaya ussukka.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.938: [03] pa~ncaahika.m ^a^M0.0110^ea^ sa"nghaa.ticaara.m atikkaamentiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniina.m hatthe ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena  janapadacaarika.m pakkami.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati kathinake...pe0....
text.939: [03] ciivarasa"nkamaniiya.m dhaarentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii a~n~nataraaya bhikkhuniyaa  ciivara.m anaapucchaa paarupi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- kathinake...pe0....
text.940: [03] ga.nassa ^a^T0.0157^ea^ ciivaralaabha.m antaraaya.m karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  ga.nassa ciivaralaabha.m antaraaya.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.941: [03] dhammika.m ciivaravibha"nga.m pa.tibaahantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti. saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  dhammika.m ^a^V0.0122^ea^ ciivaravibha"nga.m pa.tibaahi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.942: [03] agaarikassa vaa paribbaajakassa vaa paribbaajikaaya vaa  sama.naciivara.m dentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii agaarikassa sama.naciivara.m  adaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.943: [03] dubbalaciivarapaccaasaaya ciivarakaalasamaya.m atikkaamentiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa ^a^T0.0158^ea^  bhikkhunii dubbalaciivarapaccaasaaya ciivarakaalasamaya.m atikkaamesi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.944: [03] dhammika.m ^a^M0.0111^ea^ kathinuddhaara.m pa.tibaahantiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha ^a^P5.0063^ea^. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii dhammika.m kathinuddhaara.m pa.tibaahi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.947: [03] 221^b^.^eb^ dvinna.m bhikkhuniina.m ekama~nce tuva.t.tentiina.m  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo ^a^V0.0123^ea^ dve ekama~nce tuva.t.tesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.948: [03] dvinna.m bhikkhuniina.m ekatthara.napaavura.ne tuva.t.tentiina.m paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo dve ekatthara.napaavura.naa tuva.t.tesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi ^a^T0.0159^ea^ samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.949: [03] bhikkhuniyaa sa~ncicca aphaasu.m karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  bhikkhuniyaa sa~ncicca aphaasu.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.950: [03] dukkhita.m sahajiivini.m neva upa.t.thentiyaa na upa.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m  karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii dukkhita.m sahajiivini.m neva upa.t.thesi na  upa.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.951: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ^a^M0.0112^ea^ upassaya.m datvaa kupitaaya  anattamanaaya nikka.d.dhantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii bhikkhuniyaa upassaya.m datvaa  kupitaa anattamanaa nikka.d.dhi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.952: [03] sa.msa.t.thaaya bhikkhuniyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantiyaa ^a^T0.0160^ea^ paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii sa.msa.t.thaa vihari, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.953: [03] antora.t.the saasa"nkasammate sappa.tibhaye asatthikaaya caarika.m  carantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahulaa ^a^P5.0064^ea^ bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo antora.t.the  saasa"nkasammate sappa.tibhaye asatthikaayo caarika.m cari.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.954: [03] tirora.t.the ^a^V0.0124^ea^ saasa"nkasammate sappa.tibhaye asatthikaaya caarika.m  carantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo tirora.t.the saasa"nkasammate sappa.tibhaye  asatthikaayo caarika.m cari.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.955: [03] antovassa.m caarika.m carantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  raajagahe ^a^T0.0161^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo antovassa.m caarika.m  cari.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.956: [03] vassa.mvu.t.thaaya {vassa.mvutthaaya (sii0 syaa0)} bhikkhuniyaa caarika.m na pakkamantiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha ^a^M0.0113^ea^. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo vassa.mvu.t.thaa caarika.m na pakkami.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.959: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ raajaagaara.m vaa cittaagaara.m vaa aaraama.m vaa uyyaana.m  vaa pokkhara.ni.m vaa dassanaaya gacchantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  raajaagaarampi cittaagaarampi dassanaaya agama.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.960: [03] aasandi.m vaa palla"nka.m vaa paribhu~njantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa ^a^T0.0162^ea^  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aasandimpi palla"nkampi paribhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.961: [03] sutta.m ^a^V0.0125^ea^ kantantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo sutta.m kanti.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.962: [03] gihiveyyaavacca.m karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyaavacca.m  aka.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.963: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ``ehaayye ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasamehii''ti  vuccamaanaaya ``saadhuu''ti pa.tissu.nitvaa neva vuupasamentiyaa na  vuupasamaaya ussukka.m karontiyaa ^a^M0.0114^ea^ paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa ^a^P5.0065^ea^  bhikkhunii bhikkhuniyaa -- ``ehaayye, ima.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasamehii''ti vuccamaanaa ``saadhuu''ti pa.tissu.nitvaa neva vuupasamesi ^a^T0.0163^ea^  na vuupasamaaya ussukka.m akaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.964: [03] agaarikassa vaa paribbaajakassa vaa paribbaajikaaya vaa sahatthaa  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa dentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii agaarikassa sahatthaa  khaadaniiyampi bhojaniiyampi adaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.965: [03] aavasathaciivara.m anissajjitvaa paribhu~njantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  aavasathaciivara.m anissajjitvaa paribhu~nji, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  kathinake...pe0....
text.966: [03] aavasatha.m anissajjitvaa caarika.m pakkamantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m ^a^V0.0126^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  aavasatha.m anissajjitvaa caarika.m pakkaami, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati ^a^T0.0164^ea^ --  kathinake...pe0....
text.967: [03] tiracchaanavijja.m pariyaapu.nantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  tiracchaanavijja.m pariyaapu.ni.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  padasodhamme...pe0....
text.968: [03] tiracchaanavijja.m vaacentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo ^a^M0.0115^ea^  tiracchaanavijja.m vaacesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  padasodhamme...pe0....
text.971: [03] 223^b^.^eb^ jaana.m sabhikkhuka.m aaraama.m anaapucchaa  pavisantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aaraama.m anaapucchaa pavisi.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.972: [03] bhikkhu.m akkosantiyaa paribhaasantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo ^a^T0.0165^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo aayasmanta.m upaali.m akkosi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.973: [03] ca.n.diikataaya ga.na.m paribhaasantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m ^a^P5.0066^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  ca.n.diikataaya ^a^V0.0127^ea^ ga.na.m paribhaasi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.974: [03] nimantitaaya vaa pavaaritaaya vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa  a~n~natra bhu~njantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m.  ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo bhuttaaviniyo pavaaritaa a~n~natra  bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.975: [03] kula.m maccharaayantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii kula.m maccharaayi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.976: [03] abhikkhuke ^a^M0.0116^ea^ aavaase vassa.m vasantiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti ^a^T0.0166^ea^? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke aavaase vassa.m vasi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.977: [03] vassa.mvu.t.thaaya bhikkhuniyaa ubhatosa"nghe tiihi .thaanehi na  pavaarentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo vassa.mvu.t.thaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m {bhikkhunisa.mghe (ka0)} na pavaaresu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.978: [03] ovaadaaya vaa sa.mvaasaaya vaa na gacchantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? sakkesu pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo ovaada.m na gacchi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.979: [03] uposathampi na pucchantiyaa ovaadampi na yaacantiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m ^a^V0.0128^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchi.msu ovaadampi na yaaci.msu, tasmi.m ^a^T0.0167^ea^  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.980: [03] pasaakhe jaata.m ga.n.da.m vaa rudhita.m {ruhita.m (sii0 syaa0)} vaa anapaloketvaa sa"ngha.m vaa  ga.na.m vaa purisena saddhi.m ekenekaaya bhedaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii  pasaakhe jaata.m ga.n.da.m purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa bhedaapesi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- kathinake...pe0....
text.983: [03] 224^b^.^eb^ gabbhini.m ^a^M0.0117^ea^ vu.t.thaapentiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^P5.0067^ea^.  ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo gabbhini.m vu.t.thaapesu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.998: [03] uunadvaadasavassaaya ^a^V0.0131^ea^ vu.t.thaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo uunadvaadasavassaa  vu.t.thaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.999: [03] paripu.n.nadvaadasavassaaya sa"nghena asammataaya vu.t.thaapentiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa ^a^T0.0172^ea^  bhikkhuniyo paripu.n.nadvaadasavassaa sa"nghena asammataa vu.t.thaapesu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- dutiyapaaraajike...pe0....
text.1000: [03] ``ala.m taava te, ayye, vu.t.thaapitenaa''ti vuccamaanaaya  ``saadhuu''ti pa.tissu.nitvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajjantiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  ca.n.dakaa.li.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? ca.n.dakaa.lii  bhikkhunii ``ala.m taava te, ayye, vu.t.thaapitenaa''ti vuccamaanaa ^a^M0.0120^ea^  ``saadhuu''ti pa.tissu.nitvaa pacchaa khiiyanadhamma.m aapajji,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1001: [03] sikkhamaana.m -- ``sace me tva.m, ayye, ciivara.m dassasi, evaaha.m  ta.m vu.t.thaapessaamii''ti vatvaa neva vu.t.thaapentiyaa na vu.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m  karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii sikkhamaana.m -- ``sace me tva.m, ayye, ciivara.m  dassasi, evaaha.m ta.m vu.t.thaapessaamii''ti vatvaa neva vu.t.thaapesi na  vu.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m akaasi ^a^V0.0132^ea^, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1002: [03] sikkhamaana.m -- ``sace ma.m tva.m, ayye, dve vassaani  anubandhissasi, evaaha.m ta.m vu.t.thaapessaamii''ti vatvaa neva vu.t.thaapentiyaa na  vu.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m ^a^T0.0173^ea^ karontiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii sikkhamaana.m -- ``sace  ma.m tva.m, ayye, dve vassaani anubandhissasi, evaaha.m ta.m  vu.t.thaapessaamii''ti vatvaa neva vu.t.thaapesi na vu.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m akaasi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1003: [03] purisasa.msa.t.tha.m kumaarakasa.msa.t.tha.m ca.n.di.m sokaavaasa.m sikkhamaana.m  vu.t.thaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii purisasa.msa.t.tha.m kumaarakasa.msa.t.tha.m ca.n.di.m sokaavaasa.m  sikkhamaana.m vu.t.thaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1004: [03] maataapituuhi vaa saamikena vaa ananu~n~naata.m sikkhamaana.m  vu.t.thaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m  aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  thullanandaa bhikkhunii maataapituuhipi saamikenaapi ananu~n~naata.m  sikkhamaana.m vu.t.thaapesi ^a^P5.0069^ea^, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  siyaa vaacato samu.t.thaati, na kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ^a^M0.0121^ea^ ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na ^a^T0.0174^ea^ kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1005: [03] paarivaasikachandadaanena sikkhamaana.m vu.t.thaapentiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? raajagahe pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  paarivaasikachandadaanena sikkhamaana.m vu.t.thaapesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa  pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1006: [03] anuvassa.m vu.t.thaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo anuvassa.m vu.t.thaapesu.m,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1007: [03] eka.m vassa.m dve vu.t.thaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo eka.m ^a^V0.0133^ea^ vassa.m dve  vu.t.thaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1010: [03] 226^b^.^eb^ chattupaahana.m dhaarentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m ^a^T0.0175^ea^ pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa  bhikkhuniyo chattupaahana.m dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti,  ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1011: [03] yaanena yaayantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo yaanena yaayi.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1012: [03] sa"nghaa.ni.m ^a^M0.0122^ea^ dhaarentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii  sa"nghaa.ni.m dhaaresi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1013: [03] itthaala"nkaara.m dhaarentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  itthaala"nkaara.m dhaaresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^T0.0176^ea^ dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1014: [03] gandhava.n.nakena nahaayantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  gandhava.n.nakena nahaayi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1015: [03] vaasitakena ^a^V0.0134^ea^ pi~n~naakena nahaayantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  vaasitakena pi~n~naakena nahaayi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1016: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ummaddaapentiyaa parimaddaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyaa ummaddaapesu.m parimaddaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1017: [03] sikkhamaanaa ^a^P5.0070^ea^ ummaddaapentiyaa parimaddaapentiyaa  paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  sambahulaa ^a^T0.0177^ea^ bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo sikkhamaanaaya ummaddaapesu.m parimaddaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1018: [03] saama.neriyaa ummaddaapentiyaa parimaddaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha ^a^M0.0123^ea^. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo saama.neriyaa ummaddaapesu.m parimaddaapesu.m, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1019: [03] gihiniyaa ummaddaapentiyaa parimaddaapentiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo gihiniyaa ummaddaapesu.m parimaddaapesu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- e.lakalomake...pe0....
text.1020: [03] bhikkhussa purato anaapucchaa aasane nisiidantiyaa paacittiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anaapucchaa aasane nisiidi.msu, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m ^a^T0.0178^ea^. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- kathinake...pe0....
text.1021: [03] anokaasakata.m ^a^V0.0135^ea^ bhikkhu.m pa~nha.m pucchantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa  bhikkhuniyo anokaasakata.m bhikkhu.m pa~nha.m pucchi.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati  -- padasodhamme...pe0....
text.1022: [03] asa"nkaccikaaya {asa"nkacchikaaya (syaa0)} gaama.m pavisantiyaa paacittiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii asa"nkaccikaa gaama.m  paavisi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato  na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato...pe0....
text.1029: [22] pure pacchaa vikaale ca, duggahi niraye vadhi..
text.1033: [22] datvaa sa.msa.t.thaanto ca, tirovassa.m na pakkame..
text.1034: [21] raajaa aasandi sutta~nca, gihi vuupasamena ca.
text.1037: [22] vaase pavaara.novaada.m, dve dhammaa pasaakhena ca..
text.1039: [22] paripu.n.na~nca ^a^P5.0071^ea^ sa"nghena, saha vu.t.thaa cha  pa~nca ca..
text.1040: [21] kumaarii dve ca sa"nghena, dvaadasa sammatena ca.
text.1041: [22] ala.m sace ca dvevassa.m, sa.msa.t.thaa saamikena ca..
text.1050: [03] 227^b^.^eb^ sappi.m ^a^M0.0125^ea^ vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa  paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo sappi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1051: [03] tela.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo tela.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.1054: [03] maccha.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo maccha.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1055: [03] ma.msa.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo. ma.msa.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1056: [03] khiira.m ^a^M0.0126^ea^ vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa paa.tidesaniiya.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo ^a^T0.0182^ea^ aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo khiira.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1057: [03] dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo dadhi.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati --  siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa ^a^V0.0138^ea^ kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati...pe0....

text.1063: [06] ye sikkhaapadaa bhikkhuvibha"nge vitthaaritaa te sa.mkhittaa
text.1068: [03] 228^b^.^eb^ avassutaa ^a^T0.0183^ea^ ^a^V0.0139^ea^ bhikkhunii avassutassa  purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantii kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  avassutaa bhikkhunii avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m  saadiyantii ^a^P5.0072^ea^ tisso aapattiyo aapajjati ^a^M0.0127^ea^.  adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti  paaraajikassa; ubbhakkhaka.m adhojaa.numa.n.dala.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti  thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddha.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti dukka.tassa --  avassutaa bhikkhunii avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m  saadiyantii imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1069: [03] vajjappa.ticchaadikaa bhikkhunii vajja.m pa.ticchaadentii kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? vajjappa.ticchaadikaa bhikkhunii vajja.m  pa.ticchaadentii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m  pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti paaraajikassa; vematikaa pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti  thullaccayassa; aacaaravipatti.m pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti dukka.tassa --  vajjappa.ticchaadikaa bhikkhunii vajja.m pa.ticchaadentii imaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1070: [03] ukkhittaanuvattikaa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantii kati aapattiyo aapajjati? ukkhittaanuvattikaa  bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantii tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa;  kammavaacaapariyosaane ^a^T0.0184^ea^ aapatti paaraajikassa -- ukkhittaanuvattikaa  bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantii imaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1071: [03] a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuurentii kati aapattiyo aapajjati? a.t.thama.m  vatthu.m paripuurentii tisso aapattiyo ^a^V0.0140^ea^ aapajjati. purisena --  ``itthannaama.m okaasa.m {itthannaama.m gahana.m (sii0), itthannaama.m gabbha.m (syaa0)} aagacchaa''ti  vuttaa gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa;  purisassa hatthapaasa.m okkantamatte aapatti thullaccayassa; a.t.thama.m vatthu.m  paripuureti, aapatti paaraajikassa -- a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuurentii imaa  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1074: [03] 229^b^.^eb^ ussayavaadikaa bhikkhunii a.d.da.m karontii tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati. ekassa aaroceti, aapatti dukka.tassa;  dutiyassa aaroceti, ^a^M0.0128^ea^ aapatti thullaccayassa;  a.d.dapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1075: [03] cori.m vu.t.thaapentii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa  dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1076: [03] ekaa gaamantara.m gacchantii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa; pa.thama.m paada.m parikkhepa.m atikkaameti,  aapatti thullaccayassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa ^a^T0.0185^ea^.
text.1077: [03] samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitta.m bhikkhuni.m dhammena vinayena  satthusaasanena anapaloketvaa kaarakasa"ngha.m ana~n~naaya ga.nassa chanda.m  osaarentii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi  kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1078: [03] avassutaa bhikkhunii avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njantii ^a^P5.0073^ea^  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ``khaadissaami  bhu~njissaamii''ti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti thullaccayassa; ajjhohaare  ajjhohaare aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; udakadantapona.m pa.tigga.nhaati,  aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1079: [03] ``ki.m te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vaa  anavassuto vaa, yato tva.m ^a^V0.0141^ea^ anavassutaa! i"ngha, ayye, ya.m te eso  purisapuggalo deti khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa, ta.m tva.m sahatthaa  pa.tiggahetvaa khaada vaa bhu~nja vaa''ti uyyojentii tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati. tassaa vacanena khaadissaami bhu~njissaamiiti  pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti  thullaccayassa; bhojanapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1080: [03] kupitaa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi  kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa ^a^T0.0186^ea^; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1081: [03] kismi~ncideva adhikara.ne paccaakataa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; ^a^M0.0129^ea^ dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa;  kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1082: [03] sa.msa.t.thaa bhikkhuniyo yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantiyo tisso aapattiyo aapajjanti. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1083: [03] ``sa.msa.t.thaava, ayye, tumhe viharatha. maa tumhe naanaa  viharitthaa''ti uyyojentii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi  kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1086: [03] 230^b^.^eb^ pattasannicaya.m karontii eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1087: [03] akaalaciivara.m ``kaalaciivara''nti adhi.t.thahitvaa bhaajaapentii dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. bhaajaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; bhaajaapite  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1088: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ^a^V0.0142^ea^ saddhi.m ciivara.m parivattetvaa acchindantii dve  aapattiyo ^a^T0.0187^ea^ aapajjati. acchindati, payoge dukka.ta.m; acchinne  nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1089: [03] a~n~na.m vi~n~naapetvaa a~n~na.m vi~n~naapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  vi~n~naapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; vi~n~naapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1090: [03] a~n~na.m cetaapetvaa a~n~na.m cetaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1091: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena sa"nghikena a~n~na.m  cetaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m;  cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1092: [03] a~n~nadatthike ^a^M0.0130^ea^ parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena  sa"nghikena sa.myaacikena a~n~na.m cetaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1093: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena mahaajanikena a~n~na.m  cetaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m;  cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1094: [03] a~n~nadatthikena parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisikena mahaajanikena  sa.myaacikena a~n~na.m cetaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. cetaapeti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1095: [03] a~n~nadatthikena ^a^T0.0188^ea^ parikkhaarena a~n~nuddisike ^a^P5.0074^ea^  puggalikena sa.myaacikena a~n~na.m cetaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1096: [03] atirekacatukka.msaparama.m garupaavura.na.m cetaapentii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1097: [03] atirekaa.d.dhateyyaka.msaparama.m lahupaavura.na.m cetaapentii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. cetaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cetaapite nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m.
text.1101: [03] 231^b^.^eb^ lasu.na.m ^a^V0.0143^ea^ khaadantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  khaadissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare  ajjhohaare aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1102: [03] sambaadhe loma.m sa.mharaapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  sa.mharaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; sa.mharaapite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1103: [03] talaghaataka.m ^a^M0.0131^ea^ karontii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  karoti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kate aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1104: [03] jatuma.t.thaka.m aadiyantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. aadiyati,  payoge dukka.ta.m, aadinne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1105: [03] atirekadva"ngulapabbaparama.m udakasuddhika.m aadiyantii dve aapattiyo ^a^T0.0189^ea^  aapajjati. aadiyati, payoge dukka.ta.m; aadinne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1106: [03] bhikkhussa bhu~njantassa paaniiyena vaa vidhuupanena vaa upati.t.thantii  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. hatthapaase ti.t.thati, aapatti paacittiyassa;  hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa ti.t.thati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1107: [03] aamakadha~n~na.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1108: [03] uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa sa"nkaara.m vaa vighaasa.m vaa tiroku.t.te vaa  tiropaakaare vaa cha.d.dentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. cha.d.deti, payoge  dukka.ta.m; cha.d.dite aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1109: [03] uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa sa"nkaara.m vaa vighaasa.m vaa harite cha.d.dentii  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. cha.d.deti, payoge dukka.ta.m; cha.d.dite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1110: [03] nacca.m ^a^V0.0144^ea^ vaa giita.m vaa vaadita.m vaa dassanaaya gacchantii dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa; yattha .thitaa  passati vaa su.naati vaa, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1113: [03] 232^b^.^eb^ rattandhakaare appadiipe purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa  santi.t.thantii ^a^T0.0190^ea^ dve aapattiyo aapajjati. hatthapaase ti.t.thati, aapatti  paacittiyassa; hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa ti.t.thati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1114: [03] pa.ticchanne ^a^M0.0132^ea^ okaase purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa  santi.t.thantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. hatthapaase ti.t.thati, aapatti  paacittiyassa; hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa ti.t.thati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1115: [03] ajjhokaase ^a^P5.0075^ea^ purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa  santi.t.thantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. hatthapaase ti.t.thati, aapatti  paacittiyassa; hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa ti.t.thati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1116: [03] rathikaaya vaa byuuhe vaa si"nghaa.take vaa purisena saddhi.m ekenekaa  santi.t.thantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. hatthapaase ti.t.thati, aapatti  paacittiyassa; hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa ti.t.thati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1117: [03] purebhatta.m kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa aasane nisiiditvaa saamike  anaapucchaa pakkamantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m  anovassaka.m atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti,  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1118: [03] pacchaabhatta.m kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa saamike anaapucchaa aasane  nisiidantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. nisiidati, payoge dukka.ta.m;  nisinne aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1119: [03] vikaale ^a^T0.0191^ea^ kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa saamike anaapucchaa seyya.m  santharitvaa vaa santharaapetvaa vaa abhinisiidantii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. abhinisiidati, payoge dukka.ta.m; abhinisinne aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1120: [03] duggahitena ^a^V0.0145^ea^ duupadhaaritena para.m ujjhaapentii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. ujjhaapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; ujjhaapite aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1121: [03] attaana.m vaa para.m vaa nirayena vaa brahmacariyena vaa abhisapantii  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. abhisapati, payoge dukka.ta.m; abhisapite  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1122: [03] attaana.m vadhitvaa vadhitvaa rodantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  vadhati rodati, aapatti paacittiyassa; vadhati na rodati, aapatti  dukka.tassa.
text.1125: [03] 233^b^.^eb^ naggaa ^a^M0.0133^ea^ nahaayantii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. nahaayati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nahaanapariyosaane aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1126: [03] pamaa.naatikkanta.m udakasaa.tika.m kaaraapentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  kaaraapeti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kaaraapite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1127: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m visibbetvaa vaa visibbaapetvaa vaa neva ^a^T0.0192^ea^  sibbentii na sibbaapanaaya ussukka.m karontii eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  paacittiya.m.
text.1128: [03] pa~ncaahika.m sa"nghaa.ticaara.m atikkaamentii eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  paacittiya.m.  ciivarasa"nkamaniiya.m dhaarentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. dhaareti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; dhaarite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1129: [03] ga.nassa ciivaralaabha.m antaraaya.m karontii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  karoti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kate, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1130: [03] dhammika.m ^a^V0.0146^ea^ ciivaravibha"nga.m pa.tibaahantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  pa.tibaahati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tibaahite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1131: [03] agaarikassa vaa paribbaajakassa vaa paribbaajikaaya vaa  sama.naciivara.m dentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. deti, payoge dukka.ta.m;  dinne, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1132: [03] dubbalaciivarapaccaasaa ^a^P5.0076^ea^ ciivarakaalasamaya.m  atikkaamentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. atikkaameti, payoge dukka.ta.m;  atikkaamite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1133: [03] dhammika.m kathinuddhaara.m pa.tibaahantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  pa.tibaahati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tibaahite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1136: [03] 234^b^.^eb^ dve ^a^T0.0193^ea^ ^a^M0.0134^ea^ bhikkhuniyo ekama~nce  tuva.t.tentiyo dve aapattiyo aapajjanti. nipajjanti, payoge dukka.ta.m;  nipanne, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1137: [03] dve bhikkhuniyo ekatthara.napaavura.naa tuva.t.tentiyo dve aapattiyo  aapajjanti. nipajjanti, payoge dukka.ta.m; nipanne, aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1138: [03] bhikkhuniyaa sa~ncicca aphaasu.m karontii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  karoti, payoge dukka.ta.m; kate, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1139: [03] dukkhita.m sahajiivini.m neva upa.t.thentii na upa.t.thaapanaaya ussukka.m  karontii eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati. paacittiya.m.
text.1140: [03] bhikkhuniyaa upassaya.m datvaa kupitaa anattamanaa nikka.d.dhantii dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. nikka.d.dhati, payoge dukka.ta.m; nikka.d.dhite,  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1141: [03] sa.msa.t.thaa ^a^V0.0147^ea^ bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1142: [03] antora.t.the saasa"nkasammate sappa.tibhaye asatthikaa caarika.m carantii  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.tipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tipanne,  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1143: [03] tirora.t.the ^a^T0.0194^ea^ saasa"nkasammate sappa.tibhaye asatthikaa caarika.m carantii  dve aapattiyo aapajjati. pa.tipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tipanne,  aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1144: [03] antovassa.m caarika.m carantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  pa.tipajjati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pa.tipanne, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1145: [03] vassa.mvu.t.thaa bhikkhunii caarika.m na pakkamantii eka.m aapatti.m  aapajjati. paacittiya.m.
text.1148: [03] 235^b^.^eb^ raajaagaara.m ^a^M0.0135^ea^ vaa cittaagaara.m vaa  aaraama.m vaa uyyaana.m vaa pokkhara.ni.m vaa dassanaaya gacchantii dve  aapattiyo aapajjati. gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa; yattha .thitaa  passati, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1149: [03] aasandi.m vaa palla"nka.m vaa paribhu~njantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  paribhu~njati, payoge dukka.ta.m; paribhutte, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1150: [03] sutta.m kantantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. kantati, payoge  dukka.ta.m; ujjavujjave, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1151: [03] gihiveyyaavacca.m karontii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. karoti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; kate, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1152: [03] bhikkhuniyaa ^a^P5.0077^ea^ ^a^V0.0148^ea^ -- ``ehaayye ima.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasamehii''ti vuccamaanaa -- ``saadhuu''ti ^a^T0.0195^ea^ pa.tissu.nitvaa neva  vuupasamentii na vuupasamaaya ussukka.m karontii eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati.  paacittiya.m.
text.1153: [03] agaarikassa vaa paribbaajakassa vaa paribbaajikaaya vaa sahatthaa  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa dentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. deti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; dinne, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1154: [03] aavasathaciivara.m anissajjitvaa paribhu~njantii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. paribhu~njati, payoge dukka.ta.m; paribhutte, aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1155: [03] aavasatha.m anissajjitvaa caarika.m pakkamantii dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m parikkhepa.m atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa;  dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1156: [03] tiracchaanavijja.m pariyaapu.nantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  pariyaapu.naati, payoge dukka.ta.m; pade pade aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1157: [03] tiracchaanavijja.m vaacentii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. vaaceti,  payoge dukka.ta.m; pade pade aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1160: [03] 236^b^.^eb^ jaana.m ^a^M0.0136^ea^ sabhikkhuka.m aaraama.m  anaapucchaa pavisantii dve aapattiyo ^a^T0.0196^ea^ aapajjati. pa.thama.m paada.m parikkhepa.m  atikkaameti, aapatti dukka.tassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1161: [03] bhikkhu.m akkosantii paribhaasantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  akkosati, payoge dukka.ta.m; akkosite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1162: [03] ca.n.diikataa ^a^V0.0149^ea^ ga.na.m paribhaasantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  paribhaasati, payoge dukka.ta.m; paribhaasite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1163: [03] nimantitaa vaa pavaaritaa vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa  bhu~njantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. ``khaadissaami bhu~njissaamii''ti  pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti  paacittiyassa.
text.1164: [03] kula.m maccharaayantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. maccharaayati,  payoge dukka.ta.m; maccharite, aapatti paacittiyassa.
text.1165: [03] abhikkhuke aavaase vassa.m vasantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  ``vassa.m vasissaamii''ti senaasana.m pa~n~napeti paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m  upa.t.thapeti parive.na.m sammajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa; saha aru.nuggamanaa  aapatti paacittiyassa.

text.1226: [03] 241^b^.^eb^ avassutaa ^a^P5.0080^ea^ ^a^V0.0155^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo  catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti? avassutaaya bhikkhuniyaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo  catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa siilavipatti.m, siyaa  aacaaravipatti.m...pe0....

text.1230: [03] 242^b^.^eb^ avassutaa ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ^a^V0.0156^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m ^a^T0.0204^ea^ saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa?  avassutaaya bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m  saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m tiihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena...pe0....
text.1231: [03] dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa aapattiyo sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? dadhi.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa aapattiyo sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m dviihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena.
text.1234: [03] 243^b^.^eb^ avassutaaya ^a^V0.0157^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa  purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? avassutaaya  bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa  aapattiyo channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti --  kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato...pe0....
text.1235: [03] dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa aapattiyo channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m  katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa ^a^T0.0205^ea^ bhu~njantiyaa  aapattiyo channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti --  siyaa kaayato samu.t.thanti, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca samu.t.thanti, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti.
text.1238: [03] 244^b^.^eb^ avassutaa ^a^M0.0143^ea^ ^a^V0.0158^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo  catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? avassutaaya bhikkhuniyaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo  catunna.m adhikara.naana.m -- aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0....
