text.1242: [03] 245^b^.^eb^ avassutaaya ^a^V0.0159^ea^ bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa  purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo sattanna.m samathaana.m  katihi samathehi sammanti? avassutaaya bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa  purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantiyaa aapattiyo sattanna.m samathaana.m  tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena  ca...pe0....
text.1243: [03] dadhi.m ^a^T0.0206^ea^ ^a^P5.0081^ea^ vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantiyaa aapattiyo  sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa  bhu~njantiyaa aapattiyo sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti --  siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1246: [03] 246^b^.^eb^ avassutaa ^a^V0.0160^ea^ bhikkhunii avassutassa  purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantii kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  avassutaa bhikkhunii avassutassa purisapuggalassa ^a^M0.0144^ea^  kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantii tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. adhakkhaka.m  ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa; ubbhakkhaka.m  adhojaa.numa.n.dala.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddha.m  gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti dukka.tassa -- avassutaa bhikkhunii  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyantii imaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1247: [03] taa ^a^V0.0161^ea^ aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti?  taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m tiihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa ^a^T0.0207^ea^ paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m.  sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena  ca...pe0....
text.1248: [03] dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantii kati aapattiyo aapajjati? dadhi.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantii dve aapattiyo aapajjati. bhu~njissaamiiti  pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti  paa.tidesaniiyassa -- dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njantii imaa dve aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.1249: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti?  taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajanti --  aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m dviihi aapattikkhandhehi  sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thanti na vaacato na cittato, siyaa  kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thanti na cittato, siyaa ^a^M0.0145^ea^  kaayato ^a^T0.0208^ea^ ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti na vaacato, siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m --  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1253: [03] 247^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^V0.0162^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyanapaccayaa paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta.m?  ka.m aarabbha? kismi.m vatthusmi.m...pe0... kenaabhatanti?
text.1254: [03] ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena  kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyanapaccayaa paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa  avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m.  atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa  pa~n~natti. anupa~n~natti anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi.  sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti.  saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? asaadhaara.napa~n~natti.  ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ekatopa~n~natti. catunna.m  paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m  nidaanapariyaapanna.m? katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? dutiyena  uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti?  siilavipatti. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti ^a^T0.0209^ea^?  paaraajikaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato...pe0... kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m --
text.1255: [21] upaali ^a^M0.0146^ea^ daasako ceva, so.nako  siggavo tathaa.
text.1259: [03] vajjappa.ticchaadanapaccayaa ^a^P5.0082^ea^ paaraajika.m kattha  pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodesi na  ga.nassa aarocesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1260: [03] yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa paaraajika.m  kattha pa~n~nattanti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii  samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitta.m ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m anuvatti,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1261: [03] a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuura.napaccayaa paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo a.t.thama.m  vatthu.m paripuuresu.m, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^T0.0210^ea^ ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1264: [03] 248^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena ussayavaadikaaya bhikkhuniyaa a.d.da.m kara.napaccayaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~natto? ka.m aarabbha? kismi.m  vatthusmi.m...pe0... kenaabhatanti?
text.1265: [03] ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena  ussayavaadikaaya bhikkhuniyaa a.d.da.m kara.napaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti ^a^M0.0147^ea^? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati ^a^V0.0164^ea^?  thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa  bhikkhunii ussayavaadikaa vihari, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. atthi tattha  pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti.  anupa~n~natti anuppannapa~n~natti tasmi.m natthi. sabbatthapa~n~natti,  padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti. saadhaara.napa~n~natti,  asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? asaadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti,  ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ekatopa~n~natti. catunna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m  katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m nidaanapariyaapanna.m.  katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? tatiyena uddesena uddesa.m  aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti? siilavipatti.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti?  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? dviihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa  kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0... kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m --
text.1266: [21] upaali daasako ceva, so.nako siggavo tathaa.
text.1270: [03] cori.m ^a^T0.0211^ea^ vu.t.thaapanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii cori.m vu.t.thaapesi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m dviihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1271: [03] ekaa gaamantara.m gamanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii ekaa gaamantara.m gacchi,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, tisso anupa~n~nattiyo. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.1272: [03] samaggena ^a^M0.0148^ea^ sa"nghena ukkhitta.m bhikkhuni.m dhammena  vinayena satthusaasanena anapaloketvaa kaarakasa"ngha.m ^a^V0.0165^ea^ ana~n~naaya ga.nassa  chanda.m osaara.napaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitta.m  bhikkhuni.m ^a^T0.0212^ea^ dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena anapaloketvaa kaarakasa"ngha.m  ana~n~naaya ga.nassa chanda.m osaaresi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1273: [03] avassutaaya bhikkhuniyaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njanapaccayaa  sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m  aarabbhaati? sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti?  sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa  hatthato aamisa.m pa.tiggahesi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  pa.thamapaaraajike...pe0....
text.1274: [03] ``ki.m te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vaa  anavassuto vaa, yato tva.m anavassutaa! i"ngha, ayye, ya.m te eso  purisapuggalo deti khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ta.m tva.m sahatthaa  pa.tiggahetvaa khaada vaa bhu~nja vaa''ti uyyojanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso  kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? a~n~natara.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii --  ``ki.m te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vaa  anavassuto vaa, yato tva.m anavassutaa! i"ngha, ayye, ya.m te eso  purisapuggalo deti khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ta.m tva.m sahatthaa  pa.tiggahetvaa khaada vaa bhu~nja vaa''ti uyyojesi, tasmi.m ^a^T0.0213^ea^ vatthusmi.m.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.1275: [03] kupitaaya anattamanaaya bhikkhuniyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya  na pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii kupitaa anattamanaa eva.m avaca  -- ``buddha.m paccaacikkhaami, dhamma.m paccaacikkhaami, sa"ngha.m  paccaacikkhaami, sikkha.m paccaacikkhaamii''ti, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m ^a^M0.0149^ea^.  ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1276: [03] kismi~ncideva ^a^V0.0166^ea^ adhikara.ne paccaakataaya bhikkhuniyaa yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha  pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? ca.n.dakaa.li.m  bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? ca.n.dakaa.lii bhikkhunii  kismi~ncideva adhikara.ne paccaakataa kupitaa anattamanaa eva.m avaca --  ``chandagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,  mohagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagaaminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo''ti,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1277: [03] sa.msa.t.thaana.m bhikkhuniina.m yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa ^a^T0.0214^ea^ sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo aarabbha.  kismi.m vatthusminti? sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo sa.msa.t.thaa vihari.msu,  tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena  samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1278: [03] ``sa.msa.t.thaa ^a^P5.0083^ea^, ayye, tumhe viharatha. maa tumhe  naanaa viharitthaa''ti uyyojentiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa sa"nghaadiseso kattha pa~n~nattoti? saavatthiya.m  pa~n~natto. ka.m aarabbhaati? thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m aarabbha. kismi.m  vatthusminti? thullanandaa bhikkhunii -- ``sa.msa.t.thaava ayye, tumhe  viharatha. maa tamhe naanaa viharitthaa''ti uyyojesi, tasmi.m  vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....
text.1279: [03] dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanapaccayaa paa.tidesaniiya.m kattha pa~n~nattanti?  saavatthiya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo  aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuniyo dadhi.m  vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~nji.msu, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. ekaa pa~n~natti, ekaa  anupa~n~natti. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati...pe0... ^a^T0.0215^ea^.
text.1283: [03] 249^b^.^eb^ kaayasa.msagga.m ^a^M0.0150^ea^ ^a^V0.0167^ea^ saadiyanapaccayaa  kati aapattiyo aapajjati? kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyanapaccayaa pa~nca  aapattiyo aapajjati. avassutaa bhikkhunii avassutassa  purisapuggalassa adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti  paaraajikassa; bhikkhu kaayena kaaya.m aamasati, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa; kaayena kaayapa.tibaddha.m aamasati, aapatti  thullaccayassa; kaayapa.tibaddhena kaayapa.tibaddha.m aamasati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; a"ngulipatodake paacittiya.m -- kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyanapaccayaa  imaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1284: [03] vajjappa.ticchaadanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  vajjappa.ticchaadanapaccayaa catasso aapattiyo aapajjati. bhikkhunii  jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m {dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m (syaa0)} pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti paaraajikassa; vematikaa  pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti thullaccayassa; bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m  pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa; aacaaravipatti.m pa.ticchaadeti,  aapatti dukka.tassa -- vajjappa.ticchaadanapaccayaa imaa catasso aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.1285: [03] yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati. ukkhittaanuvattikaa  bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m ^a^T0.0216^ea^ samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjati, ~nattiyaa  dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  paaraajikassa; bhedakaanuvattikaa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya  na pa.tinissajjati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa  yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa ^a^V0.0168^ea^   -- yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa imaa pa~nca  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1286: [03] a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuura.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuura.napaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. purisena  -- ``itthannaama.m okaasa.m aagacchaa''ti vuttaa gacchati, aapatti  dukka.tassa; purisassa ^a^M0.0151^ea^ hatthapaasa.m okkantamatte aapatti  thullaccayassa; a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuureti, aapatti paaraajikassa -- a.t.thama.m  vatthu.m paripuura.napaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1289: [03] 250^b^.^eb^ ussayavaadikaa bhikkhunii a.d.da.m kara.napaccayaa  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ekassa aaroceti, aapatti dukka.tassa;  dutiyassa aaroceti, aapatti thullaccayassa; a.d.dapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1290: [03] cori.m vu.t.thaapanapaccayaa ^a^P5.0084^ea^ tisso aapattiyo  aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa;  kammavaacaapariyosaane ^a^T0.0217^ea^ aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1291: [03] ekaa gaamantara.m gamanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  gacchati, aapatti dukka.tassa; pa.thama.m paada.m parikkhepa.m atikkaameti,  aapatti thullaccayassa; dutiya.m paada.m atikkaameti, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1292: [03] samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitta.m bhikkhuni.m dhammena vinayena  satthusaasanena anapaloketvaa kaarakasa"ngha.m ana~n~naaya ga.nassa chanda.m  osaara.napaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi  kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1293: [03] avassutaa bhikkhunii avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa ^a^V0.0169^ea^ pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njanapaccayaa tisso  aapattiyo aapajjati. ``khaadissaami bhu~njissaamii''ti  pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti thullaccayassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa; udakadantapona.m pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa.
text.1294: [03] ``ki.m te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vaa  anavassuto vaa, yato tva.m anavassutaa! i"ngha, ayye, ya.m te eso  purisapuggalo ^a^M0.0152^ea^ deti khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa ta.m  tva.m sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa khaada vaa bhu~nja vaa''ti, uyyojanapaccayaa  tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. tassaa vacanena khaadissaami  bhu~njissaamiiti ^a^T0.0218^ea^ pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare  aapatti thullaccayassa; bhojanapariyosaane aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1295: [03] kupitaa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1296: [03] kismi~ncideva adhikara.ne paccaakataa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane  aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1297: [03] sa.msa.t.thaa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1298: [03] ``sa.msa.t.thaava, ayye, tumhe viharatha, maa tumhe naanaa  viharitthaa''ti uyyojentii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m;  dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa.
text.1301: [03] dadhi.m ^a^T0.0219^ea^ ^a^V0.0170^ea^ vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanapaccayaa dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhu~njissaamiiti pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa; ajjhohaare ajjhohaare  aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa -- dadhi.m vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanapaccayaa imaa dve  aapattiyo aapajjati.

text.1511: [03] 271^b^.^eb^ kati ^a^T0.0232^ea^ ^a^P5.0091^ea^ ^a^M0.0164^ea^ ^a^V0.0187^ea^   aapattiyo? kati aapattikkhandhaa? kati viniitavatthuuni? kati  agaaravaa? kati gaaravaa? kati viniitavatthuuni? kati vipattiyo?  kati aapattisamu.t.thaanaa? kati vivaadamuulaani? kati  anuvaadamuulaani? kati saara.niiyaa dhammaa? kati bhedakaravatthuuni?  kati adhikara.naani? kati samathaa?
text.1512: [03] pa~nca aapattiyo. pa~nca aapattikkhandhaa. pa~nca  viniitavatthuuni. satta aapattiyo. satta aapattikkhandhaa. satta  viniitavatthuuni. cha agaaravaa. cha gaaravaa. cha viniitavatthuuni.  catasso vipattiyo. cha aapattisamu.t.thaanaa. cha vivaadamuulaani. cha  anuvaadamuulaani. cha saara.niiyaa dhammaa. a.t.thaarasa bhedakaravatthuuni.  cattaari adhikara.naani. satta samathaa.
text.1513: [03] tattha katamaa pa~nca aapattiyo? paaraajikaapatti,  sa"nghaadisesaapatti, paacittiyaapatti, paa.tidesaniiyaapatti, dukka.taapatti --  imaa pa~nca aapattiyo.
text.1514: [03] tattha katame pa~nca aapattikkhandhaa? paaraajikaapattikkhandho,  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandho, paacittiyaapattikkhandho,  paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandho, dukka.taapattikkhandho -- ime pa~nca  aapattikkhandhaa.
text.1515: [03] tattha ^a^T0.0233^ea^ katamaani pa~nca viniitavatthuuni? pa~ncahi  aapattikkhandhehi aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii akiriyaa  akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato -- imaani pa~nca  viniitavatthuuni.
text.1516: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0188^ea^ katamaa satta aapattiyo? paaraajikaapatti,  sa"nghaadisesaapatti, thullaccayaapatti, paacittiyaapatti, paa.tidesaniiyaapatti,  dukka.taapatti, dubbhaasitaapatti -- imaa satta aapattiyo.
text.1517: [03] tattha katame satta aapattikkhandhaa? paaraajikaapattikkhandho,  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandho, thullaccayaapattikkhandho,  paacittiyaapattikkhandho, paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandho, dukka.taapattikkhandho,  dubbhaasitaapattikkhandho -- ime satta aapattikkhandhaa.
text.1518: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0165^ea^ katamaani satta viniitavatthuuni? sattahi  aapattikkhandhehi aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii akiriyaa  akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato -- imaani satta  viniitavatthuuni.
text.1519: [03] tattha ^a^P5.0092^ea^ katame cha agaaravaa? buddhe agaaravo,  dhamme agaaravo, sa"nghe agaaravo, sikkhaaya agaaravo, appamaade  agaaravo, pa.tisandhaare agaaravo -- ime cha agaaravaa.
text.1520: [03] tattha katame cha gaaravaa? buddhe gaaravo, dhamme gaaravo, sa"nghe  gaaravo, sikkhaaya gaaravo, appamaade gaaravo, pa.tisandhaare gaaravo --  ime cha gaaravaa.
text.1521: [03] tattha katamaani cha viniitavatthuuni? chahi agaaravehi aarati  virati pa.tivirati ^a^T0.0234^ea^ verama.nii akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti  velaaanatikkamo setughaato -- imaani cha viniitavatthuuni.
text.1522: [03] tattha katamaa catasso vipattiyo? siilavipatti,  aacaaravipatti, di.t.thivipatti, aajiivavipatti -- imaa catasso  vipattiyo.
text.1523: [03] tattha katame cha aapattisamu.t.thaanaa? atthaapatti kaayato  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; atthaapatti vaacato samu.t.thaati, na  kaayato na cittato; atthaapatti kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thaati, na  cittato; atthaapatti kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato;  atthaapatti vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; atthaapatti  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati -- ime cha  aapattisamu.t.thaanaa.
text.1524: [03] 272^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0189^ea^ {cuu.lava0 216; a0 ni0  6.36; ma0 ni0  3.44; dii0 ni0 3.325} katamaani cha vivaadamuulaani? idha  bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so bhikkhu kodhano hoti  upanaahii so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi  agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati  appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so bhikkhu  satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme...pe0...  sa"nghe...pe0... sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti.  yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa  anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe  vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa ^a^T0.0235^ea^ bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe  ^a^M0.0166^ea^ tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha.  evaruupa.m ce tumhe vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na  samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m  anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa  pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m  anavassavo hoti.
text.1525: [03] {cuu.lava0 216} puna capara.m bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii...pe0... issukii  hoti maccharii, sa.tho hoti maayaavii, paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thi,  sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yo so  bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii so  sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati  appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na  paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati  appatisso dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii,  so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti. yo so hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya  bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya  devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa  samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa ^a^T0.0236^ea^ pahaanaaya  vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce tumhe vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa  na samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m  anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa  pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m  anavassavo hoti. imaani cha vivaadamuulaani.
text.1526: [03] 273^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 217} tattha katamaani cha anuvaadamuulaani? idha  bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so bhikkhu kodhano hoti  upanaahii so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi  agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati  appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so bhikkhu  satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe ^a^V0.0190^ea^ ...pe0...  sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii so sa"nghe anuvaada.m janeti. yo hoti  anuvaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya  ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ^a^M0.0167^ea^ ce tumhe  anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe  tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce  tumhe anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha tatra  tumhe tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya  pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti.  evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.
text.1527: [03] puna capara.m bhikkhu makkhii hoti palaasii...pe0... issukii  hoti maccharii, sa.tho hoti maayaavii, paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thi,  sandi.t.thiparaamaasii ^a^T0.0237^ea^ hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yo so  bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii so  sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati  appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na  paripuurakaarii hoti. yo bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati  appatisso dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii  so sa"nghe anuvaada.m janeti. yoe hoti anuvaado bahujanaahitaaya  bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya  devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa  samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa pahaanaaya  vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce tumhe anuvaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa  na samanupasseyyaatha tatra tumhe tasseva paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa  aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa  anuvaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa anuvaadamuulassa  aayati.m anavassavo hoti. imaani cha anuvaadamuulaani.
text.1528: [03] 274^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.324; a0 ni0  6.11} tattha katame cha saara.niiyaa dhammaa? idha  bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva  raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya  avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1529: [03] puna capara.m bhikkhuno metta.m ^a^T0.0238^ea^ vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti  sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo  piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.1530: [03] puna ^a^M0.0168^ea^ ^a^V0.0191^ea^ capara.m bhikkhuno metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m  hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo  piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.1531: [03] puna capara.m bhikkhu ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso  pattapariyaapannamattampi tathaaruupehi laabhehi appa.tivibhattabhogii hoti  siilavantehi sabrahmacaariihi saadhaara.nabhogii. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo  piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya  sa.mvattati.
text.1532: [03] puna capara.m bhikkhu yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani  acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nupasatthaani  aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani ^a^P5.0093^ea^, tathaaruupesu  siilesu siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca.  ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya  avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1533: [03] puna capara.m bhikkhu yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati  takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato  viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo  saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa  ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati. ime cha saara.niiyaa dhammaa.
text.1534: [03] 275^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0239^ea^ katamaani a.t.thaarasa bhedakaravatthuuni? idha  bhikkhu adhamma.m ``dhammo''ti diipeti, dhamma.m ``adhammo''ti diipeti,  avinaya.m ``vinayo''ti diipeti, vinaya.m ``avinayo''ti diipeti,  abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena ``bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaa''ti  diipeti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena ``abhaasita.m alapita.m  tathaagatenaa''ti diipeti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena ``aaci.n.na.m  tathaagatenaa''ti diipeti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena ``anaaci.n.na.m  tathaagatenaa''ti diipeti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena ``pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaa''ti  diipeti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena ``apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaa''ti diipeti,  aapatti.m ``anaapattii''ti diipeti, anaapatti.m ``aapattii''ti diipeti,  lahuka.m aapatti.m ``garukaa aapattii''ti diipeti, garuka.m aapatti.m  ``lahukaa aapattii''ti diipeti, saavasesa.m aapatti.m ``anavasesaa  aapattii''ti ^a^V0.0192^ea^ diipeti, anavasesa.m aapatti.m ``saavasesaa aapattii''ti  ^a^M0.0169^ea^ diipeti, du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m ``adu.t.thullaa aapattii''ti  diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m ``du.t.thullaa aapattii''ti diipeti. imaani  a.t.thaarasa bhedakaravatthuuni.
text.1535: [03] {cuu.lava0 215; pari0 340} tattha katamaani cattaari adhikara.naani? vivaadaadhikara.na.m,  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m, kiccaadhikara.na.m -- imaani cattaari  adhikara.naani.
text.1536: [03] tattha katame satta samathaa? sammukhaavinayo, sativinayo,  amuu.lhavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, yebhuyyasikaa, tassapaapiyasikaa,  ti.navatthaarako ^a^T0.0240^ea^ -- ime satta samathaa.
text.1543: [22] satteva samathaa vuttaa, padaa sattarasaa imeti..
text.1545: [03] 276^b^.^eb^ pa.thamena ^a^T0.0241^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanena paaraajika.m  aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m. sa"nghaadisesa.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m. thullaccaya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m.  paacittiya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. paa.tidesaniiya.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. dukka.ta.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati  vattabba.m. dubbhaasita.m aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m.
text.1546: [03] dutiyena aapattisamu.t.thaanena paaraajika.m aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti  vattabba.m. sa"nghaadisesa.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. thullaccaya.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. paacittiya.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m. paa.tidesaniiya.m aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m.  dukka.ta.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. dubbhaasita.m aapajjeyyaati?  na hiiti vattabba.m.
text.1547: [03] tatiyena ^a^M0.0170^ea^ ^a^V0.0193^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanena paaraajika.m  aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m. sa"nghaadisesa.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m. thullaccaya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m.  paacittiya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. paa.tidesaniiya.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. dukka.ta.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati  vattabba.m. dubbhaasita.m aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m.
text.1548: [03] catutthe ^a^T0.0242^ea^ ^a^P5.0094^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanena paaraajika.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. sa"nghaadisesa.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m. thullaccaya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m.  paacittiya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. paa.tidesaniiya.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. dukka.ta.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati  vattabba.m. dubbhaasita.m aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m.
text.1549: [03] pa~ncamena aapattisamu.t.thaanena paaraajika.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati  vattabba.m. sa"nghaadisesa.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. thullaccaya.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. paacittiya.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m. paa.tidesaniiya.m aapajjeyyaati? na hiiti vattabba.m.  dukka.ta.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. dubbhaasita.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m.
text.1550: [03] cha.t.thena aapattisamu.t.thaanena paaraajika.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati  vattabba.m. sa"nghaadisesa.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. thullaccaya.m  aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. paacittiya.m aapajjeyyaati?  siyaati vattabba.m. paa.tidesaniiya.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m.  dukka.ta.m aapajjeyyaati? siyaati vattabba.m. dubbhaasita.m aapajjeyyaati?  na hiiti vattabba.m.
text.1553: [03] 277^b^.^eb^ pa.thamena aapattisamu.t.thaanena kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? pa.thamena ^a^T0.0243^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanena pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhikkhu kappiyasa~n~nii sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m karoti adesitavatthuka.m  pamaa.naatikkanta.m saarambha.m aparikkamana.m, payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m  anaagate aapatti ^a^M0.0171^ea^ thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate  aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; bhikkhu kappiyasa~n~nii vikaale bhojana.m  bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa; bhikkhu kappiyasa~n~nii a~n~naatikaaya ^a^V0.0194^ea^   bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaaya hatthato khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa  sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa -- pa.thamena  aapattisamu.t.thaanena imaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1554: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti?  taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m pa~ncahi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato samu.t.thanti,  na vaacato na cittato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0244^ea^.  sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1555: [03] 278^b^.^eb^ dutiyena aapattisamu.t.thaanena kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? dutiyena aapattisamu.t.thaanena catasso aapattiyo aapajjati  -- bhikkhu kappiyasa~n~nii samaadisati ^a^P5.0095^ea^ -- ``ku.ti.m  me karothaa''ti. tassa ku.ti.m karonti adesitavatthuka.m pamaa.naatikkanta.m  saarambha.m aparikkamana.m. payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m anaagate aapatti  thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa. bhikkhu  kappiyasa~n~nii anupasampanna.m padaso dhamma.m vaaceti, aapatti paacittiyassa  -- dutiyena aapattisamu.t.thaanena imaa catasso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1556: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m ^a^M0.0172^ea^  catuuhi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- vaacato samu.t.thanti,  na kaayato na cittato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m.  sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ^a^T0.0245^ea^  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1557: [03] 279^b^.^eb^ tatiyena ^a^V0.0195^ea^ aapattisamu.t.thaanena kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? tatiyena aapattisamu.t.thaanena pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhikkhu kappiyasa~n~nii sa.mvidahitvaa ku.ti.m karoti adesitavatthuka.m  pamaa.naatikkanta.m saarambha.m aparikkamana.m. payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m  anaagate aapatti thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa. bhikkhu kappiyasa~n~nii pa.niitabhojanaani attano  atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. bhikkhu  kappiyasa~n~nii bhikkhuniyaa vosaasantiyaa na nivaaretvaa bhu~njati,  aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa -- tatiyena aapattisamu.t.thaanena imaa pa~nca  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1558: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m pa~ncahi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca vaacato  ca samu.t.thanti, na cittato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0246^ea^.  sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1559: [03] 280^b^.^eb^ catutthena aapattisamu.t.thaanena kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? catutthena aapattisamu.t.thaanena cha aapattiyo aapajjati --  bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti paaraajikassa; bhikkhu  akappiyasa~n~nii sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m karoti ^a^P5.0096^ea^  adesitavatthuka.m pamaa.naatikkanta.m saarambha.m aparikkamana.m, payoge ^a^M0.0173^ea^  dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m anaagate aapatti thullaccayassa; tasmi.m  pi.n.de aagate aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa. bhikkhu akappiyasa~n~nii  vikaale bhojana.m bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. bhikkhu  akappiyasa~n~nii a~n~naatikaaya bhikkhuniyaa antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaaya hatthato  khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa sahatthaa pa.tiggahetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti  paa.tidesaniiyassa. catutthena aapattisamu.t.thaanena imaa cha aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.1560: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m ^a^V0.0196^ea^, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m chahi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena ^a^T0.0247^ea^, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1561: [03] 281^b^.^eb^ pa~ncamena aapattisamu.t.thaanena kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? pa~ncamena aapattisamu.t.thaanena cha aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhikkhu paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m  ullapati, aapatti paaraajikassa; bhikkhu akappiyasa~n~nii samaadisati  -- ``ku.ti.m me karothaa''ti. tassa ku.ti.m karonti adesitavatthuka.m  pamaa.naatikkanta.m saarambha.m aparikkamana.m. payoge dukka.ta.m; eka.m pi.n.da.m  anaagate aapatti thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa. bhikkhu akappiyasa~n~nii anupasampanna.m padaso dhamma.m  vaaceti, aapatti paacittiyassa. na khu.msetukaamo na vambhetukaamo na  ma"nkukattukaamo davakamyataa hiinena hiina.m vadeti, aapatti dubbhaasitassa  -- pa~ncamena aapattisamu.t.thaanena imaa cha aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1562: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m ^a^M0.0174^ea^ dve vipattiyo bhajanti --  siyaa siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  chahi aapattikkhandhehi ^a^T0.0248^ea^ sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dubbhaasitaapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1563: [03] 282^b^.^eb^ cha.t.thena aapattisamu.t.thaanena kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? cha.t.thena aapattisamu.t.thaanena cha aapattiyo aapajjati --  bhikkhu sa.mvidahitvaa bha.n.da.m avaharati, aapatti ^a^V0.0197^ea^ paaraajikassa ^a^P5.0097^ea^;  bhikkhu akappiyasa~n~nii sa.mvidahitvaa ku.ti.m karoti  adesitavatthuka.m pamaa.naatikkanta.m saarambha.m aparikkamana.m, payoge dukka.ta.m;  eka.m pi.n.da.m anaagate aapatti thullaccayassa; tasmi.m pi.n.de aagate,  aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa. bhikkhu akappiyasa~n~nii pa.niitabhojanaani  attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti paacittiyassa. bhikkhu  akappiyasa~n~nii bhikkhuniyaa vosaasantiyaa na nivaaretvaa bhu~njati,  aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa -- cha.t.thena aapattisamu.t.thaanena imaa cha  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1564: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa ^a^T0.0249^ea^? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi aapattisamu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi  sammanti? taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti --  siyaa siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  chahi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m ^a^M0.0175^ea^ samathaana.m  tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena caati.
text.1619: [03] 284^b^.^eb^ siilavipattipaccayaa ^a^M0.0177^ea^ kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? siilavipattipaccayaa catasso ^a^V0.0200^ea^ aapattiyo  aapajjati -- bhikkhunii jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti  paaraajikassa; vematikaa pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti thullaccayassa; bhikkhu  sa"nghaadisesa.m pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa; attano du.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti dukka.tassa -- siilavipattipaccayaa imaa  catasso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1620: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m catuuhi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1621: [03] 285^b^.^eb^ aacaaravipattipaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  aacaaravipattipaccayaa ^a^T0.0253^ea^ eka.m aapatti.m aapajjati. aacaaravipatti.m  pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti dukka.tassa -- aacaaravipattipaccayaa ima.m eka.m  aapatti.m aapajjati.
text.1622: [03] saa aapatti catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajati ...pe0...  sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati? saa aapatti catunna.m  vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajati -- aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m ekena aapattikkhandhena sa"ngahitaa --  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi  sammati -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1623: [03] 286^b^.^eb^ di.t.thivipattipaccayaa ^a^M0.0178^ea^ kati  aapattiyo aapajjati? di.t.thivipattipaccayaa dve aapattiyo aapajjati.  paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjati,  ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m {~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m, dviihi kammavaacaahi dukka.taa (syaa0 ka0)}; kammavaacaapariyosaane  aapatti paacittiyassa --  di.t.thivipattipaccayaa imaa dve aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1624: [03] taa ^a^V0.0201^ea^ aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajanti -- aacaaravipatti.m.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m dviihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa ^a^P5.0099^ea^  -- siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena ^a^T0.0254^ea^, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena.  channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m,  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1625: [03] 287^b^.^eb^ aajiivavipattipaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  aajiivavipattipaccayaa cha aapattiyo aapajjati -- aajiivahetu  aajiivakaara.naa paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m  ullapati, aapatti paaraajikassa; aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa sa~ncaritta.m  samaapajjati, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa  ``yo te vihaare vasati, so bhikkhu arahaa''ti bha.nati,  pa.tivijaanantassa aapatti thullaccayassa; aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa  bhikkhu pa.niitabhojanaani attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti  paacittiyassa; aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa bhikkhunii pa.niitabhojanaani  attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti paa.tidesaniiyassa;  aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa suupa.m vaa odana.m vaa agilaano attano  atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati, aapatti dukka.tassa --  aajiivavipattipaccayaa imaa cha aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1626: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti. taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve ^a^M0.0179^ea^ vipattiyo ^a^T0.0255^ea^ bhajanti --  siyaa siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  chahi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paa.tidesaniiyaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thanti, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa  vaacato samu.t.thanti, na kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato  ca samu.t.thanti, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti,  na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato;  siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi ^a^V0.0202^ea^ samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1629: [03] 288^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa dve aapattiyo aapajjati --  upasampanna.m omasati, aapatti paacittiyassa; anupasampanna.m omasati,  aapatti dukka.tassa -- vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa dve aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.1630: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m ^a^T0.0256^ea^ vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajanti -- aacaaravipatti.m.  sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m dviihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa  paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; ^a^P5.0100^ea^ siyaa vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ^a^M0.0180^ea^ ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m,  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1631: [03] 289^b^.^eb^ anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhikkhu.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.mseti, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa; amuulakena sa"nghaadisesena anuddha.mseti, aapatti  paacittiyassa; amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa anuddha.mseti, aapatti  dukka.tassa -- anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1632: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m tiihi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena,  siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena ^a^T0.0257^ea^ ^a^V0.0203^ea^. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m  tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1633: [03] 290^b^.^eb^ aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo  aapajjati? aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa catasso aapattiyo aapajjati.  bhikkhunii jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti paaraajikassa;  vematikaa pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti thullaccayassa; bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m  pa.ticchaadeti; aapatti paacittiyassa; aacaaravipatti.m pa.ticchaadeti,  aapatti dukka.tassa -- aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa catasso aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.1634: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m ^a^M0.0181^ea^  aapattikkhandhaana.m catuuhi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa  paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena ^a^T0.0258^ea^ samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m.  sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1635: [03] 291^b^.^eb^ kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.  ukkhittaanuvattikaa bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjati, ~nattiyaa dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa;  kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti paaraajikassa. bhedakaanuvattakaa bhikkhuu  yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanti, aapatti  sa"nghaadisesassa; paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjati, aapatti paacittiyassa ^a^P5.0101^ea^ --  kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.1636: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti...pe0... sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi ^a^V0.0204^ea^ samathehi sammanti? taa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa  siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m pa~ncahi  aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca vaacato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti ^a^T0.0259^ea^. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m.  sattanna.m samathaana.m tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena  ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1637: [03] .thapetvaa satta aapattiyo satta aapattikkhandhe, avasesaa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti? sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m  katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammanti?  .thapetvaa satta aapattiyo satta ^a^M0.0182^ea^ aapattikkhandhe avasesaa  aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m na katama.m vipatti.m bhajanti? sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m na katamena aapattikkhandhena sa"ngahitaa. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m na katamena aapattisamu.t.thaanena samu.t.thanti. catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m na katama.m adhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m na katamena  samathena sammanti. ta.m kissa hetu? .thapetvaa satta aapattiyo satta  aapattikkhandhe, nattha~n~naa aapattiyoti.
text.1645: [03] 292^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.nassa ^a^T0.0260^ea^ ^a^M0.0183^ea^ ^a^V0.0205^ea^ -- ki.m  pubba"ngama.m? kati .thaanaani? kati vatthuuni? kati bhuumiyo?  kati hetuu? kati muulaani? katihaakaarehi vivadati?  vivaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammati?
text.1646: [03] anuvaadaadhikara.nassa -- ki.m pubba"ngama.m? kati .thaanaani?  kati vatthuuni? kati bhuumiyo? kati hetuu? kati muulaani?  katihaakaarehi anuvadati? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi  sammati?
text.1647: [03] aapattaadhikara.nassa -- ki.m pubba"ngama.m? kati .thaanaani? kati  vatthuuni? kati bhuumiyo? kati hetuu? kati muulaani?  katihaakaarehi aapatti.m aapajjati? aapattaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi  sammati?
text.1648: [03] kiccaadhikara.nassa -- ki.m pubba"ngama.m? kati .thaanaani? kati  vatthuuni? kati bhuumiyo? kati hetuu? kati muulaani?  katihaakaarehi kicca.m jaayati? kiccaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi  sammati?
text.1649: [03] 293^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.nassa ^a^P5.0102^ea^ ki.m  pubba"ngamanti? lobho pubba"ngamo, doso pubba"ngamo, moho pubba"ngamo,  alobho pubba"ngamo, adoso pubba"ngamo, amoho pubba"ngamo. kati  .thaanaaniiti? a.t.thaarasa bhedakaravatthuuni .thaanaani. kati vatthuuniiti?  a.t.thaarasa bhedakaravatthuuni. kati bhuumiyoti? a.t.thaarasa bhedakaravatthuuni  bhuumiyo. kati hetuuti? nava hetuu -- tayo kusalahetuu ^a^V0.0206^ea^, tayo  akusalahetuu, tayo abyaakatahetuu. kati muulaaniiti? dvaadasa muulaani.  katihaakaarehi vivadatiiti? dviihaakaarehi vivadati -- dhammadi.t.thi  vaa adhammadi.t.thi vaa. {cuu.lava0 228} vivaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammatiiti?  vivaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0261^ea^ dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca  yebhuyyasikaaya ca.
text.1650: [03] 294^b^.^eb^ anuvaadaadhikara.nassa ki.m pubba"ngamanti? lobho  pubba"ngamo, doso pubba"ngamo, moho pubba"ngamo, alobho pubba"ngamo,  adoso pubba"ngamo, amoho pubba"ngamo. kati .thaanaaniiti? catasso  vipattiyo ^a^M0.0184^ea^ .thaanaani. kati vatthuuniiti? catasso  vipattiyo vatthuuni. kati bhuumiyoti? catasso vipattiyo bhuumiyo.  kati hetuuti? nava hetuu -- tayo kusalahetuu, tayo akusalahetuu,  tayo abyaakatahetuu. kati muulaaniiti? cuddasa muulaani.  katihaakaarehi anuvadatiiti? dviihaakaarehi anuvadati -- vatthuto vaa  aapattito vaa. {cuu.lava0 236} anuvaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammatiiti?  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m catuuhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca  sativinayena ca amuu.lhavinayena ca tassapaapiyasikaaya ca.
text.1651: [03] 295^b^.^eb^ aapattaadhikara.nassa ki.m pubba"ngamanti? lobho  pubba"ngamo, doso pubba"ngamo, moho pubba"ngamo, alobho pubba"ngamo,  adoso pubba"ngamo, amoho pubba"ngamo. kati .thaanaaniiti? satta  aapattikkhandhaa .thaanaani. kati vatthuuniiti? satta aapattikkhandhaa  vatthuuni. kati bhuumiyoti? satta aapattikkhandhaa bhuumiyo. kati  hetuuti? cha hetuu {kati hetuuti nava hetuu, tayo kusalahetuu (sii0 syaa0)} -- tayo  akusalahetuu, tayo abyaakatahetuu. kati  muulaaniiti? cha aapattisamu.t.thaanaani muulaani ^a^T0.0262^ea^. katihaakaarehi aapatti.m  aapajjatiiti? chahaakaarehi aapatti.m aapajjati -- alajjitaa,  a~n~naa.nataa, kukkuccapakatataa, akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaa, kappiye  akappiyasa~n~nitaa, satisammosaa. {cuu.lava0 239} aapattaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi  sammatiiti? aapattaadhikara.na.m tiihi samathehi sammati --  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1652: [03] 296^b^.^eb^ kiccaadhikara.nassa ki.m pubba"ngamanti? lobho  pubba"ngamo, doso pubba"ngamo, moho pubba"ngamo, alobho pubba"ngamo,  adoso pubba"ngamo, amoho pubba"ngamo. kati .thaanaaniiti? cattaari  kammaani .thaanaani. kati vatthuuniiti? cattaari kammaani vatthuuni.  kati bhuumiyoti? cattaari kammaani bhuumiyo. kati hetuuti? nava  hetuu -- tayo kusalahetuu, tayo akusalahetuu, tayo abyaakatahetuu.  kati muulaaniiti? eka.m muula.m -- sa"ngho. katihaakaarehi kicca.m  jaayatiiti ^a^V0.0207^ea^? dviihaakaarehi kicca.m jaayati -- ~nattito vaa apalokanato  vaa. {cuu.lava0 242} kiccaadhikara.na.m ^a^M0.0185^ea^ katihi samathehi sammatiiti?  kiccaadhikara.na.m ekena samathena sammati -- sammukhaavinayena.
text.1653: [03] kati ^a^P5.0103^ea^ samathaa? satta samathaa.  sammukhaavinayo, sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m,  yebhuyyasikaa, tassapaapiyasikaa, ti.navatthaarako -- ime satta samathaa.
text.1654: [03] siyaa ime satta samathaa dasa samathaa honti, dasa samathaa satta  samathaa honti vatthuvasena pariyaayena siyaati.
text.1655: [03] katha~nca siyaa? vivaadaadhikara.nassa dve samathaa ^a^T0.0263^ea^,  anuvaadaadhikara.nassa cattaaro samathaa, aapattaadhikara.nassa tayo samathaa,  kiccaadhikara.nassa eko samatho. eva.m ime satta samathaa dasa samathaa  honti, dasa samathaa satta samathaa honti vatthuvasena pariyaayena.
text.1658: [03] 297^b^.^eb^ kati samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa?  kati samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa asaadhaara.naa? kati samathaa  anuvaadaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa? kati samathaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa  asaadhaara.naa? kati samathaa aapattaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa? kati  samathaa aapattaadhikara.nassa asaadhaara.naa? kati samathaa  kiccaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa? kati samathaa kiccaadhikara.nassa  asaadhaara.naa?
text.1659: [03] dve samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa -- sammukhaavinayo,  yebhuyyasikaa. pa~nca samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa asaadhaara.naa --  sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, tassapaapiyasikaa,  ti.navatthaarako.
text.1660: [03] cattaaro samathaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa --  sammukhaavinayo; sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, tassapaapiyasikaa.  tayo samathaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa asaadhaara.naa -- yebhuyyasikaa,  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, ti.navatthaarako.
text.1661: [03] tayo ^a^M0.0186^ea^ ^a^V0.0208^ea^ samathaa aapattaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.naa --  sammukhaavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, ti.navatthaarako. cattaaro samathaa  aapattaadhikara.nassa asaadhaara.naa -- yebhuyyasikaa, sativinayo,  amuu.lhavinayo, tassapaapiyasikaa ^a^T0.0264^ea^.
text.1662: [03] eko samatho kiccaadhikara.nassa saadhaara.no -- sammukhaavinayo.  cha samathaa kiccaadhikara.nassa asaadhaara.naa -- yebhuyyasikaa,  sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, tassapaapiyasikaa,  ti.navatthaarako.
text.1665: [03] 298^b^.^eb^ kati samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa?  kati samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa? kati samathaa  anuvaadaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa? kati samathaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa  a~n~nabhaagiyaa? kati samathaa aapattaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa? kati  samathaa aapattaadhikara.nassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa? kati samathaa  kiccaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa? kati samathaa kiccaadhikara.nassa  a~n~nabhaagiyaa?
text.1666: [03] dve ^a^P5.0104^ea^ samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa  -- sammukhaavinayo, yebhuyyasikaa. pa~nca samathaa vivaadaadhikara.nassa  a~n~nabhaagiyaa -- sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m,  tassapaapiyasikaa, ti.navatthaarako.
text.1667: [03] cattaaro samathaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa --  sammukhaavinayo, sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, tassapaapiyasikaa.  tayo samathaa anuvaadaadhikara.nassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa -- yebhuyyasikaa,  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, ti.navatthaarako.
text.1668: [03] tayo samathaa aapattaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyaa --  sammukhaavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, ti.navatthaarako. cattaaro samathaa  aapattaadhikara.nassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa -- yebhuyyasikaa, sativinayo,  amuu.lhavinayo, tassapaapiyasikaa.
text.1669: [03] eko ^a^T0.0265^ea^ ^a^M0.0187^ea^ ^a^V0.0209^ea^ samatho kiccaadhikara.nassa tabbhaagiyo --  sammukhaavinayo. cha samathaa kiccaadhikara.nassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa --  yebhuyyasikaa, sativinayo, amuu.lhavinayo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m,  tassapaapiyasikaa, ti.navatthaarako.
text.1672: [03] 299^b^.^eb^ samathaa samathassa saadhaara.naa, samathaa samathassa  asaadhaara.naa. siyaa samathaa samathassa saadhaara.naa, siyaa samathaa  samathassa asaadhaara.naa.
text.1673: [03] katha.m siyaa samathaa samathassa saadhaara.naa? katha.m siyaa samathaa  samathassa asaadhaara.naa? yebhuyyasikaa sammukhaavinayassa saadhaara.naa,  sativinayassa amuu.lhavinayassa pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya  ti.navatthaarakassa asaadhaara.naa.
text.1674: [03] sativinayo sammukhaavinayassa saadhaara.no, amuu.lhavinayassa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya  asaadhaara.no.
text.1675: [03] amuu.lhavinayo sammukhaavinayassa saadhaara.no, pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa  tassapaapiyasikaaya ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya sativinayassa  asaadhaara.no.
text.1676: [03] pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m sammukhaavinayassa saadhaara.na.m,  tassapaapiyasikaaya ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya sativinayassa  amuu.lhavinayassa asaadhaara.na.m.
text.1677: [03] tassapaapiyasikaa sammukhaavinayassa saadhaara.naa,  ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya sativinayassa amuu.lhavinayassa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa asaadhaara.naa.
text.1678: [03] ti.navatthaarako sammukhaavinayassa saadhaara.no, yebhuyyasikaaya  sativinayassa amuu.lhavinayassa ^a^V0.0210^ea^ pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya  asaadhaara.no ^a^M0.0188^ea^. eva.m ^a^T0.0266^ea^ siyaa samathaa samathassa  saadhaara.naa; eva.m siyaa samathaa samathassa asaadhaara.naa.
text.1681: [03] 300^b^.^eb^ samathaa samathassa tabbhaagiyaa, samathaa samathassa  a~n~nabhaagiyaa. siyaa samathaa samathassa tabbhaagiyaa, siyaa samathaa  samathassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa.
text.1682: [03] katha.m siyaa samathaa samathassa tabbhaagiyaa? katha.m siyaa samathaa  samathassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa? yebhuyyasikaa sammukhaavinayassa tabbhaagiyaa,  sativinayassa amuu.lhavinayassa pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya  ti.navatthaarakassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa.
text.1683: [03] sativinayo sammukhaavinayassa tabbhaagiyo, amuu.lhavinayassa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya  a~n~nabhaagiyo.
text.1684: [03] amuu.lhavinayo sammukhaavinayassa tabbhaagiyo,  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya  sativinayassa a~n~nabhaagiyo.
text.1685: [03] pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m sammukhaavinayassa tabbhaagiya.m,  tassapaapiyasikaaya ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya sativinayassa  amuu.lhavinayassa a~n~nabhaagiya.m.
text.1686: [03] tassapaapiyasikaa sammukhaavinayassa tabbhaagiyaa,  ti.navatthaarakassa yebhuyyasikaaya sativinayassa amuu.lhavinayassa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa.
text.1687: [03] ti.navatthaarako sammukhaavinayassa tabbhaagiyo, yebhuyyasikaaya  sativinayassa amuu.lhavinayassa pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa tassapaapiyasikaaya  a~n~nabhaagiyo. eva.m siyaa samathaa samathassa tabbhaagiyaa, eva.m siyaa ^a^T0.0267^ea^  samathaa samathassa a~n~nabhaagiyaa.
text.1690: [03] 301^b^.^eb^ samatho ^a^M0.0189^ea^ ^a^V0.0211^ea^ sammukhaavinayo,  sammukhaavinayo samatho? samatho yebhuyyasikaa, yebhuyyasikaa samatho?  samatho sativinayo ^a^P5.0105^ea^, sativinayo samatho?  samatho amuu.lhavinayo, amuu.lhavinayo samatho? samatho  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m samatho? samatho tassapaapiyasikaa,  tassapaapiyasikaa samatho? samatho ti.navatthaarako, ti.navatthaarako  samatho?
text.1691: [03] yebhuyyasikaa sativinayo amuu.lhavinayo pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m  tassapaapiyasikaa ti.navatthaarako -- ime samathaa samathaa, no  sammukhaavinayo. sammukhaavinayo samatho ceva sammukhaavinayo ca.
text.1692: [03] sativinayo amuu.lhavinayo pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m tassapaapiyasikaa  ti.navatthaarako sammukhaavinayo -- ime samathaa samathaa, no  yebhuyyasikaa. yebhuyyasikaa samatho ceva yebhuyyasikaa ca.
text.1693: [03] amuu.lhavinayo pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m tassapaapiyasikaa ti.navatthaarako  sammukhaavinayo yebhuyyasikaa -- ime samathaa samathaa, no sativinayo.  sativinayo samatho ceva sativinayo ca.
text.1694: [03] pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m tassapaapiyasikaa ti.navatthaarako  sammukhaavinayo yebhuyyasikaa sativinayo -- ime samathaa samathaa, no  amuu.lhavinayo. amuu.lhavinayo samatho ceva amuu.lhavinayo ca.
text.1695: [03] tassapaapiyasikaa ti.navatthaarako sammukhaavinayo yebhuyyasikaa  sativinayo amuu.lhavinayo -- ime samathaa samathaa, no  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m ^a^T0.0268^ea^ samatho ceva pa.ti~n~naatakara.na~nca.
text.1696: [03] ti.navatthaarako sammukhaavinayo yebhuyyasikaa sativinayo  amuu.lhavinayo pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m -- ime samathaa samathaa, no  tassapaapiyasikaa. tassapaapiyasikaa samatho ceva tassapaapiyasikaa  ca.
text.1697: [03] sammukhaavinayo ^a^V0.0212^ea^ yebhuyyasikaa sativinayo amuu.lhavinayo  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m tassapaapiyasikaa -- ime samathaa samathaa, no  ti.navatthaarako. ti.navatthaarako samatho ceva ti.navatthaarako ca.
text.1700: [03] 302^b^.^eb^ vinayo ^a^M0.0190^ea^ sammukhaavinayo,  sammukhaavinayo vinayo? vinayo yebhuyyasikaa, yebhuyyasikaa  vinayo? vinayo sativinayo, sativinayo vinayo? vinayo  amuu.lhavinayo, amuu.lhavinayo vinayo? vinayo pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m,  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m vinayo? vinayo tassapaapiyasikaa,  tassapaapiyasikaa vinayo? vinayo ti.navatthaarako, ti.navatthaarako  vinayo?
text.1701: [03] vinayo siyaa sammukhaavinayo siyaa na sammukhaavinayo.  sammukhaavinayo vinayo ceva sammukhaavinayo ca.
text.1702: [03] vinayo siyaa yebhuyyasikaa, siyaa na yebhuyyasikaa.  yebhuyyasikaa vinayo ceva yebhuyyasikaa ca.
text.1703: [03] vinayo siyaa sativinayo, siyaa na sativinayo.  sativinayo vinayo ceva sativinayo ca.
text.1704: [03] vinayo siyaa amuu.lhavinayo, siyaa na amuu.lhavinayo.  amuu.lhavinayo vinayo ceva amuu.lhavinayo ca ^a^T0.0269^ea^.
text.1705: [03] vinayo siyaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, siyaa na pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m.  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m vinayo ceva pa.ti~n~naatakara.na~nca.
text.1706: [03] vinayo ^a^V0.0213^ea^ siyaa tassapaapiyasikaa, siyaa na tassapaapiyasikaa.  tassapaapiyasikaa vinayo ceva tassapaapiyasikaa ca.
text.1707: [03] vinayo siyaa ti.navatthaarako, siyaa na ti.navatthaarako.  ti.navatthaarako vinayo ceva ti.navatthaarako ca.
text.1710: [03] 303^b^.^eb^ sammukhaavinayo kusalo akusalo abyaakato?  yebhuyyasikaa kusalaa akusalaa abyaakataa? sativinayo kusalo  akusalo abyaakato? amuu.lhavinayo kusalo akusalo ^a^M0.0191^ea^  abyaakato? pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m kusala.m akusala.m abyaakata.m?  tassapaapiyasikaa kusalaa akusalaa abyaakataa? ti.navatthaarako  kusalo akusalo abyaakato?
text.1711: [03] sammukhaavinayo siyaa kusalo, siyaa abyaakato. natthi  sammukhaavinayo akusalo.
text.1712: [03] yebhuyyasikaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa.
text.1713: [03] sativinayo siyaa kusalo, siyaa akusalo, siyaa abyaakato.

text.1725: [03] 304^b^.^eb^ yattha ^a^M0.0192^ea^ yebhuyyasikaa labbhati,  tattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati; yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, tattha  yebhuyyasikaa labbhati. na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha  amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati.
text.1726: [03] yattha sativinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati;  yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, tattha sativinayo labbhati. na tattha  amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na tattha  yebhuyyasikaa labbhati.
text.1727: [03] yattha amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati;  yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, tattha amuu.lhavinayo labbhati. na  tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na  tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na tattha  sativinayo labbhati.
text.1728: [03] yattha ^a^V0.0215^ea^ pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, tattha sammukhaavinayo ^a^T0.0271^ea^ labbhati;  yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati. na  tattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na  tattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha  amuu.lhavinayo labbhati.
text.1729: [03] yattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, tattha sammukhaavinayo  labbhati; yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, tattha tassapaapiyasikaa  labbhati. na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikaa  labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo  labbhati, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati.
text.1730: [03] yattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, tattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati;  yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati. na  tattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha  amuu.lhavinayo ^a^M0.0193^ea^ labbhati, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m  labbhati, na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati.
text.1731: [03] yattha yebhuyyasikaa tattha sammukhaavinayo; yattha sammukhaavinayo  tattha yebhuyyasikaa. na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo,  na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa, na tattha  ti.navatthaarako.
text.1732: [03] yattha sativinayo tattha sammukhaavinayo; yattha sammukhaavinayo  tattha sativinayo. na tattha amuu.lhavinayo, na tattha  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa, na tattha ti.navatthaarako,  na tattha yebhuyyasikaa. sammukhaavinaya.m ^a^T0.0272^ea^ kaatuna muula.m...pe0....
text.1733: [03] yattha ti.navatthaarako tattha sammukhaavinayo; yattha  sammukhaavinayo tattha ti.navatthaarako. na tattha yebhuyyasikaa, na  tattha sativinayo, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m,  na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa.
text.1737: [03] 305^b^.^eb^ yasmi.m ^a^V0.0216^ea^ samaye sammukhaavinayena ca  yebhuyyasikaaya ca adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, yattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati  tattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati tattha  yebhuyyasikaa labbhati. na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha  amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati.
text.1738: [03] yasmi.m ^a^P5.0107^ea^ samaye sammukhaavinayena ca  sativinayena ca adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, yattha sativinayo labbhati  tattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati tattha  sativinayo labbhati. na tattha amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, na tattha  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa ^a^M0.0194^ea^  labbhati, na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikaa  labbhati.
text.1739: [03] yasmi.m samaye sammukhaavinayena ca amuu.lhavinayena ca  adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, yattha amuu.lhavinayo labbhati tattha  sammukhaavinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati tattha  amuu.lhavinayo labbhati. na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na tattha ^a^T0.0273^ea^ ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na tattha  yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati.
text.1740: [03] yasmi.m samaye sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca  adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, yattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati tattha  sammukhaavinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati tattha  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati. na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati, na  tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na tattha  sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo labbhati.
text.1741: [03] yasmi.m samaye sammukhaavinayena ca tassapaapiyasikaaya ca  adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, yattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati tattha  sammukhaavinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati. na tattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati, na  tattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na ^a^V0.0217^ea^ tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha  amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati.
text.1742: [03] yasmi.m samaye sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca  adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, yattha ti.navatthaarako labbhati tattha  sammukhaavinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhaavinayo labbhati tattha  ti.navatthaarako labbhati. na tattha yebhuyyasikaa labbhati, na tattha  sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo labbhati, na tattha  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m labbhati, na tattha tassapaapiyasikaa labbhati.
text.1745: [03] 306^b^.^eb^ adhikara.nanti ^a^T0.0274^ea^ ^a^M0.0195^ea^ vaa  samathaati vaa ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa? labbhaa ca  panimesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa {vinibbhujjitvaa vinibbhujjitvaa  (ka0), .tiikaaya.m ekapadameva dissati} naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetunti?
text.1746: [03]adhikara.nanti vaa samathaati vaa ime dhammaa visa.msa.t.thaa, no  sa.msa.t.thaa. labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa  naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetunti. so -- ``maa heva''ntissa vacaniiyo.  adhikara.nanti vaa samathaati vaa ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa.  no ca labbhaa {na ca labbhaa (ka0)} imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa  naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? nanu vutta.m bhagavataa --  ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, adhikara.naani, satta samathaa. adhikara.naa  samathehi sammanti, samathaa adhikara.nehi sammanti. eva.m, ime dhammaa  sa.msa.t.thaa no visa.msa.t.thaa; no ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa  vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti.
text.1749: [03] 307^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammati?  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammati? aapattaadhikara.na.m katihi  samathehi sammati? kiccaadhikara.na.m katihi samathehi sammati?
text.1750: [03] {cuu.lava0 228, 236 aadayo} vivaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^V0.0218^ea^ dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena  ca yebhuyyasikaaya ca.
text.1751: [03] {cuu.lava0 228, 236 aadayo} anuvaadaadhikara.na.m catuuhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena  ca sativinayena ca amuu.lhavinayena ca tassapaapiyasikaaya ca.
text.1752: [03] {cuu.lava0 239, 242 aadayo} aapattaadhikara.na.m tiihi samathehi ^a^T0.0275^ea^ sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.1753: [03] {cuu.lava0 239, 242 aadayo} kiccaadhikara.na.m ekena samathena sammati -- sammukhaavinayena.
