text.2188: [03] 334^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  10.334; pari0 22} dasa ^a^T0.0357^ea^ ^a^M0.0253^ea^ atthavase pa.ticca  tathaagatena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya,  sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m  phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m  aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya,  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa vinayaanuggahaaya.
text.2189: [03] ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m sa"nghaphaasu. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m dumma"nkuuna.m  puggalaana.m niggahaaya. ya.m dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya ta.m pesalaana.m  bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya. ya.m pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya ta.m  di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya. ya.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m  sa.mvaraaya ta.m samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya. ya.m samparaayikaana.m  aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya ta.m appasannaana.m pasaadaaya. ya.m appasannaana.m  pasaadaaya ta.m pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya. ya.m pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya ta.m  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa. ya.m saddhamma.t.thitiyaa ta.m vinayaanuggahaaya.
text.2190: [03] ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m sa"nghaphaasu. ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m dumma"nkuuna.m  puggalaana.m niggahaaya. ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m  phaasuvihaaraaya. ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya.  ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya. ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu  ta.m ^a^T0.0358^ea^ appasannaana.m pasaadaaya. ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya.  ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m saddhamma.t.thitiyaa. ya.m sa"nghasu.t.thu ta.m vinayaanuggahaaya.
text.2191: [03] ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya. ya.m  sa"nghaphaasu ta.m pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya ^a^V0.0274^ea^. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m  di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m samparaayikaana.m  aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m appasannaana.m pasaadaaya. ya.m  sa"nghaphaasu ta.m pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu ta.m vinayaanuggahaaya. ya.m sa"nghaphaasu  ta.m sa"nghasu.t.thu.
text.2192: [03] ya.m dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya...pe0... ya.m pesalaana.m  bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya... ya.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya... ya.m  samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m ^a^M0.0254^ea^ pa.tighaataaya... ya.m  appasannaana.m pasaadaaya... ya.m pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya... ya.m  saddhamma.t.thitiyaa... ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m sa"nghasu.t.thu. ya.m  vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m sa"nghaphaasu. ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m dumma"nkuuna.m  puggalaana.m niggahaaya. ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m  phaasuvihaaraaya. ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m  sa.mvaraaya. ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya.  ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m appasannaana.m pasaadaaya. ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya  ta.m pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya. ya.m vinayaanuggahaaya ta.m ^a^T0.0359^ea^ saddhamma.t.thitiyaati.
text.2207: [22] aasiisamaanaruupova {aasi.msamaanaruupova (sii0 syaa0)}, kissa tva.m idha maagato..
text.2213: [22] taggha te ahamakkhissa.m, yathaasi kusalo tathaa..
text.2219: [27] i"ngha me tva.m byaakara na.m {i"ngha me ta.m byaakara (ka0)}.
text.2224: [21] kati ^a^T0.0361^ea^ vesaaliya.m pa~n~nattaa, kati raajagahe kataa.
text.2225: [22] saavatthiya.m kati honti, kati aa.laviya.m kataa..
text.2226: [21] kati kosambiya.m pa~n~nattaa, kati sakkesu vuccanti.
text.2227: [22] kati bhaggesu pa~n~nattaa, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.2228: [21] dasa ^a^M0.0256^ea^ vesaaliya.m pa~n~nattaa, ekaviisa  raajagahe kataa.
text.2230: [21] cha aa.laviya.m pa~n~nattaa, a.t.tha kosambiya.m kataa.
text.2231: [22] a.t.tha sakkesu vuccanti, tayo bhaggesu pa~n~nattaa..
text.2232: [21] ye vesaaliya.m pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m {yathaakatha.m (sii0 syaa0  evamuparipi)}.
text.2235: [22] bhikkhuniisu ca akkoso, dasete vesaaliya.m kataa..
text.2236: [21] ye raajagahe pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
text.2237: [22] adinnaadaana.m raajagahe, dve anuddha.msanaa dvepi ca bhedaa..
text.2238: [21] antaravaasaka.m ruupiya.m sutta.m, ujjhaapanena ca paacitapi.n.da.m ^a^T0.0362^ea^  ^a^P5.0145^ea^.
text.2239: [22] ga.nabhojana.m vikaale ca, caaritta.m nahaana.m uunaviisati..
text.2240: [21] ciivara.m datvaa vosaasanti, ete raajagahe kataa.
text.2242: [21] ye ^a^V0.0277^ea^ saavatthiya.m pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
text.2244: [21] aniyataa ca dve honti, nissaggiyaa catuviisati.
text.2246: [21] dasayeva ca gaarayhaa, dvesattati ca sekhiyaa.
text.2248: [21] ye aa.laviya.m pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
text.2250: [22] sappaa.naka~nca si~ncanti, cha ete aa.laviya.m kataa..
text.2251: [21] ye kosambiya.m pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
text.2252: [27] mahaavihaaro dovacassa.m, a~n~na.m dvaara.m suraaya ca.
text.2254: [21] ye ^a^M0.0257^ea^ sakkesu pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi  yathaatatha.m.
text.2255: [22] e.lakalomaani patto ca, ovaado ceva bhesajja.m..
text.2256: [21] suuci aara~n~niko ceva, a.t.thete {cha ete (sabbattha)} kaapilavatthave.
text.2258: [21] ye bhaggesu pa~n~nattaa, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m.
text.2261: [22] satta ca nissaggiyaani, a.t.tha dvatti.msa khuddakaa..
text.2262: [21] dve ^a^V0.0278^ea^ gaarayhaa tayo sekkhaa, chappa~n~naasa sikkhaapadaa.
text.2268: [21] ya.m ta.m {ya.m ya.m (ka0)} pucchimha akittayi no.
text.2275: [27] vibhattiyo ca {vipattiyo ca (sii0 syaa0)} yehi samathehi sammanti.
text.2279: [27] ye ^a^T0.0364^ea^ garukaa te du.t.thullaa, ye du.t.thullaa saa siilavipatti.
text.2287: [03] aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m  uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati, aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa sa~ncaritta.m  samaapajjati, aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa -- ``yo te vihaare vasati,  so bhikkhu arahaa''ti bha.nati, aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa bhikkhu  pa.niitabhojanaani attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati, aajiivahetu  aajiivakaara.naa bhikkhunii pa.niitabhojanaani attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa  bhu~njati, aajiivahetu aajiivakaara.naa suupa.m vaa odana.m vaa agilaano  attano atthaaya vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njati. aya.m saa aajiivavipatti  sammataa.
text.2290: [22] ari.t.tho ca.n.dakaa.lii ca, ime te yaavatatiyakaa..
text.2292: [03] 337^b^.^eb^ kati ^a^T0.0365^ea^ chedanakaani? kati bhedanakaani? kati  uddaalanakaani? kati ana~n~napaacittiyaani? kati bhikkhusammutiyo?  kati saamiiciyo? kati paramaani?
text.2294: [03] cha chedanakaani. eka.m bhedanaka.m. eka.m uddaalanaka.m. cattaari  ana~n~napaacittiyaani. catasso bhikkhusammutiyo. satta saamiiciyo.  cuddasa paramaani.
text.2295: [22] sodasa {so.lasa (sii0 syaa0) a.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa} jaananti pa~n~nattaa, buddhenaadiccabandhunaa..
text.2303: [22] sata.m ti.msaa ca bhikkhuniina.m, bhikkhuuhi asaadhaara.naa..
text.2313: [21] viisa.m dve sataani cime honti bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaapadaani.
text.2316: [22] uddesa.m aagacchanti uposathesu, te su.nohi yathaatatha.m..
text.2318: [22] nissaggiyaani ti.mseva, sata.m sa.t.thi cha ceva khuddakaani  pavuccanti..
text.2320: [27] tii.ni sataani cattaari cime honti bhikkhuniina.m  sikkhaapadaani.
text.2325: [22] nissaggiyaani ^a^T0.0367^ea^ dvaadasa, tehi te honti viisati..
text.2327: [22] chacattaariisaa cime honti, bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniihi  asaadhaara.naa..
text.2328: [21] sata.m ti.msaa ca bhikkhuniina.m, bhikkhuuhi asaadhaara.naa.
text.2333: [21] sata.m ti.msaa cime honti bhikkhuniina.m, bhikkhuuhi  asaadhaara.naa.
text.2340: [21] sata.m sattati chaccevime honti, ubhinna.m asaadhaara.naa.
text.2346: [21] sata.m sattati cattaari cime honti, ubhinna.m samasikkhataa.
text.2360: [22] dviihi catuuhi tiihi kicca.m ekena sammati..
text.2364: [27] cuto paraddho bha.t.tho ca, saddhammaa hi nira"nkato.
text.2365: [22] sa.mvaasopi tahi.m natthi, teneta.m iti vuccati..
text.2368: [22] maanatta.m deti abbheti, teneta.m iti vuccati..
text.2373: [27] ekassa ^a^T0.0369^ea^ muule yo deseti, yo ca ta.m pa.tiga.nhati.
text.2374: [22] accayo tena samo natthi, teneta.m iti vuccati..
text.2382: [27] bhikkhu a~n~naatako santo, kicchaa laddhaaya bhojana.m.
text.2384: [21] nimantanaasu bhu~njantaa chandaaya, vosaasati tattha  bhikkhuni.m.
text.2386: [21] saddhaacitta.m ^a^P5.0149^ea^ kula.m gantvaa, appabhoga.m  anaa.liya.m {anaa.lhiya.m (sii0 syaa0)}.
text.2388: [21] yo ce ara~n~ne viharanto, saasa"nke sabhayaanake.
text.2390: [21] bhikkhunii a~n~naatikaa santaa, ya.m paresa.m mamaayita.m.
text.2391: [27] sappi tela.m madhu.m phaa.nita.m, macchama.msa.m atho khiira.m.
text.2392: [22] dadhi.m saya.m ^a^T0.0370^ea^ vi~n~naapeyya bhikkhunii, gaarayhapattaa sugatassa  saasane..
text.2395: [21] ya.m manusso kare paapa.m, aavi vaa yadi vaa raho.
text.2399: [22] ya~nca vi~n~nuu garahanti, teneta.m iti vuccati..
text.2403: [22] sikkhaa etaadisii natthi, teneta.m iti vuccati..
text.2405: [22] tasmaa channa.m vivaretha, eva.m ta.m naativassati..
text.2406: [21] gati migaana.m pavana.m, aakaaso pakkhina.m gati.
text.2407: [22] vibhavo gati dhammaana.m, nibbaana.m arahato gatiiti..
text.2416: [03] 340^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 215; pari0 275} cattaari ^a^T0.0372^ea^ ^a^P5.0150^ea^ ^a^M0.0264^ea^ ^a^V0.0286^ea^   adhikara.naani. vivaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m,  kiccaadhikara.na.m -- imaani cattaari adhikara.naani.
text.2417: [03] imesa.m catunna.m adhikara.naana.m kati ukko.taa? imesa.m catunna.m  adhikara.naana.m dasa ukko.taa. vivaadaadhikara.nassa dve ukko.taa,  anuvaadaadhikara.nassa cattaaro ukko.taa, aapattaadhikara.nassa tayo ukko.taa,  kiccaadhikara.nassa eko ukko.to -- imesa.m catunna.m adhikara.naana.m ime  dasa ukko.taa.
text.2418: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m ukko.tento kati samathe ukko.teti?  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m ukko.tento kati samathe ukko.teti? aapattaadhikara.na.m  ukko.tento kati samathe ukko.teti? kiccaadhikara.na.m ukko.tento kati  samathe ukko.teti?
text.2419: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m ukko.tento dve samathe ukko.teti.  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m ukko.tento cattaaro samathe ukko.teti.  aapattaadhikara.na.m ukko.tento tayo samathe ukko.teti. kiccaadhikara.na.m  ukko.tento eka.m samatha.m ukko.teti.
text.2420: [03] 341^b^.^eb^ kati ukko.taa? katihaakaarehi ukko.tana.m  pasavati? katiha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo adhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0373^ea^ ukko.teti?  kati puggalaa adhikara.na.m ukko.tentaa aapatti.m aapajjanti?
text.2421: [03] dvaadasa ^a^V0.0287^ea^ ukko.taa. dasahaakaarehi ukko.tana.m pasavati. catuuha"ngehi  samannaagato puggalo adhikara.na.m ukko.teti. cattaaro puggalaa  adhikara.na.m ukko.tentaa aapatti.m aapajjanti?
text.2422: [03] katame dvaadasa ukko.taa? akata.m kamma.m, dukka.ta.m kamma.m, puna  kaatabba.m kamma.m, anihata.m, dunnihata.m, puna nihanitabba.m, avinicchita.m,  duvinicchita.m, puna vinicchitabba.m, avuupasanta.m, duvuupasanta.m, puna  vuupasametabbanti -- ime dvaadasa ukko.taa.
text.2423: [03] katamehi ^a^M0.0265^ea^ dasahaakaarehi ukko.tana.m pasavati?  tattha jaataka.m adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, tattha jaataka.m vuupasanta.m adhikara.na.m  ukko.teti, antaraamagge adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, antaraamagge vuupasanta.m  adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, tattha gata.m adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, tattha gata.m  vuupasanta.m adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, sativinaya.m ukko.teti, amuu.lhavinaya.m  ukko.teti, tassapaapiyasika.m ^a^P5.0151^ea^ ukko.teti,  ti.navatthaaraka.m ukko.teti -- imehi dasahaakaarehi ukko.tana.m pasavati.
text.2424: [03] katamehi catuuha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo adhikara.na.m ukko.teti?  chandaagati.m gacchanto adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, dosaagati.m gacchanto  adhikara.na.m ukko.teti, mohaagati.m gacchanto adhikara.na.m ukko.teti,  bhayaagati.m gacchanto adhikara.na.m ukko.teti -- imehi catuuha"ngehi  samannaagato puggalo adhikara.na.m ukko.teti.
text.2425: [03] katame cattaaro puggalaa adhikara.na.m ukko.tentaa aapatti.m aapajjanti?  tadahupasampanno ukko.teti ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m, aagantuko ukko.teti  ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m, kaarako ukko.teti ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m,  chandadaayako ukko.teti ukko.tanaka.m paacittiya.m -- ime cattaaro puggalaa  adhikara.na.m ukko.tentaa aapatti.m aapajjanti.
text.2427: [03] 342^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0374^ea^ ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m,  ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m  ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m?  aapattaadhikara.na.m ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m,  ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0288^ea^? kiccaadhikara.na.m ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m,  ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m?
text.2428: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m vivaadanidaana.m vivaadasamudaya.m vivaadajaatika.m  vivaadapabhava.m vivaadasambhaara.m vivaadasamu.t.thaana.m. anuvaadaadhikara.na.m  anuvaadanidaana.m anuvaadasamudaya.m anuvaadajaatika.m anuvaadapabhava.m  anuvaadasambhaara.m anuvaadasamu.t.thaana.m. aapattaadhikara.na.m aapattinidaana.m  aapattisamudaya.m aapattijaatika.m aapattipabhava.m aapattisambhaara.m  aapattisamu.t.thaana.m. kiccaadhikara.na.m kiccayanidaana.m kiccayasamudaya.m  kiccayajaatika.m kiccayapabhava.m kiccayasambhaara.m kiccayasamu.t.thaana.m.
text.2429: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^M0.0266^ea^ ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m,  ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m?  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m...pe0... aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0... kiccaadhikara.na.m  ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m?
text.2430: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m hetunidaana.m, hetusamudaya.m, hetujaatika.m, hetupabhava.m,  hetusambhaara.m, hetusamu.t.thaana.m. anuvaadaadhikara.na.m...pe0...  aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0... kiccaadhikara.na.m hetunidaana.m, hetusamudaya.m,  hetujaatika.m, hetupabhava.m, hetusambhaara.m, hetusamu.t.thaana.m.
text.2431: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m,  ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0375^ea^ ...pe0...  aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0... kiccaadhikara.na.m ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m,  ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m?
text.2432: [03] vivaadaadhikara.na.m paccayanidaana.m, paccayasamudaya.m, paccayajaatika.m,  paccayapabhava.m, paccayasambhaara.m, paccayasamu.t.thaana.m. anuvaadaadhikara.na.m...pe0...  aapattaadhikara.na.m...pe0... kiccaadhikara.na.m paccayanidaana.m, paccayasamudaya.m,  paccayajaatika.m, paccayapabhava.m, paccayasambhaara.m, paccayasamu.t.thaana.m.
text.2434: [03] 343^b^.^eb^ catunna.m ^a^V0.0289^ea^ adhikara.naana.m kati muulaani, kati  samu.t.thaanaa? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m tetti.msa muulaani, tetti.msa samu.t.thaanaa.
text.2435: [03] catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katamaani tetti.msa muulaani?  vivaadaadhikara.nassa dvaadasa muulaani, anuvaadaadhikara.nassa cuddasa  muulaani, aapattaadhikara.nassa cha muulaani, kiccaadhikara.nassa eka.m muula.m,  sa"ngho -- catunna.m adhikara.naana.m imaani tetti.msa muulaani.
text.2436: [03] catunna.m ^a^P5.0152^ea^ adhikara.naana.m katame tetti.msa samu.t.thaanaa?  vivaadaadhikara.nassa a.t.thaarasabhedakaravatthuuni samu.t.thaanaa,  anuvaadaadhikara.nassa catasso vipattiyo samu.t.thaanaa, aapattaadhikara.nassa  sattaapattikkhandhaa samu.t.thaanaa, kiccaadhikara.nassa cattaari kammaani  samu.t.thaanaa -- catunna.m adhikara.naana.m ime tetti.msa samu.t.thaanaa.
text.2438: [03] 344^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^M0.0267^ea^  aapattaanaapattiiti? vivaadaadhikara.na.m na aapatti. ki.m pana  vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m aapajjeyyaati? aama,  vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m aapajjeyya. vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa ^a^T0.0376^ea^  kati aapattiyo aapajjati? vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa dve aapattiyo  aapajjati. upasampanna.m omasati, aapatti paacittiyassa; anupasampanna.m  omasati, aapatti dukka.tassa -- vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa dve  aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.2439: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? katihi adhikara.nehi katisu .thaanesu katihi  samathehi sammanti?
text.2440: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m eka.m vipatti.m bhajanti --  aacaaravipatti.m. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m ^a^P5.0153^ea^,  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m dviihi aapattikkhandhehi  sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi ^a^V0.0290^ea^   samu.t.thanti. ekena adhikara.nena -- kiccaadhikara.nena; tiisu .thaanesu  -- sa"nghamajjhe, ga.namajjhe, puggalassa santike; tiihi samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.2441: [03] 345^b^.^eb^ anuvaadaadhikara.na.m aapattaanaapattiiti?  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m na aapatti. ki.m pana anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa  aapatti.m aapajjeyyaati? aama, anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m  aapajjeyya. anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa, kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa tisso ^a^T0.0377^ea^ aapattiyo aapajjati. bhikkhu.m  amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.mseti, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa;  amuulakena sa"nghaadisesena anuddha.mseti, aapatti paacittiyassa;  amuulikaaya aacaaravipattiyaa anuddha.mseti, aapatti dukka.tassa --  anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.2442: [03] taa ^a^M0.0268^ea^ aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo  bhajanti? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? katihi  adhikara.nehi katisu .thaanesu katihi samathehi sammanti?
text.2443: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti --  siyaa siilavipatti.m, siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m,  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m tiihi aapattikkhandhehi  sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m  aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti. yaa taa aapattiyo  garukaa taa aapattiyo ekena adhikara.nena -- kiccaadhikara.nena;  ekamhi .thaane -- sa"nghamajjhe; dviihi samathehi sammanti --  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca. yaa taa aapattiyo lahukaa  taa aapattiyo ekena adhikara.nena -- kiccaadhikara.nena; tiisu .thaanesu  -- sa"nghamajjhe ga.namajjhe puggalassa santike; tiihi samathehi  sammanti -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca ^a^T0.0378^ea^, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.2444: [03] 346^b^.^eb^ aapattaadhikara.na.m aapattaanaapattiiti?  aapattaadhikara.na.m aapatti. ki.m pana aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m  aapajjeyyaati? aama, aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m aapajjeyya.  aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa catasso ^a^V0.0291^ea^ aapattiyo aapajjati. bhikkhunii  jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m {paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m (syaa0)} pa.ticchaadeti,  aapatti paaraajikassa; vematikaa  pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti thullaccayassa; bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m  pa.ticchaadeti, aapatti paacittiyassa; aacaaravipatti.m pa.ticchaadeti,  aapatti dukka.tassa -- aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa catasso aapattiyo  aapajjati.
text.2445: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti ^a^M0.0269^ea^? katihi adhikara.nehi  katisu .thaanesu katihi samathehi sammanti?
text.2446: [03] taa aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti --  siyaa siilavipatti.m siyaa aacaaravipatti.m. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m --  aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m catuuhi aapattikkhandhehi  sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti ^a^T0.0379^ea^ -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. yaa saa  aapatti anavasesaa saa aapatti na katamena adhikara.nena, na katamamhi  .thaane, na katamena samathena sammati. yaa taa aapattiyo lahukaa taa  aapattiyo ekena adhikara.nena -- kiccaadhikara.nena; tiisu .thaanesu --  sa"nghamajjhe, ga.namajjhe, puggalassa santike; tiihi samathehi sammanti  -- siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.2447: [03] 347^b^.^eb^ kiccaadhikara.na.m aapattaanaapattiiti?  kiccaadhikara.na.m na aapatti. ki.m pana kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m  aapajjeyyaati? aama, kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa aapatti.m aapajjeyya.  kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati?  kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati. ukkhittaanuvattikaa  bhikkhunii yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjati, ~nattiyaa  dukka.ta.m; dviihi kammavaacaahi thullaccayaa; kammavaacaapariyosaane aapatti  paaraajikassa; bhedakaanuvattakaa bhikkhuu yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjanti, aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa; paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa  yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjanti, aapatti paacittiyassa  -- kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa imaa pa~nca aapattiyo aapajjati.
text.2448: [03] taa ^a^V0.0292^ea^ aapattiyo catunna.m vipattiina.m kati vipattiyo bhajanti?  catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m  katihi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa? channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^T0.0380^ea^ katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? katihi adhikara.nehi katisu .thaanesu katihi  samathehi sammanti?
text.2449: [03] taa ^a^P5.0154^ea^ ^a^M0.0270^ea^ aapattiyo catunna.m  vipattiina.m dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyaa siilavipatti.m siyaa  aacaaravipatti.m. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m -- aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m  aapattikkhandhaana.m pa~ncahi aapattikkhandhehi sa"ngahitaa -- siyaa  paaraajikaapattikkhandhena, siyaa sa"nghaadisesaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  thullaccayaapattikkhandhena, siyaa paacittiyaapattikkhandhena, siyaa  dukka.taapattikkhandhena. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thanti -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti. yaa saa  aapatti anavasesaa saa aapatti na katamena adhikara.nena, na katamamhi  .thaane, na katamena samathena sammati. yaa saa aapatti garukaa saa  aapatti ekena adhikara.nena -- kiccaadhikara.nena; ekamhi .thaane --  sa"nghamajjhe; dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca. yaa taa aapattiyo lahukaa taa aapattiyo ekena  adhikara.nena -- kiccaadhikara.nena; tiisu .thaanesu -- sa"nghamajjhe,  ga.namajjhe, puggalassa santike; tiihi samathehi sammanti -- siyaa  sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca, siyaa sammukhaavinayena ca  ti.navatthaarakena ca.
text.2451: [03] 348^b^.^eb^ vivaadaadhikara.na.m hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, hoti  aapattaadhikara.na.m, hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m. vivaadaadhikara.na.m na hoti  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, na hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m, na hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m;  api ^a^T0.0381^ea^ ca, vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, hoti  aapattaadhikara.na.m, hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m. yathaa katha.m viya? {cuu.lava0 215; pari0 314} idha  bhikkhuu vivadanti -- dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa du.t.thullaapattiiti vaa  adu.t.thullaapattiiti vaa. ya.m tattha bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado  naanaavaado a~n~nathaavaado vipaccataaya vohaaro medhaka.m, ida.m vuccati  vivaadaadhikara.na.m. vivaadaadhikara.ne sa"ngho vivadati vivaadaadhikara.na.m.  vivadamaano anuvadati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. anuvadamaano aapatti.m  aapajjati aapattaadhikara.na.m. taaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti  kiccaadhikara.na.m. eva.m vivaadaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m,  hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m, hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m.
text.2452: [03] anuvaadaadhikara.na.m ^a^M0.0271^ea^ ^a^V0.0293^ea^ hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m, hoti  kiccaadhikara.na.m, hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m. anuvaadaadhikara.na.m na hoti  aapattaadhikara.na.m, na hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m, na hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m;  api ca, anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m, hoti  kiccaadhikara.na.m, hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m. yathaa katha.m viya? idha  bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m anuvadanti siilavipattiyaa vaa aacaaravipattiyaa vaa  di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado  anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa  anubalappadaana.m, ida.m vuccati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. anuvaadaadhikara.ne  sa"ngho vivadati, vivaadaadhikara.na.m. vivadamaano anuvadati,  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. anuvadamaano aapatti.m aapajjati, aapattaadhikara.na.m.  taaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti, kiccaadhikara.na.m. eva.m  anuvaadaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m, hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m,  hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m.
text.2453: [03] aapattaadhikara.na.m hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m, hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m,  hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. aapattaadhikara.na.m na hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m,  na hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m, na hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m; api ca,  aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m, hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m,  hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. yathaa katha.m viya? {cuu.lava0 215; pari0 348} pa~ncapi aapattikkhandhaa  aapattaadhikara.na.m, sattapi aapattikkhandhaa aapattaadhikara.na.m, ida.m vuccati  aapattaadhikara.na.m. aapattaadhikara.ne sa"ngho vivadati vivaadaadhikara.na.m.  vivadamaano anuvadati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. anuvadamaano aapatti.m  aapajjati aapattaadhikara.na.m. taaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti  kiccaadhikara.na.m. eva.m aapattaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti kiccaadhikara.na.m,  hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m, hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m.
text.2454: [03] kiccaadhikara.na.m hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m, hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m,  hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m. kiccaadhikara.na.m na hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m, na  hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, na hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m; api ca,  kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m, hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m,  hoti ^a^T0.0383^ea^ aapattaadhikara.na.m. yathaa katha.m viya? yaa sa"nghassa kiccayataa  kara.niiyataa apalokanakamma.m ~nattikamma.m ~nattidutiyakamma.m  ~natticatutthakamma.m, ida.m ^a^M0.0272^ea^ vuccati kiccaadhikara.na.m.  kiccaadhikara.ne sa"ngho vivadati vivaadaadhikara.na.m. vivadamaano  anuvadati anuvaadaadhikara.na.m. anuvadamaano aapatti.m aapajjati  aapattaadhikara.na.m. taaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti  kiccaadhikara.na.m. eva.m kiccaadhikara.napaccayaa hoti vivaadaadhikara.na.m,  hoti anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, hoti aapattaadhikara.na.m.
text.2456: [03] 349^b^.^eb^ yattha ^a^V0.0294^ea^ sativinayo tattha sammukhaavinayo?  yattha sammukhaavinayo ^a^P5.0155^ea^ tattha sativinayo? yattha  amuu.lhavinayo tattha sammukhaavinayo? yattha sammukhaavinayo tattha  amuu.lhavinayo? yattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m tattha sammukhaavinayo? yattha  sammukhaavinayo tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m? yattha yebhuyyasikaa tattha  sammukhaavinayo? yattha sammukhaavinayo tattha yebhuyyasikaa? yattha  tassapaapiyasikaa tattha sammukhaavinayo? yattha sammukhaavinayo tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa? yattha ti.navatthaarako tattha sammukhaavinayo?  yattha sammukhaavinayo tattha ti.navatthaarako?
text.2458: [03] 350^b^.^eb^ yasmi.m samaye sammukhaavinayena ca sativinayena  ca adhikara.na.m vuupasammati -- yattha sativinayo tattha sammukhaavinayo,  yattha sammukhaavinayo tattha sativinayo, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo, na  tattha ^a^T0.0384^ea^ pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, na tattha yebhuyyasikaa, na tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa, na tattha ti.navatthaarako. yasmi.m samaye  sammukhaavinayena ca amuu.lhavinayena ca...pe0... sammukhaavinayena ca  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca...pe0... sammukhaavinayena ca yebhuyyasikaaya  ca...pe0... sammukhaavinayena ca tassapaapiyasikaaya ca...pe0...  sammukhaavinayena ca ti.navatthaarakena ca adhikara.na.m vuupasammati --  yattha ti.navatthaarako tattha sammukhaavinayo, yattha sammukhaavinayo  tattha ti.navatthaarako, na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amuu.lhavinayo,  na tattha pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m, na tattha yebhuyyasikaa, na tattha  tassapaapiyasikaa.
text.2460: [03] 351^b^.^eb^ sammukhaavinayoti vaa sativinayoti vaa --  ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa? labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m  vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m ^a^M0.0273^ea^ pa~n~naapetu.m?  sammukhaavinayoti vaa amuu.lhavinayoti vaa...pe0...  sammukhaavinayoti vaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.nanti vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa  yebhuyyasikaati vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa tassapaapiyasikaati  vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa ti.navatthaarakoti -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa  udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa ^a^V0.0295^ea^? labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa  vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m?
text.2461: [03] sammukhaavinayoti vaa sativinayoti vaa -- ime dhammaa  sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa; na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa  vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m. sammukhaavinayoti vaa  amuu.lhavinayoti ^a^T0.0385^ea^ vaa...pe0... sammukhaavinayoti vaa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nanti vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa yebhuyyasikaati vaa...  sammukhaavinayoti vaa tassapaapiyasikaati vaa... sammukhaavinayoti  vaa ti.navatthaarakoti vaa -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa; na ca  labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m  pa~n~naapetu.m.
text.2463: [03] 352^b^.^eb^ sammukhaavinayo ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo,  ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro ki.msamu.t.thaano? sativinayo  ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro,  ki.msamu.t.thaano? amuu.lhavinayo ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko,  ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano? pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m ki.mnidaana.m,  ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m?  yebhuyyasikaa ki.mnidaanaa, ki.msamudayaa, ki.mjaatikaa, ki.mpabhavaa,  ki.msambhaaraa, ki.msamu.t.thaanaa? tassapaapiyasikaa ki.mnidaanaa,  ki.msamudayaa, ki.mjaatikaa, ki.mpabhavaa, ki.msambhaaraa, ki.msamu.t.thaanaa  ti.navatthaarako ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo,  ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano?
text.2464: [03] sammukhaavinayo nidaananidaano, nidaanasamudayo,  nidaanajaatiko, nidaanapabhavo, nidaanasambhaaro, nidaanasamu.t.thaano.  sativinayo...pe0... amuu.lhavinayo...pe0... pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m  nidaananidaana.m, nidaanasamudaya.m, nidaanajaatika.m, nidaanapabhava.m,  nidaanasambhaara.m, nidaanasamu.t.thaana.m. yebhuyyasikaa...pe0...  tassapaapiyasikaa nidaananidaanaa, nidaanasamudayaa, nidaanajaatikaa,  nidaanapabhavaa, nidaanasambhaaraa ^a^M0.0274^ea^, nidaanasamu.t.thaanaa.  ti.navatthaarako nidaananidaano, nidaanasamudayo, nidaanajaatiko,  nidaanapabhavo, nidaanasambhaaro, nidaanasamu.t.thaano.
text.2465: [03] sammukhaavinayo ^a^P5.0156^ea^ ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo,  ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano ^a^V0.0296^ea^?  sativinayo...pe0... amuu.lhavinayo...pe0... pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m...pe0...  yebhuyyasikaa...pe0... tassapaapiyasikaa...pe0... ti.navatthaarako  ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro,  ki.msamu.t.thaano?
text.2466: [03] sammukhaavinayo hetunidaano, hetusamudayo, hetujaatiko,  hetupabhavo, hetusambhaaro, hetusamu.t.thaano ^a^T0.0386^ea^. sativinayo...pe0...  amuu.lhavinayo...pe0... pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m hetunidaana.m, hetusamudaya.m,  hetujaatika.m, hetupabhava.m, hetusambhaara.m, hetusamu.t.thaana.m.  yebhuyyasikaa...pe0... tassapaapiyasikaa hetunidaanaa, hetusamudayaa,  hetujaatikaa, hetupabhavaa, hetusambhaaraa, hetusamu.t.thaanaa. ti.navatthaarako  hetunidaano, hetusamudayo, hetujaatiko, hetupabhavo, hetusambhaaro,  hetusamu.t.thaano.
text.2467: [03] sammukhaavinayo ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko,  ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano? sativinayo...pe0...  amuu.lhavinayo...pe0... pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m...pe0...  yebhuyyasikaa...pe0... tassapaapiyasikaa...pe0... ti.navatthaarako  ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro,  ki.msamu.t.thaano? sammukhaavinayo paccayanidaano, paccayasamudayo,  paccayajaatiko, paccayapabhavo, paccayasambhaaro, paccayasamu.t.thaano.  sativinayo...pe0... amuu.lhavinayo...pe0... pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m  paccayanidaana.m, paccayasamudaya.m, paccayajaatika.m, paccayapabhava.m, paccayasambhaara.m,  paccayasamu.t.thaana.m. yebhuyyasikaa...pe0... tassapaapiyasikaa  paccayanidaanaa, paccayasamudayaa, paccayajaatikaa, paccayapabhavaa,  paccayasambhaaraa, paccayasamu.t.thaanaa. ti.navatthaarako paccayanidaano,  paccayasamudayo, paccayajaatiko, paccayapabhavo, paccayasambhaaro,  paccayasamu.t.thaano.
text.2468: [03] 353^b^.^eb^ sattanna.m samathaana.m kati muulaani, kati samu.t.thaanaa?  sattanna.m samathaana.m chabbiisa muulaani, chatti.msa samu.t.thaanaa. sattanna.m  samathaana.m katamaani chabbii ^a^M0.0275^ea^ muulaani?  sammukhaavinayassa cattaari muulaani. sa"nghasammukhataa,  dhammasammukhataa, vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa; sativinayassa  cattaari muulaani; amuu.lhavinayassa cattaari muulaani;  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa dve muulaani -- yo ca deseti yassa ca deseti;  yebhuyyasikaaya cattaari muulaani; tassapaapiyasikaaya cattaari ^a^T0.0387^ea^ muulaani;  ti.navatthaarakassa cattaari muulaani -- sa"nghasammukhataa, dhammasammukhataa,  vinayasammukhataa, puggalasammukhataa -- sattanna.m samathaana.m imaani  chabbiisa muulaani.
text.2469: [03] sattanna.m ^a^V0.0297^ea^ samathaana.m katame chatti.msa samu.t.thaanaa? sativinayassa  kammassa kiriyaa, kara.na.m, upagamana.m, ajjhupagamana.m, adhivaasanaa,  appa.tikkosanaa. amuu.lhavinayassa kammassa...pe0...  pa.ti~n~naatakara.nassa kammassa... yebhuyyasikaaya kammassa...  tassapaapiyasikaaya kammassa... ti.navatthaarakassa kammassa kiriyaa,  kara.na.m, upagamana.m, ajjhupagamana.m, adhivaasanaa, appa.tikkosanaa --  sattanna.m samathaana.m ime chatti.msa samu.t.thaanaa.
text.2471: [03] 354^b^.^eb^ sammukhaavinayoti vaa sativinayoti vaa --  ime dhammaa naanatthaa naanaabya~njanaa udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana.m?  sammukhaavinayoti vaa amuu.lhavinayoti vaa...pe0...  sammukhaavinayoti vaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.nanti vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa  yebhuyyasikaati vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa tassapaapiyasikaati  vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa ti.navatthaarakoti vaa -- ime dhammaa  naanatthaa naanaabya~njanaa udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana.m?  sammukhaavinayoti vaa sativinayoti vaa -- ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva  naanaabya~njanaa ca. sammukhaavinayoti vaa amuu.lhavinayoti  vaa...pe0... sammukhaavinayoti vaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.nanti vaa...  sammukhaavinayoti vaa yebhuyyasikaati vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa  tassapaapiyasikaati vaa... sammukhaavinayoti vaa ^a^T0.0388^ea^ ti.navatthaarakoti vaa  -- ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaa bya~njanaa ca.
text.2472: [03] 355^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 224} vivaado ^a^P5.0157^ea^ vivaadaadhikara.na.m,  vivaado no adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no vivaado, adhikara.na~nceva  vivaado ca? siyaa vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m, siyaa vivaado no  adhikara.na.m, siyaa adhikara.na.m no vivaado, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva  vivaado ca.
text.2473: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0276^ea^ katamo vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m? idha  bhikkhuu vivadanti dhammoti vaa adhammoti vaa...pe0... du.t.thullaa  aapattiiti vaa adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti vaa. ya.m tattha bha.n.dana.m, kalaho,  viggaho, vivaado, naanaavaado, a~n~nathaavaado, vipaccataaya vohaaro,  medhaka.m -- aya.m vivaado vivaadaadhikara.na.m.
text.2474: [03] tattha katamo vivaado no adhikara.na.m? maataapi puttena  vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi  pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaataraa vivadati, bhaataapi ^a^V0.0298^ea^ bhaginiyaa  vivadati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati  -- aya.m vivaado no adhikara.na.m.
text.2475: [03] tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no vivaado? anuvaadaadhikara.na.m,  aapattaadhikara.na.m, kiccaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no vivaado.
text.2476: [03] tattha katama.m adhikara.na~nceva vivaado ca? vivaadaadhikara.na.m  adhikara.na~nceva vivaado ca.
text.2477: [03] 356^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 224 aadayo} anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, anuvaado no  adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no anuvaado, adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca?  siyaa anuvaado ^a^T0.0389^ea^ anuvaadaadhikara.na.m, siyaa anuvaado no adhikara.na.m,  siyaa adhikara.na.m no anuvaado, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca.
text.2478: [03] tattha katamo anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m? idha bhikkhuu  bhikkhu.m anuvadanti siilavipattiyaa vaa aacaaravipattiyaa vaa  di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa aajiivavipattiyaa vaa. yo tattha anuvaado,  anuvadanaa anullapanaa anubha.nanaa anusampava"nkataa abbhussahanataa  anubalappadaana.m -- aya.m anuvaado anuvaadaadhikara.na.m.
text.2479: [03] tattha katamo anuvaado no adhikara.na.m? maataapi putta.m  anuvadati, puttopi maatara.m anuvadati, pitaapi putta.m anuvadati, puttopi  pitara.m anuvadati, bhaataapi bhaatara.m anuvadati, bhaataapi bhagini.m  anuvadati, bhaginiipi bhaatara.m anuvadati, sahaayopi sahaaya.m anuvadati  -- aya.m anuvaado no adhikara.na.m.
text.2480: [03] tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no anuvaado? aapattaadhikara.na.m  kiccaadhikara.na.m vivaadaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no anuvaado.
text.2481: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0277^ea^ katama.m adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca?  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m adhikara.na~nceva anuvaado ca.
text.2482: [03] 357^b^.^eb^ aapatti ^a^V0.0299^ea^ aapattaadhikara.na.m, aapatti no  adhikara.na.m, adhikara.na.m no aapatti, adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca?  siyaa aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m, siyaa aapatti no adhikara.na.m, siyaa  adhikara.na.m no aapatti, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca.
text.2483: [03] tattha katamaa aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m? pa~ncapi aapattikkhandhaa  aapattaadhikara.na.m ^a^T0.0390^ea^. sattapi aapattikkhandhaa aapattaadhikara.na.m. aya.m  aapatti aapattaadhikara.na.m.
text.2484: [03] tattha katamaa aapatti no adhikara.na.m? sotaapatti samaapatti  -- aya.m aapatti no adhikara.na.m.
text.2485: [03] tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no aapatti? kiccaadhikara.na.m  vivaadaadhikara.na.m anuvaadaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no aapatti.
text.2486: [03] tattha katama.m adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca? aapattaadhikara.na.m  adhikara.na~nceva aapatti ca.
text.2487: [03] 358^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 223} kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m, kicca.m no adhikara.na.m,  adhikara.na.m no kicca.m, adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca? siyaa kicca.m  kiccaadhikara.na.m, siyaa kicca.m no adhikara.na.m, siyaa adhikara.na.m no  kicca.m, siyaa adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca.
text.2488: [03] tattha katama.m kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m? yaa sa"nghassa kiccayataa  kara.niiyataa apalokanakamma.m ~nattikamma.m ~nattidutiyakamma.m  ~natticatutthakamma.m -- ida.m kicca.m kiccaadhikara.na.m.
text.2489: [03] tattha katama.m kicca.m no adhikara.na.m? aacariyakicca.m  upajjhaayakicca.m {upajjhaayakicca.m sakicca.m (ka0)} samaanupajjhaayakicca.m samaanaacariyakicca.m -- ida.m kicca.m  no adhikara.na.m.
text.2490: [03] tattha katama.m adhikara.na.m no kicca.m? vivaadaadhikara.na.m  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m aapattaadhikara.na.m -- ida.m adhikara.na.m no kicca.m.
text.2491: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0278^ea^ ^a^V0.0300^ea^ katama.m adhikara.na~nceva kicca~nca?  kiccaadhikara.na.m adhikara.na~nceva kicca.m caati.
text.2496: [21] aapatti hoti yattha ca, sa.msa.t.thaa nidaanena ca {sa.msa.t.thaa nidaanapabhavaa  (sii0)}.
text.2503: [22] sa"ngho kimatthaaya, matikamma.m pana kissa kaara.naa..
text.2506: [21] maa kho turito abha.ni, maa kho ca.n.dikato bha.ni.
text.2507: [22] maa kho pa.tigha.m janayi, sace anuvijjako tuva.m..
text.2508: [21] maa kho sahasaa abha.ni, katha.m viggaahika.m anatthasa.mhita.m.
text.2511: [27] suvutta.m sikkhaapadaanulomika.m, gati.m na naasento  samparaayika.m.
text.2518: [27] pa.ti~n~naa lajjiisu kataa, alajjiisu eva.m na vijjati.
text.2519: [22] bahumpi alajjii bhaaseyya, vattaanusandhitena {vuttaanusandhitena (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} kaaraye..
text.2520: [21] alajjii kiidiso hoti, pa.ti~n~naa yassa na ruuhati.
text.2521: [22] eta~nca {eva~nca (ka0)} taaha.m pucchaami, kiidiso vuccati alajjii  puggalo..
text.2524: [21] sacca.m ahampi jaanaami, ediso vuccati alajjiipuggalo.
text.2525: [22] a~n~na~nca taaha.m pucchaami, kiidiso vuccati lajjiipuggalo..
text.2526: [21] sa~ncicca aapatti.m naapajjati, aapatti.m na pariguuhati.
text.2527: [22] agatigamana.m ^a^T0.0394^ea^ na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjiipuggalo..
text.2528: [21] sacca.m ^a^M0.0280^ea^ ahampi jaanaami, ediso vuccati  lajjiipuggalo.
text.2529: [22] a~n~na~nca taaha.m pucchaami, kiidiso vuccati  adhammacodako..
text.2534: [21] sacca.m ahampi jaanaami, ediso vuccati adhammacodako.
text.2535: [22] a~n~na~nca taaha.m pucchaami, kiidiso vuccati dhammacodako..
text.2539: [21] sacca.m ^a^V0.0303^ea^ ahampi jaanaami, ediso vuccati dhammacodako.
text.2540: [22] a~n~na~nca taaha.m pucchaami, kiidiso vuccati baalacodako..
text.2545: [21] sacca.m ahampi jaanaami, ediso vuccati baalacodako.
text.2546: [22] a~n~na~nca ^a^T0.0395^ea^ taaha.m pucchaami, kiidiso vuccati  pa.n.ditacodako..
text.2550: [21] sacca.m ahampi jaanaami, ediso vuccati pa.n.ditacodako.
text.2551: [22] a~n~na~nca taaha.m pucchaami, codanaa kinti vuccati..
text.2557: [03] 360^b^.^eb^ anuvijjake ^a^T0.0396^ea^ ^a^P5.0160^ea^ ^a^M0.0281^ea^ ^a^V0.0304^ea^   codako pucchitabbo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m  codesi, kimhi na.m codesi, siilavipattiyaa vaa codesi,  aacaaravipattiyaa vaa codesi, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa codesii''ti? so  ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``siilavipattiyaa vaa codemi, aacaaravipattiyaa  vaa codemi, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa codemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo  -- ``jaanaasi panaayasmaa siilavipatti.m, jaanaasi aacaaravipatti.m,  jaanaasi di.t.thivipatti''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``jaanaami  kho aha.m, aavuso, siilavipatti.m, jaanaami aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaami  di.t.thivipatti''nti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``katamaa panaavuso,  siilavipatti? katamaa aacaaravipatti? katamaa di.t.thivipattii''ti?  so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``cattaari ca paaraajikaani, terasa ca  sa"nghaadisesaa -- aya.m siilavipatti. thullaccaya.m, paacittiya.m,  paa.tidesaniiya.m, dukka.ta.m, dubbhaasita.m, aya.m aacaaravipatti. micchaadi.t.thi,  antaggaahikaa di.t.thi -- aya.m di.t.thivipattii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo  -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m codesi, di.t.thena vaa codesi  sutena vaa codesi parisa"nkaaya vaa codesii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya  -- ``di.t.thena vaa codemi sutena vaa codemi parisa"nkaaya vaa  codemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m  bhikkhu.m di.t.thena codesi, ki.m te di.t.tha.m kinti te di.t.tha.m, kadaa ^a^T0.0397^ea^ te di.t.tha.m,  kattha te di.t.tha.m paaraajika.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, sa"nghaadisesa.m  ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m...  dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, kattha ca tva.m ahosi, kattha  caaya.m bhikkhu ahosi, ki~nca tva.m karosi, ki.m caaya.m bhikkhu  karotii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, ima.m  bhikkhu.m di.t.thena codemi, api ca sutena codemii''ti, so evamassa  vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m sutena codesi,  ki.m te suta.m, kinti te suta.m, kadaa te suta.m ^a^V0.0305^ea^, kattha te suta.m, paaraajika.m  ajjhaapannoti suta.m, sa"nghaadisesa.m... thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m...  paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapannoti suta.m, bhikkhussa  suta.m, bhikkhuniyaa suta.m, sikkhamaanaaya suta.m ^a^M0.0282^ea^,  saama.nerassa suta.m, saama.neriyaa suta.m, upaasakassa suta.m, upaasikaaya  suta.m, raajuuna.m suta.m, raajamahaamattaana.m suta.m, titthiyaana.m suta.m,  titthiyasaavakaana.m suta''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``na kho  aha.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m sutena codemi, api ca parisa"nkaaya  codemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m  bhikkhu.m parisa"nkaaya codesi, ki.m parisa"nkasi, kinti parisa"nkasi,  kadaa parisa"nkasi, kattha parisa"nkasi, paaraajika.m ajjhaapannoti ^a^T0.0398^ea^  parisa"nkasi, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, thullaccaya.m...  paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapannoti  parisa"nkasi, bhikkhussa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, bhikkhuniyaa sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, sikkhamaanaaya sutvaa parisa"nkasi, saama.nerassa sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, saama.neriyaa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, upaasakassa sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, upaasikaaya sutvaa parisa"nkasi, raajuuna.m sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, raajamahaamattaana.m sutvaa parisa"nkasi, titthiyaana.m sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, titthiyasaavakaana.m sutvaa parisa"nkasii''ti?
text.2559: [21] di.t.tha.m di.t.thena sameti di.t.thena sa.msandate di.t.tha.m.
text.2562: [21] suta.m sutena sameti sutena sa.msandate suta.m.
text.2565: [21] muta.m mutena sameti mutena sa.msandate muta.m.
text.2568: [03] 362^b^.^eb^ codanaaya ko aadi, ki.m majjhe, ki.m  pariyosaana.m? codanaaya okaasakamma.m aadi, kiriyaa majjhe, samatho  pariyosaana.m. codanaaya ^a^T0.0399^ea^ kati muulaani, kati vatthuuni, kati bhuumiyo,  katihaakaarehi codeti? codanaaya dve muulaani, tii.ni vatthuuni, pa~nca  bhuumiyo, dviihaakaarehi codeti. codanaaya katamaani dve muulaani?  samuulikaa vaa amuulikaa vaa -- codanaaya ^a^V0.0306^ea^ imaani dve muulaani.  codanaaya katamaani tii.ni vatthuuni? di.t.thena ^a^M0.0283^ea^ sutena  parisa"nkaaya -- codanaaya imaani tii.ni vatthuuni. codanaa ^a^P5.0161^ea^  katamaa pa~nca bhuumiyo? kaalena vakkhaami no akaalena,  bhuutena vakkhaami no abhuutena, sa.nhena vakkhaami no pharusena,  atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami no anatthasa.mhitena, mettaacitto vakkhaami no  dosantaroti -- codanaaya imaa pa~nca bhuumiyo.
text.2569: [03] katamehi dviihaakaarehi codeti? kaayena vaa codeti vaacaaya vaa  codeti -- imehi dviihaakaarehi codeti.
text.2571: [03] 363^b^.^eb^ codakena katha.m pa.tipajjitabba.m? cuditakena katha.m  pa.tipajjitabba.m? sa"nghena katha.m pa.tipajjitabba.m? anuvijjakena katha.m  pa.tipajjitabba.m? codakena katha.m pa.tipajjitabbanti? codakena pa~ncasu  dhammesu pati.t.thaaya paro codetabbo. kaalena vakkhaami no akaalena,  bhuutena vakkhaami no abhuutena, sa.nhena vakkhaami no pharusena,  atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami no anatthasa.mhitena, mettaacitto vakkhaami no  dosantaroti -- codakena eva.m pa.tipajjitabba.m. cuditakena katha.m  pa.tipajjitabbanti? cuditakena dviisu dhammesu pa.tipajjitabba.m. sacce  ca akuppe ca -- cuditakena eva.m pa.tipajjitabba.m. sa"nghena katha.m  pa.tipajjitabbanti? sa"nghena ^a^T0.0400^ea^ oti.n.naanoti.n.na.m jaanitabba.m. sa"nghena  eva.m pa.tipajjitabba.m. anuvijjakena katha.m pa.tipajjitabbanti?  anuvijjakena yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusaasanena ta.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasammati tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametabba.m.  anuvijjakena eva.m pa.tipajjitabba.m.
text.2579: [21] chandaa ^a^M0.0284^ea^ ^a^V0.0307^ea^ dosaa bhayaa mohaa, there ca  paribhaasati.
text.2581: [22] niraya.m gacchati dummedho, na ca sikkhaaya gaaravo..
text.2650: [03] 365^b^.^eb^ {pari0 421} sa"ngaamaavacare ^a^T0.0404^ea^ ^a^P5.0163^ea^ ^a^M0.0287^ea^ ^a^V0.0310^ea^   bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamantena niicacittena sa"ngho  upasa"nkamitabbo rajohara.nasamena cittena; aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m  nisajjakusalena; there bhikkhuu anupakhajjantena, nave bhikkhuu aasanena  appa.tibaahantena, yathaapatiruupe aasane nisiiditabba.m; anaanaakathikena  bhavitabba.m atiracchaanakathikena; saama.m vaa dhammo bhaasitabbo paro vaa  ajjhesitabbo ariyo vaa tu.nhiibhaavo naatima~n~nitabbo.
text.2651: [03] sa"nghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukaamena na  upajjhaayo pucchitabbo, na aacariyo pucchitabbo, na saddhivihaariko  pucchitabbo, na antevaasiko pucchitabbo, na samaanupajjhaayako  pucchitabbo, na samaanaacariyako pucchitabbo, na jaati pucchitabbaa,  na naama.m pucchitabba.m, na gotta.m pucchitabba.m, na aagamo pucchitabbo, na  kulapadeso pucchitabbo, na jaatibhuumi pucchitabbaa. ta.m ki.m kaara.naa?  atrassa pema.m vaa doso vaa. peme vaa sati dose vaa, chandaapi  gaccheyya dosaapi gaccheyya mohaapi gaccheyya bhayaapi gaccheyya.
text.2652: [03] sa"nghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukaamena  sa"nghagarukena bhavitabba.m no puggalagarukena, saddhammagarukena bhavitabba.m  no aamisagarukena, atthavasikena bhavitabba.m no parisakappikena,  kaalena anuvijjitabba.m no akaalena, bhuutena anuvijjitabba.m ^a^T0.0405^ea^ no  abhuutena, sa.nhena anuvijjitabba.m no pharusena, atthasa.mhitena  anuvijjitabba.m no anatthasa.mhitena, mettaacittena anuvijjitabba.m no  dosantarena, na upaka.n.nakajappinaa bhavitabba.m, na ^a^V0.0311^ea^ jimha.m pekkhitabba.m,  na akkhi nikha.nitabba.m, na bhamuka.m ukkhipitabba.m, na siisa.m  ukkhipitabba.m, na hatthavikaaro kaatabbo, na hatthamuddaa dassetabbaa.
text.2653: [03] aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m nisajjakusalena, yugamatta.m pekkhantena  attha.m anuvidhiyantena sake aasane nisiiditabba.m, na ca aasanaa  vu.t.thaatabba.m ^a^M0.0288^ea^, na viitihaatabba.m, na kummaggo sevitabbo,  na baahaavikkhepaka.m {na vaacaa vikkhepaka.m (syaa0)} bha.nitabba.m, aturitena bhavitabba.m asaahasikena,  aca.n.dikatena bhavitabba.m vacanakkhame ^a^P5.0164^ea^, mettaacittena  bhavitabba.m hitaanukampinaa, kaaru.nikena bhavitabba.m hitaparisakkinaa,  asamphappalaapinaa bhavitabba.m pariyantabhaa.ninaa, averavasikena bhavitabba.m  anasuruttena, attaa pariggahetabbo, paro pariggahetabbo, codako  pariggahetabbo, cuditako pariggahetabbo, adhammacodako pariggahetabbo,  adhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, dhammacodako pariggahetabbo,  dhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, vutta.m ahaapentena avutta.m apakaasentena  oti.n.naani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m pariggahetvaa paro pa.tipucchitvaa  yathaa pa.ti~n~naaya kaaretabbo, mando haasetabbo {vepo pahaasetabbo (syaa0)}, bhiiruu   ^a^T0.0406^ea^ assaasetabbo, ca.n.do nisedhetabbo, asuci vibhaavetabbo, ujumaddavena na chandaagati.m  gantabba.m, na dosaagati.m gantabba.m, na mohaagati.m gantabba.m, na bhayaagati.m  gantabba.m, majjhattena bhavitabba.m dhammesu ca puggalesu ca. eva~nca pana  anuvijjako anuvijjamaano satthu ceva saasanakaro hoti, vi~n~nuuna~nca  sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.
text.2654: [03] 366^b^.^eb^ sutta.m sa.msandanatthaaya, opamma.m nidassanatthaaya,  attho vi~n~naapanatthaaya, pa.tipucchaa .thapanatthaaya, okaasakamma.m  codanatthaaya, codanaa saara.natthaaya, saara.naa savacaniiyatthaaya,  savacaniiya.m palibodhatthaaya, palibodho vinicchayatthaaya, vinicchayo  santiira.natthaaya, santiira.na.m .thaanaa.thaanagamanatthaaya, .thaanaa.thaanagamana.m  dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahatthaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sampaggahatthaaya,  sa"ngho sampariggahasampa.ticchanatthaaya, sa"nghena anumataa puggalaa  pacceka.t.thaayino avisa.mvaadaka.t.thaayino.
text.2655: [03] vinayo sa.mvaratthaaya, sa.mvaro avippa.tisaaratthaaya, avippa.tisaaro  paamujjatthaaya, paamujja.m piitatthaaya, piiti passaddhatthaaya, passaddhi  sukhatthaaya, sukha.m samaadhatthaaya, samaadhi yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanatthaaya,  yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m nibbidatthaaya, nibbidaa viraagatthaaya, viraago  vimuttatthaaya, vimutti vimutti~naa.nadassanatthaaya, vimutti~naa.nadassana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaanatthaaya. etadatthaa ^a^M0.0289^ea^ ^a^V0.0312^ea^ kathaa, etadatthaa  mantanaa, etadatthaa upanisaa, etadattha.m sotaavadhaana.m -- yadida.m ^a^T0.0407^ea^  anupaadaacittassa vimokkhoti.
text.2658: [22] suvutta.m sikkhaapadaanulomika.m, gati.m na naasento  samparaayika.m..
text.2660: [22] pubbaapara.m na jaanaati, kataakata.m samena ca..
text.2662: [22] ratto du.t.tho ca muu.lho ca, bhayaa mohaa ca gacchati..
text.2663: [21] na ca sa~n~nattikusalo, nijjhattiyaa ca akovido.
text.2665: [22] sa ve {sace (ka0)} taadisako bhikkhu, appa.tikkhoti vuccati..
text.2669: [22] aratto adu.t.tho amuu.lho, bhayaa mohaa na gacchati..
text.2670: [21] sa~n~nattiyaa ca kusalo, nijjhattiyaa ca kovido.
text.2672: [22] sa ve taadisako bhikkhu, sappa.tikkhoti vuccatiiti..
text.2675: [21] niicacittena ^a^T0.0408^ea^ ^a^V0.0313^ea^ puccheyya, garu sa"nghe na puggale.
text.2677: [22] uddaana.m cuu.lasa"ngaame, ekuddeso {ekuddesa.m (sii0 syaa0)} ida.m katanti..
text.2680: [03] 368^b^.^eb^ sa"ngaamaavacare ^a^T0.0409^ea^ ^a^P5.0166^ea^ ^a^M0.0290^ea^  bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharantena vatthu jaanitabba.m, vipatti  jaanitabbaa, aapatti jaanitabbaa, nidaana.m jaanitabba.m, aakaaro  jaanitabbo, pubbaapara.m jaanitabba.m, kataakata.m jaanitabba.m, kamma.m  jaanitabba.m, adhikara.na.m jaanitabba.m, samatho jaanitabbo, na chandaagati  gantabbaa, na dosaagati gantabbaa, na mohaagati gantabbaa, na bhayaagati  gantabbaa, sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapetabba.m, nijjhaapaniiye .thaane  nijjhaapetabba.m, pekkhaniiye .thaane pekkhitabba.m, pasaadaniiye .thaane  pasaadetabba.m, laddhapakkhomhiiti parapakkho naavajaanitabbo,  bahussutomhiiti appassuto naavajaanitabbo, therataromhiiti navakataro  naavajaanitabbo, asampatta.m na byaahaatabba.m, sampatta.m dhammato vinayato  na parihaapetabba.m, yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusaasanena ta.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametabba.m.
text.2681: [03] 369^b^.^eb^ vatthu ^b^jaanitabba^eb^nti a.t.thapaaraajikaana.m {a.t.thanna.m  paaraajikaana.m (sii0 ka0)} vatthu  jaanitabba.m, teviisasa"nghaadisesaana.m vatthu jaanitabba.m, dveaniyataana.m vatthu  jaanitabba.m, dvecattaariisanissaggiyaana.m vatthu jaanitabba.m,  a.t.thaasiitisatapaacittiyaana.m vatthu jaanitabba.m, dvaadasapaa.tidesaniiyaana.m vatthu  jaanitabba.m, dukka.taana.m vatthu ^a^T0.0410^ea^ jaanitabba.m, dubbhaasitaana.m vatthu jaanitabba.m.
text.2682: [03] 370^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipatti jaanitabbaa^eb^ti siilavipatti  jaanitabbaa, aacaaravipatti jaanitabbaa, di.t.thivipatti jaanitabbaa,  aajiivavipatti jaanitabbaa.
text.2683: [03] 371^b^.^eb^ ^b^aapatti jaanitabbaa^eb^ti paaraajikaapatti  jaanitabbaa, sa"nghaadisesaapatti jaanitabbaa, thullaccayaapatti ^a^V0.0315^ea^ jaanitabbaa,  paacittiyaapatti jaanitabbaa, paa.tidesaniiyaapatti jaanitabbaa, dukka.taapatti  jaanitabbaa, dubbhaasitaapatti jaanitabbaa.
text.2684: [03] 372^b^.^eb^ ^b^nidaana.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0291^ea^  ^b^jaanitabba^eb^nti a.t.thapaaraajikaana.m nidaana.m jaanitabba.m,  teviisasa"nghaadisesaana.m nidaana.m jaanitabba.m, dveaniyataana.m nidaana.m  jaanitabba.m, dvecattaariisanissaggiyaana.m nidaana.m jaanitabba.m,  a.t.thaasiitisatapaacittiyaana.m nidaana.m jaanitabba.m, dvaadasapaa.tidesaniiyaana.m  nidaana.m jaanitabba.m, dukka.taana.m nidaana.m jaanitabba.m, dubbhaasitaana.m nidaana.m  jaanitabba.m.
text.2685: [03] 373^b^.^eb^ ^b^aakaaro jaanitabbo^eb^ti sa"ngho aakaarato  jaanitabbo, ga.no aakaarato jaanitabbo, puggalo aakaarato  jaanitabbo, codako aakaarato jaanitabbo, cuditako aakaarato  jaanitabbo ^a^P5.0167^ea^. ^b^sa"ngho aakaarato  jaanitabbo^eb^ti pa.tibalo nu kho aya.m sa"ngho ima.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena udaahu noti, eva.m sa"ngho  aakaarato jaanitabbo. ^b^ga.no aakaarato jaanitabbo^eb^ti pa.tibalo  nu kho aya.m ga.no ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena  satthusaasanena udaahu noti, eva.m ga.no aakaarato jaanitabbo ^a^T0.0411^ea^.  ^b^puggalo aakaarato jaanitabbo^eb^ti pa.tibalo nu kho aya.m puggalo  ima.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena udaahu noti,  eva.m puggalo aakaarato jaanitabbo. ^b^codako aakaarato  jaanitabbo^eb^ti kacci nu kho ayamaayasmaa pa~ncasu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya  para.m codeti udaahu noti, eva.m codako aakaarato jaanitabbo.  ^b^cuditako aakaarato jaanitabbo^eb^ti kacci nu kho ayamaayasmaa  dviisu dhammesu pati.t.thito sacce ca akuppe ca udaahu noti, eva.m  cuditako aakaarato jaanitabbo.
text.2686: [03] 374^b^.^eb^ ^b^pubbaapara.m jaanitabba^eb^nti kacci nu kho  ayamaayasmaa vatthuto vaa vatthu.m sa"nkamati, vipattito vaa vipatti.m  sa"nkamati, aapattito vaa aapatti.m sa"nkamati, avajaanitvaa vaa  pa.tijaanaati, pa.tijaanitvaa vaa avajaanaati, a~n~nena vaa a~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, udaahu noti, eva.m pubbaapara.m jaanitabba.m.
text.2687: [03] 375^b^.^eb^ ^b^kataakata.m jaanitabba^eb^nti methunadhammo  jaanitabbo, methunadhammassa anuloma.m jaanitabba.m, methunadhammassa  pubbabhaago jaanitabbo. ^b^methunadhammo jaanitabbo^eb^ti  dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti jaanitabbaa. ^b^methunadhammassa anuloma.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0292^ea^  ^b^jaanitabba^eb^nti bhikkhu attano mukhena parassa a"ngajaata.m  ga.nhaati ^a^V0.0316^ea^. ^b^methunadhammassa pubbabhaago jaanitabbo^eb^ti  va.n.naava.n.no {va.n.no ava.n.no (syaa0)},  kaayasa.msaggo, du.t.thullavaacaa, attakaamapaaricariyaa, vacanamanuppadaana.m ^a^T0.0412^ea^   {dhanamanuppadaana.m (ka0)}.
text.2688: [03] 376^b^.^eb^ ^b^kamma.m jaanitabba^eb^nti so.lasakammaani  jaanitabbaani -- cattaari apalokanakammaani jaanitabbaani, cattaari  ~nattikammaani jaanitabbaani, cattaari ~nattidutiyakammaani  jaanitabbaani, cattaari ~natticatutthakammaani jaanitabbaani.
text.2689: [03] 377^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhikara.na.m jaanitabba^eb^nti cattaari  adhikara.naani jaanitabbaani -- vivaadaadhikara.na.m jaanitabba.m,  anuvaadaadhikara.na.m jaanitabba.m, aapattaadhikara.na.m jaanitabba.m,  kiccaadhikara.na.m jaanitabba.m.
text.2690: [03] 378^b^.^eb^ ^b^samatho jaanitabbo^eb^ti satta samathaa  jaanitabbaa -- sammukhaavinayo jaanitabbo, sativinayo jaanitabbo,  amuu.lhavinayo jaanitabbo, pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m jaanitabba.m, yebhuyyasikaa  jaanitabbaa, tassapaapiyasikaa jaanitabbaa, ti.navatthaarako jaanitabbo.
text.2692: [03] 379^b^.^eb^ ^b^na chandaagati gantabbaa^eb^ti chandaagati.m  gacchanto katha.m chandaagati.m gacchati? idhekacco -- ``aya.m me  upajjhaayo vaa aacariyo vaa saddhivihaariko vaa antevaasiko vaa  samaanupajjhaayako vaa samaanaacariyako vaa sandi.t.tho vaa sambhatto vaa  ~naatisaalohito vaa''ti, tassaanukampaaya tassaanurakkhaaya adhamma.m  dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipeti, avinaya.m vinayoti  diipeti, vinaya.m avinayoti diipeti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena  bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati ^a^T0.0413^ea^ diipeti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena  abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena  aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m  tathaagatenaati diipeti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati  diipeti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, anaapatti.m  ^a^M0.0293^ea^ aapattiiti diipeti, aapatti.m anaapattiiti diipeti, lahuka.m  aapatti.m garukaa aapattiiti diipeti, garuka.m aapatti.m lahukaa aapattiiti  diipeti, saavasesa.m aapatti.m anavasesaa aapattiiti diipeti, anavasesa.m  aapatti.m saavasesaa aapattiiti diipeti, du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa  aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m ^a^P5.0168^ea^ aapatti.m du.t.thullaa  aapattiiti diipeti. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi chandaagati.m gacchanto  bahujanaahitaaya ^a^V0.0317^ea^ pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa  anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. imehi a.t.thaarasahi  vatthuuhi chandaagati.m gacchanto khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo  ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. chandaagati.m  gacchanto eva.m chandaagati.m gacchati.
text.2693: [03] 380^b^.^eb^ ^b^na dosaagati gantabbaa^eb^ti dosaagati.m  gacchanto katha.m dosaagati.m gacchati? idhekacco anattha.m me acariiti  aaghaata.m bandhati, anattha.m me caratiiti aaghaata.m bandhati, anattha.m me  carissatiiti ^a^T0.0414^ea^ aaghaata.m bandhati, piyassa me manaapassa anattha.m acari...  anattha.m carati... anattha.m carissatiiti aaghaata.m bandhati, appiyassa me  amanaapassa attha.m acari... attha.m carati... attha.m carissatiiti  aaghaata.m bandhati. imehi navahi aaghaatavatthuuhi aaghaato pa.tighaato  kuddho kodhaabhibhuuto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti  diipeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi  dosaagati.m gacchanto bahujanaahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya  bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. imehi  a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi dosaagati.m gacchanto khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati,  saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati.  dosaagati.m gacchanto eva.m dosaagati.m gacchati.
text.2694: [03] 381^b^.^eb^ ^b^na mohaagati gantabbaa^eb^ti mohaagati.m  gacchanto katha.m mohaagati.m gacchati? ratto raagavasena gacchati, du.t.tho  dosavasena gacchati, muu.lho mohavasena gacchati, paraama.t.tho di.t.thivasena  gacchati, muu.lho sa.mmuu.lho mohaabhibhuuto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti,  dhamma.m adhammoti ^a^M0.0294^ea^ diipeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m  adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti.  imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi mohaagati.m gacchanto bahujanaahitaaya  pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya ^a^T0.0415^ea^  dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi mohaagati.m  gacchanto khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo  ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. mohaagati.m gacchanto eva.m  mohaagati.m gacchati.
text.2695: [03] 382^b^.^eb^ ^b^na bhayaagati gantabbaa^eb^ti bhayaagati.m  gacchanto katha.m bhayaagati.m gacchati? idhekacco -- ``aya.m  visamanissito vaa gahananissito vaa balavanissito vaa kakkha.lo  pharuso jiivitantaraaya.m vaa brahmacariyantaraaya.m vaa karissatii''ti, tassa  bhayaa bhiito adhamma.m dhammoti ^a^V0.0318^ea^ diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipeti,  avinaya.m vinayoti diipeti, vinaya.m avinayoti diipeti, abhaasita.m  alapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, bhaasita.m  lapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, anaaci.n.na.m  tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena  anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m  tathaagatenaati diipeti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati  diipeti, anaapatti.m aapattiiti diipeti, aapatti.m anaapattiiti diipeti,  lahuka.m aapatti.m garukaa aapattiiti diipeti, garuka.m aapatti.m lahukaa  aapattiiti diipeti, saavasesa.m aapatti.m anavasesaa aapattiiti diipeti,  anavasesa.m aapatti.m saavasesaa aapattiiti diipeti, du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m  adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti.  imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi bhayaagati.m gacchanto bahujanaahitaaya  pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya  dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi bhayaagati.m  gacchanto khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo  ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. bhayaagati.m gacchanto eva.m  bhayaagati.m gacchati.
text.2696: [21] chandaa dosaa bhayaa mohaa, yo dhamma.m ativattati.
text.2699: [03] 383^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0295^ea^ ^b^na chandaagati.m  gacchati^eb^? adhamma.m adhammoti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati,  dhamma.m dhammoti diipento ^a^P5.0169^ea^ na chandaagati.m ^a^T0.0416^ea^ gacchati,  avinaya.m avinayoti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, vinaya.m  vinayoti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, abhaasita.m alapita.m  tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipento na chandaagati.m  gacchati, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati  diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m  tathaagatenaati diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena  aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, apa~n~natta.m  tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati,  pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipento na chandaagati.m  gacchati, anaapatti.m anaapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati,  aapatti.m aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, lahuka.m aapatti.m  lahukaa aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, garuka.m aapatti.m  garukaa aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, saavasesa.m aapatti.m  saavasesaa aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, anavasesa.m ^a^V0.0319^ea^   aapatti.m anavasesaa aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, du.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati, adu.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento na chandaagati.m gacchati. eva.m na  chandaagati.m gacchati.
text.2700: [03] 384^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m na dosaagati.m gacchati^eb^? adhamma.m  adhammoti diipento ^a^T0.0417^ea^ na dosaagati.m gacchati, dhamma.m dhammoti diipento na  dosaagati.m gacchati...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento  na dosaagati.m gacchati, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento  na dosaagati.m gacchati. eva.m na dosaagati.m gacchati.
text.2701: [03] 385^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m na mohaagati.m gacchati^eb^? adhamma.m  adhammoti diipento na mohaagati.m gacchati, dhamma.m dhammoti diipento na  mohaagati.m gacchati...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento  na mohaagati.m ^a^M0.0296^ea^ gacchati, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa  aapattiiti diipento na mohaagati.m gacchati. eva.m na mohaagati.m  gacchati.
text.2702: [03] 386^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m na bhayaagati.m gacchati^eb^? adhamma.m  adhammoti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, dhamma.m dhammoti diipento na  bhayaagati.m gacchati, avinaya.m avinayoti diipento na bhayaagati.m  gacchati, vinaya.m vinayoti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, abhaasita.m  alapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipento na  bhayaagati.m gacchati, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m  tathaagatenaati diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena  anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, aaci.n.na.m  tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati,  apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipento na bhayaagati.m  gacchati, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipento na bhayaagati.m  gacchati, anaapatti.m anaapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati,  aapatti.m aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, lahuka.m aapatti.m  lahukaa aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, garuka.m aapatti.m  garukaa aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, saavasesa.m aapatti.m  saavasesaa aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, anavasesa.m aapatti.m  anavasesaa aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m  du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m  adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento na bhayaagati.m gacchati. eva.m na bhayaagati.m  gacchati.
text.2703: [21] chandaa ^a^V0.0320^ea^ dosaa bhayaa mohaa, yo dhamma.m naativattati.
text.2706: [03] 387^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti^eb^?  adhamma.m adhammoti diipento sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti, dhamma.m  dhammoti diipento ^a^T0.0418^ea^ sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti,  adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa ^a^M0.0297^ea^ aapattiiti diipento  sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti. eva.m sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti.
text.2707: [03] 388^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m nijjhaapaniiye .thaane nijjhaapeti^eb^?  adhamma.m adhammoti diipento nijjhaapaniiye .thaane nijjhaapeti, dhamma.m  dhammoti diipento nijjhaapaniiye .thaane nijjhaapeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento nijjhaapaniiye .thaane nijjhaapeti,  adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento nijjhaapaniiye .thaane  nijjhaapeti. eva.m nijjhaapaniiye .thaane nijjhaapeti.
text.2708: [03] 389^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m pekkhaniiye .thaane pekkhati^eb^? adhamma.m  adhammoti diipento pekkhaniiye .thaane pekkhati, dhamma.m dhammoti diipento  pekkhaniiye .thaane pekkhati...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti  diipento pekkhaniiye .thaane pekkhati, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa  aapattiiti diipento pekkhaniiye .thaane pekkhati. eva.m pekkhaniiye .thaane  pekkhati.
text.2709: [03] 390^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaadeti^eb^?  adhamma.m adhammoti diipento pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaadeti, dhamma.m dhammoti  diipento pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaadeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa  aapattiiti diipento pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaadeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m ^a^T0.0419^ea^  adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaadeti. eva.m  pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaadeti.
text.2711: [03] 391^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m laddhapakkhomhiiti parapakkha.m  avajaanaati^eb^? idhekacco laddhapakkho hoti laddhaparivaaro ^a^V0.0321^ea^ pakkhavaa  ~naatimaa. ``aya.m aladdhapakkho aladdhaparivaaro na pakkhavaa na  ~naatimaa''ti tassa avajaananto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m  adhammoti diipeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti,  adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. eva.m laddhapakkhomhiiti  parapakkha.m avajaanaati.
text.2712: [03] 392^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m bahussutomhiiti appassuta.m  avajaanaati^eb^? idhekacco bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo.  ``aya.m appassuto appaagamo ^a^M0.0298^ea^ appadharo''ti tassa  avajaananto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti  diipeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. eva.m bahussutomhiiti appassuta.m  avajaanaati.
text.2713: [03] 393^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m therataromhiiti navakatara.m avajaanaati^eb^?  idhekacco thero hoti ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito aya.m navako  appa~n~naato appakata~n~nuu imassa vacana.m akata.m bhavissatii''ti tassa  avajaananto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti  diipeti ^a^T0.0420^ea^ ...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m  ^a^P5.0170^ea^ aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. eva.m  therataromhiiti navakatara.m avajaanaati.
text.2714: [03] 394^b^.^eb^ ^b^asampatta.m na byaaharitabba^eb^nti anoti.n.na.m  bhaara.m {bhaasa.m (syaa0)} na otaaretabba.m. ^b^sampatta.m dhammato vinayato na  parihaapetabba^eb^nti ya.matthaaya sa"ngho sannipatito hoti ta.m attha.m  dhammato vinayato na parihaapetabba.m.
text.2715: [03] 395^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena dhammenaa^eb^ti bhuutena vatthunaa. ^b^yena  vinayenaa^eb^ti codetvaa saaretvaa. ^b^yena satthusaasanenaa^eb^ti  ~nattisampadaaya anussaavanasampadaaya, yena dhammena yena vinayena yena  satthusaasanena ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasametabbanti.
text.2717: [03] 396^b^.^eb^ anuvijjakena codako pucchitabbo -- ``ya.m  kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno pavaara.na.m .thapesi, kimhi na.m  .thapesi, siilavipattiyaa vaa .thapesi, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa .thapesi,  di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa .thapesii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya --  ``siilavipattiyaa vaa .thapemi ^a^V0.0322^ea^ aacaaravipattiyaa vaa .thapemi  di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``jaanaati  panaayasmaa siilavipatti.m, jaanaati aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaati  di.t.thivipatti''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``jaanaami kho aha.m,  aavuso, siilavipatti.m, jaanaami aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaami  di.t.thivipatti''nti ^a^T0.0421^ea^, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``katamaa ^a^M0.0299^ea^  panaavuso, siilavipatti katamaa aacaaravipatti katamaa  di.t.thivipattii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani  terasa sa"nghaadisesaa -- aya.m siilavipatti. thullaccaya.m paacittiya.m  paa.tidesaniiya.m dukka.ta.m dubbhaasita.m -- aya.m aacaaravipatti. micchaadi.t.thi  antaggaahikaadi.t.thi -- aya.m di.t.thivipattii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo  -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno pavaara.na.m .thapesi,  di.t.thena vaa .thapesi, sutena vaa .thapesi, parisa"nkaaya vaa .thapesii''ti?  so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``di.t.thena vaa .thapemi, sutena vaa .thapemi,  parisa"nkaaya vaa .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho  tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno di.t.thena pavaara.na.m .thapesi, ki.m te di.t.tha.m,  kinti te di.t.tha.m, kadaa te di.t.tha.m, kattha te di.t.tha.m, paaraajika.m  ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, thullaccaya.m...  paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapajjanto  di.t.tho, kattha ca tva.m ahosi, kattha caaya.m bhikkhu ahosi, ki~nca tva.m  karosi, ki.m caaya.m bhikkhu karotii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya --  ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno di.t.thena pavaara.na.m .thapemi,  api ca sutena pavaara.na.m .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m  kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno sutena pavaara.na.m .thapesi ^a^T0.0422^ea^ ki.m te  suta.m, kinti te suta.m, kadaa te suta.m, kattha te suta.m, paaraajika.m  ajjhaapannoti suta.m, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapannoti suta.m, thullaccaya.m...  paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapannoti  suta.m, bhikkhussa suta.m, bhikkhuniyaa suta.m, sikkhamaanaaya suta.m,  saama.nerassa suta.m, saama.neriyaa suta.m, upaasakassa suta.m, upaasikaaya  suta.m, raajuuna.m suta.m, raajamahaamattaana.m suta.m, titthiyaana.m suta.m,  titthiyasaavakaana.m suta''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``na kho  aha.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno sutena pavaara.na.m .thapemi, api ca  parisa"nkaaya pavaara.na.m .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m  kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno parisa"nkaaya pavaara.na.m .thapesi, ki.m  parisa"nkasi, kinti parisa"nkasi, kadaa parisa"nkasi, kattha  parisa"nkasi, paaraajika.m ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, sa"nghaadisesa.m  ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m...  dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, bhikkhussa sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, bhikkhuniyaa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, sikkhamaanaaya sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, saama.nerassa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, saama.neriyaa sutvaa  parisa"nkasi, upaasakassa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, upaasikaaya sutvaa  ^a^M0.0300^ea^ parisa"nkasi, raajuuna.m sutvaa ^a^V0.0323^ea^ parisa"nkasi raajamahaamattaana.m   ^a^T0.0423^ea^ sutvaa parisa"nkasi, titthiyaana.m sutvaa parisa"nkasi, titthiyasaavakaana.m  sutvaa parisa"nkasii''ti?
text.2719: [21] di.t.tha.m di.t.thena sameti, di.t.thena sa.msandate di.t.tha.m.
text.2721: [22] so puggalo pa.ti~n~naaya, kaatabbaa tena pavaara.naa..
text.2722: [21] suta.m sutena sameti, sutena sa.msandate suta.m.
text.2724: [22] so puggalo pa.ti~n~naaya, kaatabbaa tena pavaara.naa..
text.2725: [21] muta.m mutena sameti, mutena sa.msandate muta.m.
text.2727: [22] so puggalo pa.ti~n~naaya, kaatabbaa tena pavaara.naati..
text.2729: [03] 398^b^.^eb^ ki.m te di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa? kinti te  di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa? kadaa te di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa? kattha te  di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa?
text.2730: [03] 399^b^.^eb^ ^b^ki.m te di.t.tha^eb^nti vatthupucchaa, vipattipucchaa,  aapattipucchaa, ajjhaacaarapucchaa. vatthupucchaati -- a.t.thapaaraajikaana.m  vatthupucchaa, teviisasa"nghaadisesaana.m vatthupucchaa, dveaniyataana.m vatthupucchaa,  dvecattaariisanissaggiyaana.m vatthupucchaa, a.t.thaasiitisatapaacittiyaana.m  vatthupucchaa, dvaadasapaa.tidesaniiyaana.m vatthupucchaa, dukka.taana.m vatthupucchaa,  dubbhaasitaana.m vatthupucchaa. vipattipucchaati -- siilavipattipucchaa,  aacaaravipattipucchaa, di.t.thivipattipucchaa ^a^T0.0424^ea^, aajiivavipattipucchaa.  aapattipucchaati -- paaraajikaapattipucchaa, sa"nghaadisesaapattipucchaa,  thullaccayaapattipucchaa, paacittiyaapattipucchaa, paa.tidesaniiyaapattipucchaa,  dukka.taapattipucchaa, dubbhaasitaapattipucchaa. ajjhaacaarapucchaati --  dvaya.mdvayasamaapattipucchaa.
text.2731: [03] 400^b^.^eb^ ^b^kinti te di.t.tha^eb^nti li"ngapucchaa,  iriyaapathapucchaa, aakaarapucchaa, vippakaarapucchaa. li"ngapucchaati --  diigha.m vaa rassa.m vaa ka.nha.m vaa odaata.m vaa. iriyaapathapucchaati  gacchanta.m vaa .thita.m ^a^V0.0324^ea^ vaa nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa. aakaarapucchaati  gihili"nge ^a^M0.0301^ea^ vaa titthiyali"nge vaa pabbajitali"nge vaa.  vippakaarapucchaati gacchanta.m vaa .thita.m vaa nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa.
text.2732: [03] 401^b^.^eb^ ^b^kadaa^eb^ ^a^P5.0171^ea^ ^b^te  di.t.tha^eb^nti kaalapucchaa, samayapucchaa, divasapucchaa, utupucchaa.  kaalapucchaati pubba.nhakaale vaa majjhanhikakaale vaa saayanhakaale vaa.  samayapucchaati pubba.nhasamaye vaa majjhanhikasamaye vaa saayanhasamaye vaa.  divasapucchaati purebhatta.m vaa pacchaabhatta.m vaa ratti.m vaa divaa vaa kaa.le  vaa ju.nhe vaa. utupucchaati hemante vaa gimhe vaa vasse vaa {vassaane vaa (sii0)}.
text.2733: [03] 402^b^.^eb^ ^b^kattha te di.t.tha^eb^nti .thaanapucchaa, bhuumipucchaa,  okaasapucchaa, padesapucchaa. .thaanapucchaati bhuumiyaa vaa pathaviyaa vaa  dhara.niyaa vaa jagatiyaa vaa. bhuumipucchaati bhuumiyaa vaa pathaviyaa vaa  pabbate vaa paasaa.ne vaa paasaade vaa. okaasapucchaati puratthime vaa  okaase pacchime ^a^T0.0425^ea^ vaa okaase uttare vaa okaase dakkhi.ne vaa okaase.  padesapucchaati puratthime vaa padese pacchime vaa padese uttare vaa  padese dakkhi.ne vaa padeseti.
text.2738: [21] dosaa mohaa bhayaa ceva, sa~n~naa nijjhaapanena ca.
text.2744: [03] 403^b^.^eb^ kassa ^a^T0.0426^ea^ ^a^P5.0172^ea^ ^a^M0.0302^ea^ ^a^V0.0325^ea^   kathina.m {ka.thina.m (sii0 syaa0)} anatthata.m? kassa kathina.m atthata.m? kinti kathina.m anatthata.m?  kinti kathina.m atthata.m?
text.2745: [03] ^b^kassa kathina.m anatthata^eb^nti? dvinna.m puggalaana.m anatthata.m  hoti kathina.m -- anatthaarakassa ca ananumodakassa ca. imesa.m dvinna.m  puggalaana.m anatthata.m hoti kathina.m.
text.2746: [03] ^b^kassa kathina.m atthata^eb^nti? dvinna.m puggalaana.m atthata.m hoti  kathina.m -- atthaarakassa ca anumodakassa ca. imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m  atthata.m hoti kathina.m.
text.2747: [03] ^b^kinti kathina.m anatthata^eb^nti? catuviisatiyaa aakaarehi  anatthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ullikhitamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na  dhovanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ciivaravicaara.namattena atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, na chedanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na bandhanamattena  atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ova.t.tiyakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m,  na ka.n.dusakara.namattena {na ga.n.dusakara.namattena (ka0)} atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na da.lhiikammakara.namattena  atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na anuvaatakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na  paribha.n.dakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ovaddheyyakara.namattena  {na ova.t.teyyakara.namattena (sii0 syaa0), na ovadeyyakara.namattena (ka0)} atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, na kambalamaddanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na  nimittakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ^a^T0.0427^ea^ parikathaakatena atthata.m hoti  kathina.m, na kukkukatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na sannidhikatena atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, na nissaggiyena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na akappakatena  atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra sa"nghaa.tiyaa atthata.m hoti kathina.m,  na a~n~natra uttaraasa"ngena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra  antaravaasakena atthata.m hoti kathina.m ^a^V0.0326^ea^, na a~n~natra pa~ncakena vaa  atirekapa~ncakena vaa tadaheva sa~nchinnena sama.n.daliikatena atthata.m hoti  kathina.m, na a~n~natra puggalassa atthaaraa atthata.m ^a^M0.0303^ea^ hoti  kathina.m, sammaa ce atthata.m hoti kathina.m ta.m ce nissiima.t.tho anumodati.  evampi anatthata.m hoti kathina.m.
