text.2748: [03] nimittakamma.m naama nimitta.m karoti -- ``iminaa dussena  kathina.m attharissaamii''ti. parikathaa naama parikatha.m karoti --  ``imaaya parikathaaya kathinadussa.m nibbattessaamii''ti. kukkukata.m naama  anaadiyadaana.m vuccati. sannidhi naama dve sannidhiyo --  kara.nasannidhi vaa nicayasannidhi vaa. nissaggiya.m naama kayiramaane  aru.na.m u.t.thahati {udriyati (sii0 syaa0)}. imehi catuviisatiyaa aakaarehi anatthata.m hoti  kathina.m.
text.2749: [03] ^b^kinti kathina.m atthata^eb^nti? sattarasahi aakaarehi atthata.m  hoti kathina.m. ahatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ahatakappena atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, pilotikaaya atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pa.msukuulena atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, paapa.nikena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, animittakatena  atthata.m ^a^T0.0428^ea^ hoti kathina.m, aparikathaakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m,  akukkukatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, asannidhikatena atthata.m hoti  kathina.m, anissaggiyena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, kappakatena atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, sa"nghaa.tiyaa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, uttaraasa"ngena atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, antaravaasakena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pa~ncakena vaa  atirekapa~ncakena vaa tadaheva sa~nchinnena sama.n.daliikatena atthata.m hoti  kathina.m, puggalassa atthaaraa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, sammaa ce atthata.m  hoti kathina.m, ta.m ce siima.t.tho anumodati, evampi atthata.m hoti  kathina.m. imehi sattarasahi aakaarehi atthata.m hoti kathina.m.
text.2750: [03] saha kathinassa atthaaraa kati dhammaa jaayanti? saha  kathinassa atthaaraa pannarasa dhammaa jaayanti -- a.t.tha maatikaa, dve  palibodhaa, pa~ncaanisa.msaa. saha kathinassa atthaaraa ime pannarasa  dhammaa jaayanti.
text.2752: [03] 404^b^.^eb^ payogassa ^a^P5.0173^ea^ katame dhammaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena  paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^M0.0304^ea^, purejaatapaccayena  paccayo, pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo, sahajaatapaccayena paccayo?  pubbakara.nassa katame dhammaa anantarapaccayena ^a^V0.0327^ea^ paccayo...pe0...  paccuddhaarassa katame dhammaa... adhi.t.thaanassa katame dhammaa... atthaarassa  katame dhammaa... maatikaana~nca palibodhaana~nca katame dhammaa...  vatthussa katame dhammaa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena  paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena ^a^T0.0429^ea^ paccayo,  purejaatapaccayena paccayo, pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo, sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo?
text.2753: [03] pubbakara.na.m payogassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena  paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  payogo pubbakara.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. pubbakara.na.m payogassa  pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo.  paccuddhaaro pubbakara.nassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena  paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  pubbakara.na.m paccuddhaarassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. paccuddhaaro  pubbakara.nassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. adhi.t.thaana.m paccuddhaarassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo,  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paccuddhaaro adhi.t.thaanassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. adhi.t.thaana.m paccuddhaarassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa  dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. atthaaro adhi.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena  paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. adhi.t.thaana.m atthaarassa  purejaatapaccayena ^a^T0.0430^ea^ paccayo. atthaaro adhi.t.thaanassa pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. maatikaa ca  palibodhaa ca atthaarassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena  paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  atthaaro maatikaana~nca palibodhaana~nca purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca atthaarassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo.  pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. aasaa ^a^P5.0174^ea^  ca anaasaa ca vatthussa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena  paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^M0.0305^ea^, upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. vatthu aasaana~nca anaasaana~nca purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  aasaa ca anaasaa ca vatthussa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa  dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo.
text.2755: [03] 405^b^.^eb^ pubbakara.na.m ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m,  ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m, ki.msamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0328^ea^? paccuddhaaro ki.mnidaano,  ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko, ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano?  adhi.t.thaana.m ki.mnidaana.m, ki.msamudaya.m, ki.mjaatika.m, ki.mpabhava.m, ki.msambhaara.m,  ki.msamu.t.thaana.m? atthaaro ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko,  ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano? maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca  ki.mnidaanaa, ki.msamudayaa, ki.mjaatikaa, ki.mpabhavaa, ki.msambhaaraa  ki.msamu.t.thaanaa? aasaa ca anaasaa ^a^T0.0431^ea^ ca ki.mnidaanaa, ki.msamudayaa,  ki.mjaatikaa, ki.mpabhavaa, ki.msambhaaraa, ki.msamu.t.thaanaa?
text.2756: [03] pubbakara.na.m payoganidaana.m, payogasamudaya.m, payogajaatika.m,  payogapabhava.m, payogasambhaara.m, payogasamu.t.thaana.m. paccuddhaaro  pubbakara.nanidaano, pubbakara.nasamudayo, pubbakara.najaatiko,  pubbakara.napabhavo, pubbakara.nasambhaaro, pubbakara.nasamu.t.thaano. adhi.t.thaana.m  paccuddhaaranidaana.m, paccuddhaarasamudaya.m, paccuddhaarajaatika.m, paccuddhaarapabhava.m,  paccuddhaarasambhaara.m, paccuddhaarasamu.t.thaana.m. atthaaro adhi.t.thaananidaano,  adhi.t.thaanasamudayo, adhi.t.thaanajaatiko, adhi.t.thaanapabhavo,  adhi.t.thaanasambhaaro, adhi.t.thaanasamu.t.thaano. maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca  atthaaranidaanaa, atthaarasamudayaa, atthaarajaatikaa, atthaarapabhavaa,  atthaarasambhaaraa, atthaarasamu.t.thaanaa. aasaa ca anaasaa ca vatthunidaanaa,  vatthusamudayaa, vatthujaatikaa, vatthupabhavaa, vatthusambhaaraa, vatthusamu.t.thaanaa.
text.2757: [03] 406^b^.^eb^ payogo ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko,  ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano, pubbakara.na.m...pe0... paccuddhaaro...  adhi.t.thaana.m... atthaaro... maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca... vatthu... aasaa  ca anaasaa ca ki.mnidaanaa, ki.msamudayaa, ki.mjaatikaa, ki.mpabhavaa,  ki.msambhaaraa, ki.msamu.t.thaanaa?
text.2758: [03] payogo ^a^M0.0306^ea^ hetunidaano, hetusamudayo, hetujaatiko,  hetupabhavo, hetusambhaaro, hetusamu.t.thaano. pubbakara.na.m...pe0...  paccuddhaaro... adhi.t.thaana.m... atthaaro ^a^T0.0432^ea^... maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca...  vatthu... aasaa ca anaasaa ca hetunidaanaa, hetusamudayaa, hetujaatikaa,  hetupabhavaa, hetusambhaaraa, hetusamu.t.thaanaa.
text.2759: [03] 407^b^.^eb^ payogo ki.mnidaano, ki.msamudayo, ki.mjaatiko,  ki.mpabhavo, ki.msambhaaro, ki.msamu.t.thaano? pubbakara.na.m...pe0...  paccuddhaaro... adhi.t.thaana.m... atthaaro... maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca...  vatthu... aasaa ca anaasaa ca ki.mnidaanaa, ki.msamudayaa, ki.mjaatikaa,  ki.mpabhavaa, ki.msambhaaraa, ki.msamu.t.thaanaa?
text.2760: [03] payogo ^a^V0.0329^ea^ paccayanidaano, paccayasamudayo, paccayajaatiko,  paccayapabhavo, paccayasambhaaro, paccayasamu.t.thaano. pubbakara.na.m...pe0...  paccuddhaaro... adhi.t.thaana.m... atthaaro... maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca...  vatthu... aasaa ca anaasaa ca paccayanidaanaa, paccayasamudayaa,  paccayajaatikaa, paccayapabhavaa, paccayasambhaaraa, paccayasamu.t.thaanaa.
text.2761: [03] 408^b^.^eb^ pubbakara.na.m katihi dhammehi sa"ngahita.m?  pubbakara.na.m sattahi dhammehi sa"ngahita.m. dhovanena, vicaara.nena,  chedanena, bandhanena, sibbanena, rajanena, kappakara.nena -- pubbakara.na.m  imehi sattahi dhammehi sa"ngahita.m.
text.2762: [03] paccuddhaaro katihi dhammehi sa"ngahito? paccuddhaaro tiihi  dhammehi sa"ngahito -- sa"nghaa.tiyaa, uttaraasa"ngena, antaravaasakena.
text.2763: [03] adhi.t.thaana.m katihi dhammehi sa"ngahita.m? adhi.t.thaana.m tiihi dhammehi  sa"ngahita.m -- sa"nghaa.tiyaa, uttaraasa"ngena, antaravaasakena.
text.2764: [03] atthaaro katihi dhammehi sa"ngahito? atthaaro ekena ^a^T0.0433^ea^ dhammena  sa"ngahito -- vaciibhedena.
text.2765: [03] kathinassa kati muulaani, kati vatthuuni, kati bhuumiyo?  kathinassa ^a^P5.0175^ea^ eka.m muula.m -- sa"ngho; tii.ni vatthuuni  -- sa"nghaa.ti, uttaraasa"ngo, antaravaasako, cha bhuumiyo -- khoma.m,  kappaasika.m, koseyya.m, kambala.m, saa.na.m, bha"nga.m.
text.2766: [03] kathinassa ^a^M0.0307^ea^ ko aadi, ki.m majjhe, ki.m  pariyosaana.m? kathinassa pubbakara.na.m aadi, kriyaa majjhe, atthaaro  pariyosaana.m.
text.2767: [03] 409^b^.^eb^ katiha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo abhabbo kathina.m  attharitu.m? katiha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo bhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m?  a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo abhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m.  a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo bhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m. katamehi  a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo abhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m? pubbakara.na.m  na jaanaati, paccuddhaara.m na jaanaati, adhi.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, atthaara.m na  jaanaati, maatika.m na jaanaati, palibodha.m na jaanaati, uddhaara.m na  jaanaati, aanisa.msa.m na jaanaati -- imehi a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato  puggalo ^a^V0.0330^ea^ abhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m. katamehi a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato  puggalo bhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m? pubbakara.na.m jaanaati, paccuddhaara.m  jaanaati, adhi.t.thaana.m jaanaati, atthaara.m jaanaati, maatika.m jaanaati,  palibodha.m jaanaati, uddhaara.m jaanaati, aanisa.msa.m jaanaati -- imehi  a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato puggalo bhabbo kathina.m attharitu.m.
text.2768: [03] 410^b^.^eb^ katina.m ^a^T0.0434^ea^ puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti?  katina.m puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa ruhanti? ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m  kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti. ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa ruhanti.  katamesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti? nissiima.t.tho  anumodati, anumodento na vaaca.m bhindati, vaaca.m bhindanto na para.m  vi~n~naapeti -- imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti.  katamesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa ruhanti? siima.t.tho anumodati,  anumodento vaaca.m bhindati, vaaca.m bhindanto para.m vi~n~naapeti -- imesa.m  ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m kathinatthaaraa ruhanti.
text.2769: [03] 411^b^.^eb^ kati kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti? kati  kathinatthaaraa ruhanti? tayo kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti. tayo  kathinatthaaraa ruhanti. katame tayo kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti?  vatthuvipanna~nceva hoti, kaalavipanna~nca, kara.navipanna~nca -- ime tayo  kathinatthaaraa na ruhanti. katame tayo kathinatthaaraa ruhanti?  vatthusampanna~nceva hoti, kaalasampanna~nca, kara.nasampanna~nca -- ime tayo  kathinatthaaraa ruhanti.
text.2771: [03] 412^b^.^eb^ kathina.m ^a^M0.0308^ea^ jaanitabba.m,  kathinatthaaro jaanitabbo, kathinassa atthaaramaaso jaanitabbo,  kathinassa atthaaravipatti jaanitabbaa, kathinassa atthaarasampatti  jaanitabbaa, nimittakamma.m jaanitabba.m, parikathaa jaanitabbaa, kukkukata.m  jaanitabba.m, sannidhi jaanitabbaa, nissaggiya.m ^a^T0.0435^ea^ jaanitabba.m.
text.2772: [03] ^b^kathina.m^eb^ ^a^P5.0176^ea^ ^b^jaanitabba^eb^nti tesa~n~neva  dhammaana.m sa"ngaho samavaayo naama.m naamakamma.m naamadheyya.m nirutti bya~njana.m  abhilaapo yadida.m kathinanti.
text.2774: [03] ^b^kathinassa atthaaravipatti jaanitabbaa^eb^ti catuviisatiyaa  aakaarehi kathinassa atthaaravipatti jaanitabbaa.
text.2775: [03] ^b^kathinassa atthaarasampatti jaanitabbaa^eb^ti sattarasahi  aakaarehi kathinassa atthaarasampatti jaanitabbaa.
text.2776: [03] ^b^nimittakamma.m jaanitabba^eb^nti nimitta.m karoti iminaa  dussena kathina.m attharissaamiiti.
text.2777: [03] ^b^parikathaa jaanitabbaa^eb^ti parikatha.m karoti imaaya  parikathaaya kathinadussa.m nibbattessaamiiti.
text.2779: [03] ^b^sannidhi jaanitabbaa^eb^ti dve sannidhiyo jaanitabbaa --  kara.nasannidhi vaa nicayasannidhi vaa.
text.2781: [03] ^b^kathinatthaaro jaanitabbo^eb^ti sace sa"nghassa kathinadussa.m  uppanna.m hoti, sa"nghena katha.m pa.tipajjitabba.m, atthaarakena katha.m  pa.tipajjitabba.m, anumodakena katha.m pa.tipajjitabba.m.
text.2782: [03] 413^b^.^eb^ sa"nghena ~nattidutiyena kammena kathinatthaarakassa  bhikkhuno daatabba.m, tena kathinatthaarakena bhikkhunaa tadaheva dhovitvaa  vimajjitvaa vicaaretvaa chinditvaa sibbetvaa rajitvaa kappa.m katvaa  kathina.m attharitabba.m. sace ^a^M0.0309^ea^ sa"nghaa.tiyaa kathina.m  attharitukaamo hoti, poraa.nikaa sa"nghaa.ti paccuddharitabbaa ^a^T0.0436^ea^, navaa  sa"nghaa.ti adhi.t.thaatabbaa. imaaya sa"nghaa.tiyaa kathina.m attharaamiiti  vaacaa bhinditabbaa. sace uttaraasa"ngena kathina.m attharitukaamo hoti,  poraa.nako uttaraasa"ngo paccuddharitabbo, navo uttaraasa"ngo adhi.t.thaatabbo.  iminaa uttaraasa"ngena kathina.m attharaamiiti vaacaa bhinditabbaa.  sace antaravaasakena kathina.m attharitukaamo hoti, poraa.nako  antaravaasako paccuddharitabbo, navo antaravaasako adhi.t.thaatabbo.  iminaa antaravaasakena kathina.m attharaamiiti vaacaa bhinditabbaa. tena  kathinatthaarakena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m ^a^V0.0332^ea^   karitvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``atthata.m, bhante,  sa"nghassa kathina.m, dhammiko kathinatthaaro, anumodathaa''ti. tehi  anumodakehi bhikkhuuhi eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa a~njali.m ^a^P5.0177^ea^  paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``atthata.m, aavuso,  sa"nghassa kathina.m, dhammiko kathinatthaaro, anumodaamaa''ti. tena  kathinatthaarakena bhikkhunaa sambahule bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m  uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa a~njali.m ^a^T0.0437^ea^ paggahetvaa evamassu vacaniiyaa --  ``atthata.m, bhante, sa"nghassa kathina.m, dhammiko kathinatthaaro,  anumodathaa''ti. tehi anumodakehi bhikkhuuhi eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m  karitvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``atthata.m,  aavuso, sa"nghassa kathina.m, dhammiko kathinatthaaro anumodaamaa''ti.  tena kathinatthaarakena bhikkhunaa eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m  uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo --  ``atthata.m, aavuso, sa"nghassa kathina.m, dhammiko kathinatthaaro,  anumodaahii''ti. tena anumodakena bhikkhunaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m  karitvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``atthata.m,  aavuso, sa"nghassa kathina.m, dhammiko kathinatthaaro, anumodaamii''ti.
text.2784: [03] 414^b^.^eb^ sa"ngho kathina.m attharati, ga.no kathina.m  attharati, puggalo kathina.m attharatiiti. na sa"ngho kathina.m  attharati, na ga.no kathina.m attharati, puggalo kathina.m attharatiiti.  ha~nci na sa"ngho kathina.m attharati, na ga.no kathina.m attharati,  puggalo kathina.m attharati. sa"nghassa anatthata.m ^a^M0.0310^ea^ hoti  kathina.m, ga.nassa anatthata.m hoti kathina.m, puggalassa atthata.m hoti  kathina.m. sa"ngho paatimokkha.m uddisati ga.no paatimokkha.m uddisati  puggalo paatimokkha.m uddisatiiti na sa"ngho paatimokkha.m uddisati, na  ga.no paatimokkha.m uddisati, puggalo paatimokkha.m uddisatiiti.  ha~nci na sa"ngho paatimokkha.m uddisati, na ga.no paatimokkha.m  uddisati, puggalo paatimokkha.m uddisati. sa"nghassa anuddi.t.tha.m hoti  paatimokkha.m, ga.nassa anuddi.t.tha.m hoti paatimokkha.m, puggalassa uddi.t.tha.m  hoti paatimokkha.m. sa"nghassa saamaggiyaa ga.nassa saamaggiyaa  puggalassa uddesaa sa"nghassa uddi.t.tha.m hoti paatimokkha.m, ga.nassa uddi.t.tha.m  hoti paatimokkha.m, puggalassa uddi.t.tha.m hoti paatimokkha.m. evameva na  sa"ngho kathina.m attharati, na ^a^T0.0438^ea^ ga.no kathina.m attharati, puggalo kathina.m  attharati. sa"nghassa anumodanaaya ga.nassa anumodanaaya puggalassa  atthaaraa sa"nghassa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ga.nassa atthata.m hoti  kathina.m, puggalassa atthata.m hoti kathinanti.
