text.2825: [03] 416^b^.^eb^ kati kathinuddhaaraa sa"nghaadhiinaa? kati  kathinuddhaaraa puggalaadhiinaa? kati kathinuddhaaraa neva sa"nghaadhiinaa na  puggalaadhiinaa? eko kathinuddhaaro sa"nghaadhiino ^a^M0.0312^ea^ --  antarubbhaaro. cattaaro kathinuddhaaraa puggalaadhiinaa -- pakkamanantiko,  ni.t.thaanantiko, sanni.t.thaanantiko, siimaatikkamanantiko ^a^V0.0335^ea^. cattaaro  kathinuddhaaraa neva sa"nghaadhiinaa na puggalaadhiinaa -- naasanantiko,  savanantiko, aasaavacchediko, sahubbhaaro. kati ^a^T0.0442^ea^ ^a^P5.0179^ea^  kathinuddhaaraa antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti? kati kathinuddhaaraa  bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti? kati kathinuddhaaraa siyaa antosiimaaya  uddhariyyanti siyaa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti? dve kathinuddhaaraa  antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti -- antarubbhaaro, sahubbhaaro. tayo  kathinuddhaaraa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti -- pakkamanantiko,  savanantiko, siimaatikkamanantiko. cattaaro kathinuddhaaraa siyaa  antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti siyaa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti --  ni.t.thaanantiko, sanni.t.thaanantiko, naasanantiko, aasaavacchediko.
text.2826: [03] kati kathinuddhaaraa ekuppaadaa ekanirodhaa? kati kathinuddhaaraa  ekuppaadaa naanaanirodhaa? dve kathinuddhaaraa ekuppaadaa ekanirodhaa --  antarubbhaaro, sahubbhaaro. avasesaa kathinuddhaaraa ekuppaadaa  naanaanirodhaati.
text.2829: [21] kassa kinti pannarasa, dhammaa nidaanahetu ca.
text.2831: [21] ti.n.na.m {bhedato ti.n.na.m (ka0)} tayo jaanitabba.m, atthaara.m uddesena ca.
text.2832: [22] palibodhaadhinaa, siimaaya uppaadanirodhena caati {ito para.m ``parivaara.m  ni.t.thita.m'' itipaa.tho kesuci potthakesu dissati}..
text.2835: [03] 417^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0443^ea^ ^a^P5.0180^ea^ ^a^M0.0313^ea^ ^a^V0.0336^ea^   samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa  aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa upaali yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho aayasmaa upaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katihi nu  kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m naanissitena  vatthabba''nti?
text.2836: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m  naanissitena vatthabba.m. {pari0 325} katamehi pa~ncahi? uposatha.m na jaanaati,  uposathakamma.m na jaanaati, paatimokkha.m na jaanaati, paatimokkhuddesa.m  na jaanaati, uunapa~ncavasso hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m naanissitena vatthabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m anissitena  vatthabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? uposatha.m jaanaati, uposathakamma.m  jaanaati, paatimokkha.m jaanaati, paatimokkhuddesa.m jaanaati, pa~ncavasso  vaa hoti atirekapa~ncavasso vaa -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m anissitena vatthabba.m.
text.2837: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  yaavajiiva.m naanissitena vatthabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? pavaara.na.m na  jaanaati, pavaara.naakamma.m na jaanaati, paatimokkha.m ^a^T0.0444^ea^ na jaanaati,  paatimokkhuddesa.m na jaanaati, uunapa~ncavasso hoti -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m naanissitena  vatthabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m  anissitena vatthabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? pavaara.na.m jaanaati ^a^V0.0337^ea^,  pavaara.naakamma.m jaanaati, paatimokkha.m jaanaati, paatimokkhuddesa.m  jaanaati, pa~ncavasso vaa hoti atirekapa~ncavasso vaa -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m anissitena  vatthabba.m.
text.2838: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  yaavajiiva.m naanissitena vatthabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapattaanaapatti.m  na jaanaati, lahukagaruka.m ^a^M0.0314^ea^ aapatti.m na jaanaati,  saavasesaanavasesa.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m na  jaanaati, uunapa~ncavasso hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m naanissitena vatthabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m anissitena  vatthabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapattaanaapatti.m jaanaati, lahukagaruka.m  aapatti.m jaanaati, saavasesaanavasesa.m aapatti.m jaanaati, du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m jaanaati, pa~ncavasso vaa hoti atirekapa~ncavasso vaa --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa yaavajiiva.m  anissitena vatthabba.m''.
text.2839: [03] 418^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^P5.0181^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na ^a^T0.0445^ea^ upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo  daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo''ti?
text.2840: [03] {mahaava0 84} ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na  upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.  katamehi pa~ncahi? na pa.tibalo hoti antevaasi.m vaa saddhivihaari.m  vaa gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m vaa upa.t.thaapetu.m vaa, anabhirata.m vuupakaasetu.m vaa  vuupakaasaapetu.m vaa, uppanna.m kukkucca.m dhammato vinodetu.m {imasmi.m .thaane sabbattha  ``vinodetu.m vaa vinodaapetu.m vaa''ti paa.tho dissati,  vimativinodanii.tiikaaya mahaavaggava.n.nanaa oloketabbaa}, abhidhamme vinetu.m,  abhivinaye vinetu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero  upa.t.thaapetabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. katamehi  pa~ncahi? pa.tibalo hoti antevaasi.m vaa saddhivihaari.m vaa gilaana.m  upa.t.thaatu.m vaa upa.t.thaapetu.m vaa, anabhirata.m vuupakaasetu.m vaa vuupakaasaapetu.m vaa,  uppanna.m kukkucca.m dhammato vinodetu.m, abhidhamme vinetu.m, abhivinaye  vinetu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.
text.2841: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na  upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo ^a^V0.0338^ea^ daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.  katamehi pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0315^ea^? na pa.tibalo hoti ^a^T0.0446^ea^ antevaasi.m vaa  saddhivihaari.m vaa abhisamaacaarikaaya sikkhaaya sikkhaapetu.m,  aadibrahmacaariyakaaya sikkhaaya vinetu.m, adhisiile vinetu.m, adhicitte  vinetu.m, adhipa~n~naaya vinetu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na  saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. katamehi  pa~ncahi? pa.tibalo hoti antevaasi.m vaa saddhivihaari.m vaa  abhisamaacaarikaaya sikkhaaya sikkhaapetu.m, aadibrahmacaariyakaaya  sikkhaaya vinetu.m, adhisiile vinetu.m, adhicitte vinetu.m, adhipa~n~naaya  vinetu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo''ti.
text.2842: [03] 419^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba''nti?
text.2843: [03] pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2844: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhisiile siilavipanno hoti,  ajjhaacaare aacaaravipanno hoti, atidi.t.thiyaa di.t.thivipanno hoti ^a^T0.0447^ea^,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2845: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? kaayikena davena samannaagato  hoti, vaacasikena davena samannaagato hoti, kaayikavaacasikena davena  samannaagato hoti, micchaadi.t.thiko ^a^P5.0182^ea^ ca hoti,  aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2846: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0316^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  kaayikena anaacaarena samannaagato hoti ^a^V0.0339^ea^, vaacasikena anaacaarena  samannaagato hoti, kaayikavaacasikena anaacaarena samannaagato hoti,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2847: [01] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? kaayikena  upaghaatikena samannaagato hoti, vaacasikena upaghaatikena samannaagato  hoti, kaayikavaacasikena upaghaatikena samannaagato hoti,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2848: [01] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? kaayikena  micchaajiivena samannaagato ^a^T0.0448^ea^ hoti, vaacasikena micchaajiivena samannaagato  hoti, kaayikavaacasikena micchaajiivena samannaagato hoti,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2849: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m aapanno kammakato  upasampaadeti, nissaya.m deti, saama.nera.m upa.t.thaapeti,  bhikkhunovaadakasammuti.m saadiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati  -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m  kaatabba.m.
text.2850: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? yaaya aapattiyaa sa"nghena kamma.m  kata.m hoti ta.m aapatti.m aapajjati, a~n~na.m vaa taadisika.m, tato vaa  paapi.t.thatara.m, kamma.m garahati, kammike garahati -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2851: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0317^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? buddhassa  ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, aajiivavipanno ca -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m kaatabba''nti.
text.2859: [03] 420^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba''nti?
text.2860: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m  nappa.tippassambhetabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi ^a^P5.0183^ea^? aapatti.m  aapanno kammakato upasampaadeti, nissaya.m deti, saama.nera.m upa.t.thaapeti,  bhikkhunovaadakasammuti.m saadiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati  -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m  nappa.tippassambhetabba.m.
text.2861: [03] {cuu.lava0 8-9, 18, 30-31, 43, 53, 62, 72} ``aparehipi, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? yaaya aapattiyaa  sa"nghena kamma.m kata.m hoti ta.m aapatti.m aapajjati, a~n~na.m vaa taadisika.m,  tato vaa paapi.t.thatara.m, kamma.m garahati, kammike garahati -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m  nappa.tippassambhetabba.m.
text.2862: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? buddhassa ava.n.na.m  bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati,  micchaadi.t.thiko ca ^a^T0.0450^ea^ hoti, aajiivavipanno ^a^M0.0318^ea^ ca -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno kamma.m  nappa.tippassambhetabba.m.
text.2863: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  kamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti,  baalo ca, apakatatto ca, omaddakaarako ca hoti, vattesu ^a^V0.0341^ea^ sikkhaaya  ca na paripuurakaarii -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno kamma.m nappa.tippassambhetabba''nti.
text.2864: [03] 421^b^.^eb^ ``sa"ngaamaavacarena, bhante, bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m  upasa"nkamantena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa sa"ngho  upasa"nkamitabbo''ti?
text.2865: [03] {pari0 365} ``sa"ngaamaavacarena, upaali, bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamantena  pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa sa"ngho upasa"nkamitabbo. katame  pa~nca? sa"ngaamaavacarena, upaali, bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamantena  niicacittena sa"ngho upasa"nkamitabbo, rajohara.nasamena cittena,  aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m nissajjakusalena, there bhikkhuu  anupakhajjantena, nave bhikkhuu aasanena appa.tibaahantena yathaapatiruupe  aasane nisiiditabba.m, anaanaakathikena bhavitabba.m atiracchaanakathikena,  saama.m vaa dhammo bhaasitabbo, paro vaa ajjhesitabbo, ariyo vaa  tu.nhibhaavo naatima~n~nitabbo, sace, upaali, sa"ngho samaggakara.niiyaani  kammaani karoti tatra ce, upaali, bhikkhuno nakkhamati, api  di.t.thaavikamma.m katvaa ~naapetabbaa saamaggii. ta.m kissahetu? maaha.m  sa"nghena naanatto assanti. sa"ngaamaavacarenupaali ^a^T0.0451^ea^, bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m  upasa"nkamantena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa sa"ngho  upasa"nkamitabbo''ti.
text.2866: [03] 422^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu sa"nghe voharanto bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ca  bahujanaarucito caa''ti?
text.2867: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe voharanto  bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ca bahujanaarucito ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? ussitamantii ca hoti, nissitajappii ca, na ca  bhaasaanusandhikusalo ^a^M0.0319^ea^ hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye  yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa  kaaretaa hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  sa"nghe voharanto bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ca  bahujanaarucito ca. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe  voharanto bahujanakanto ca hoti bahujanamanaapo ca bahujanaarucito ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? na ussitamantii ca hoti, na nissitajappii  ca, bhaasaanusandhikusalo ca hoti, yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa  codetaa hoti, yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^V0.0342^ea^ samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe voharanto  bahujanakanto ca hoti bahujanamanaapo ca bahujanarucito ca.
text.2868: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe  voharanto bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ca ^a^T0.0452^ea^  bahujanaarucito ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? ussaadetaa ca hoti,  apasaadetaa ca, adhamma.m ga.nhaati, dhamma.m pa.tibaahati, sampha~nca bahu.m  bhaasati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  sa"nghe voharanto bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ca  bahujanaarucito ca. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe  voharanto bahujanakanto ca hoti bahujanamanaapo ca bahujanarucito  ^a^P5.0184^ea^ ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? na ussaadetaa ca hoti,  na apasaadetaa ca, dhamma.m ga.nhaati, adhamma.m pa.tibaahati, sampha~nca na  bahu.m bhaasati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  sa"nghe voharanto bahujanakanto ca hoti bahujanamanaapo ca  bahujanarucito ca.
text.2869: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe  voharanto bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ca  bahujanaarucito ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? pasayhapavattaa hoti,  anokaasakamma.m kaaretvaa pavattaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye  yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa  kaaretaa hoti, na yathaadi.t.thiyaa byaakataa hoti -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe voharanto  bahujanaakanto ca hoti bahujanaamanaapo ^a^M0.0320^ea^ ca  bahujanaarucito ca. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu sa"nghe  voharanto bahujanakanto ca hoti bahujanamanaapo ca bahujanarucito ca.  katamehi pa~ncahi? na ^a^T0.0453^ea^ pasayhapavattaa hoti, okaasakamma.m kaaretvaa  pavattaa hoti, yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti,  yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti, yathaadi.t.thiyaa  byaakataa hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu sa"nghe voharanto bahujanakanto ca hoti bahujanamanaapo ca  bahujanarucito caa''ti.
text.2871: [03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, aanisa.msaa vinayapariyattiyaa. katame  pa~nca? attano siilakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito,  kukkuccapakataana.m pa.tisara.na.m hoti, visaarado sa"nghamajjhe ^a^V0.0343^ea^ voharati,  paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahita.m nigga.nhaati, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa  pa.tipanno hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaanisa.msaa  vinayapariyattiyaa''.
text.2878: [03] 424^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^P5.0185^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba''nti?
text.2879: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na  voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m na jaanaati,  aapattisamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa payoga.m na ^a^T0.0454^ea^ jaanaati, aapattiyaa  vuupasama.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa na vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^M0.0321^ea^ samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m jaanaati,  aapattisamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa payoga.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa  vuupasama.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2880: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhikara.na.m na jaanaati,  adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa payoga.m na jaanaati,  adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa na  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  adhikara.na.m jaanaati ^a^V0.0344^ea^, adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa payoga.m  jaanaati, adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2881: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena ^a^T0.0455^ea^ bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? pasayhapavattaa hoti,  anokaasakamma.m kaaretvaa pavattaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye  yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa  kaaretaa hoti, na yathaadi.t.thiyaa byaakataa hoti -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? na pasayhapavattaa hoti, okaasakamma.m kaaretvaa  pavattaa hoti, yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti,  yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti, yathaadi.t.thiyaa  byaakataa hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2882: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapattaanaapatti.m na  jaanaati, lahukagaruka.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, saavasesaanavasesa.m aapatti.m  na jaanaati, du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m ^a^M0.0322^ea^ aapatti.m na jaanaati,  sappa.tikamma.m appa.tikamma.m aapatti.m na jaanaati -- imehi ^a^T0.0456^ea^ kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? aapattaanaapatti.m jaanaati, lahukagaruka.m aapatti.m  jaanaati, saavasesaanavasesa.m aapatti.m jaanaati, du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m  jaanaati, sappa.tikamma.m appa.tikamma.m aapatti.m jaanaati -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2883: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? kamma.m na jaanaati,  kammassa kara.na.m na jaanaati, kammassa vatthu.m na jaanaati, kammassa  vatta.m na jaanaati, kammassa vuupasama.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali ^a^P5.0186^ea^, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe  voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? kamma.m jaanaati, kammassa kara.na.m  jaanaati, kammassa vatthu.m jaanaati, kammassa vatta.m jaanaati, kammassa  vuupasama.m jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2884: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^V0.0345^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m na jaanaati,  nidaana.m na jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m na jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m na jaanaati,  anusandhivacanapatha.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m  jaanaati, nidaana.m jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m jaanaati,  anusandhivacanapatha.m jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2885: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m ^a^T0.0457^ea^. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, alajjii ca  hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m gacchati, na  dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m ^a^M0.0323^ea^ gacchati, na  bhayaagati.m gacchati, lajjii ca hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2886: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, akusalo  ca hoti vinaye -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m  gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m  gacchati, kusalo ca hoti vinaye -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2887: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? ~natti.m na jaanaati,  ~nattiyaa kara.na.m na jaanaati, ~nattiyaa anussaavana.m na jaanaati, ~nattiyaa  samatha.m na jaanaati, ~nattiyaa vuupasama.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho,  upaali ^a^T0.0458^ea^, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? ~natti.m jaanaati, ~nattiyaa kara.na.m ^a^V0.0346^ea^ jaanaati, ~nattiyaa  anussaavana.m jaanaati, ~nattiyaa samatha.m jaanaati, ~nattiyaa vuupasama.m  jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe voharitabba.m.
text.2888: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? sutta.m na jaanaati,  suttaanuloma.m na jaanaati, vinaya.m na jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m na  jaanaati, na ca .thaanaa.thaanakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? sutta.m jaanaati, suttaanuloma.m jaanaati, vinaya.m  jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m jaanaati, .thaanaa.thaanakusalo ca hoti --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe  voharitabba.m.
text.2889: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0324^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na voharitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? dhamma.m na  jaanaati, dhammaanuloma.m na jaanaati, vinaya.m na jaanaati,  vinayaanuloma.m na jaanaati, na ca pubbaaparakusalo hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe na  voharitabba.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe  voharitabba.m. katamehi ^a^T0.0459^ea^ pa~ncahi? dhamma.m jaanaati, dhammaanuloma.m  jaanaati, vinaya.m jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m jaanaati, pubbaaparakusalo ca  hoti -- imehi ^a^P5.0187^ea^ kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa sa"nghe voharitabba''nti.
text.2893: [27] kamma.m vatthu.m alajjii ca, akusalo ca ~nattiyaa.
text.2894: [22] sutta.m na jaanaati dhamma.m, tatiyo vaggasa"ngahoti..
text.2896: [03] 425^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, adhammikaa  di.t.thaavikammaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, adhammikaa di.t.thaavikammaa.  katame pa~nca? anaapattiyaa di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, adesanaagaaminiyaa ^a^V0.0347^ea^   aapattiyaa di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, desitaaya aapattiyaa di.t.thi.m aavi  karoti, catuuhi pa~ncahi di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, mano maanasena di.t.thi.m  aavi karoti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa di.t.thaavikammaa.
text.2897: [03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa di.t.thaavikammaa. katame pa~nca?  aapattiyaa di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, desanaagaaminiyaa aapattiyaa di.t.thi.m  aavi karoti, adesitaaya aapattiyaa di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, na catuuhi  pa~ncahi di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, na mano maanasena di.t.thi.m aavi karoti  -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca dhammikaa di.t.thaavikammaa.
text.2898: [03] ``aparepi ^a^M0.0325^ea^, upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa  di.t.thaavikammaa. katame ^a^T0.0460^ea^ pa~nca? naanaasa.mvaasakassa santike di.t.thi.m  aavi karoti, naanaasiimaaya .thitassa santike di.t.thi.m aavi karoti,  apakatattassa santike di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, catuuhi pa~ncahi di.t.thi.m  aavi karoti, mano maanasena di.t.thi.m aavi karoti -- ime kho,  upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa di.t.thaavikammaa.
text.2899: [03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa di.t.thaavikammaa. katame pa~nca?  samaanasa.mvaasakassa santike di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, samaanasiimaaya  .thitassa santike di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, pakatattassa santike di.t.thi.m  aavi karoti, na catuuhi pa~ncahi di.t.thi.m aavi karoti, na mano  maanasena di.t.thi.m aavi karoti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca dhammikaa  di.t.thaavikammaati.
text.2900: [03] 426^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, adhammikaa  pa.tiggahaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, adhammikaa pa.tiggahaa. katame  pa~nca? kaayena diyyamaana.m kaayena appa.tiggahita.m, kaayena diyyamaana.m  kaayappa.tibaddhena appa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayena  appa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayappa.tibaddhena  appa.tiggahita.m, nissaggiyena diyyamaana.m kaayena vaa kaayappa.tibaddhena  vaa appa.tiggahita.m -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa pa.tiggahaa.
text.2901: [03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa pa.tiggahaa. katame pa~nca?  kaayena diyyamaana.m kaayena pa.tiggahita.m, kaayena diyyamaana.m  kaayappa.tibaddhena pa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayena  pa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayappa.tibaddhena pa.tiggahita.m,  nissaggiyena diyyamaana.m kaayena vaa kaayappa.tibaddhena vaa pa.tiggahita.m  -- ime ^a^T0.0461^ea^ kho, upaali, pa~nca dhammikaa pa.tiggahaa''ti.
text.2902: [03] 427^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^P5.0188^ea^ ^a^V0.0348^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  anatirittaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, anatirittaa. katame pa~nca?  {paaci0 239} akappiyakata.m hoti, appa.tiggahitakata.m hoti anuccaaritakata.m hoti,  ahatthapaase kata.m hoti, alameta.m sabbanti avutta.m hoti -- ime kho,  upaali, pa~nca anatirittaa.
text.2903: [03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, atirittaa. katame pa~nca? {paaci0 239} kappiyakata.m  hoti, pa.tiggahitakata.m hoti, uccaaritakata.m hoti, hatthapaase kata.m  hoti, alameta.m sabbanti vutta.m hoti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca  atirittaa''ti.
text.2904: [03] 428^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^M0.0326^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  aakaarehi pavaara.naa pa~n~naayatii''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, aakaarehi  pavaara.naa pa~n~naayati. katamehi pa~ncahi? {paaci0 239} asana.m pa~n~naayati, bhojana.m  pa~n~naayati, hatthapaase .thito abhiharati, pa.tikkhepo pa~n~naayati --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncahaakaarehi pavaara.naa pa~n~naayatii''ti.
text.2905: [03] 429^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, adhammikaa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, adhammikaa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa. katame pa~nca? bhikkhu paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno  hoti, paaraajikena codiyamaano sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapanno  pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho sa"nghaadisesena kaareti, adhammika.m  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m ^a^T0.0462^ea^. bhikkhu paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno hoti, paaraajikena  codiyamaano paacittiya.m...pe0... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno  pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho dukka.tena kaareti, adhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m.  bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m...pe0... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m  ajjhaapanno hoti. dukka.tena codiyamaano paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno  pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho paaraajikena kaareti, adhammika.m  pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. bhikkhu dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno hoti, dukka.tena  codiyamaano sa"nghaadisesa.m...pe0... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m  ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho paa.tidesaniiyena kaareti --  adhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. ime kho, upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa.
text.2906: [03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa. katame pa~nca?  bhikkhu paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno hoti, paaraajikena codiyamaano  paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho paaraajikena kaareti,  dhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m...pe0...  paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno hoti, dukka.tena  codiyamaano dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati ^a^V0.0349^ea^, ta.m sa"ngho dukka.tena  kaareti, dhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. ime kho, upaali, pa~nca dhammikaa  pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa''ti.
text.2907: [03] 430^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^P5.0189^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m  okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m ^a^M0.0327^ea^  kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca,  apakatatto ca, caavanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno ^a^T0.0463^ea^  okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m.
text.2908: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m  kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? lajjii ca  hoti, pa.n.dito ca, pakatatto ca, vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no  caavanaadhippaayo -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti.
text.2909: [03] 431^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo na saakacchitabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo na saakacchitabbo.  katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m na jaanaati, nidaana.m na jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m  na jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m na jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m na jaanaati  -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m  vinayo na saakacchitabbo.
text.2910: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo  saakacchitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m jaanaati, nidaana.m  jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m  jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  saddhi.m vinayo saakacchitabbo''ti.
text.2911: [03] 432^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, pa~nhaapucchaa''ti?  ``pa~ncimaa, upaali, pa~nhaapucchaa. katamaa pa~nca? mandattaa  momuuhattaa pa~nha.m pucchati, paapiccho icchaapakato pa~nha.m pucchati,  paribhavaa pa~nha.m pucchati ^a^T0.0464^ea^, a~n~naatukaamo pa~nha.m pucchati, sace me pa~nha.m  pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ^a^V0.0350^ea^ icceta.m kusala.m no ce pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva  byaakarissati ahamassa sammadeva byaakarissaamiiti pa~nha.m pucchati --  imaa kho, upaali, pa~nca pa~nhaapucchaa''ti.
text.2912: [03] 433^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, a~n~nabyaakara.naa''ti?  ``pa~ncime, upaali, a~n~nabyaakara.naa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa  momuuhattaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti, paapiccho icchaapakato a~n~na.m byaakaroti,  ummaadaa cittakkhepaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti ^a^M0.0328^ea^, adhimaanena  a~n~na.m byaakaroti, bhuuta.m a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca  a~n~nabyaakara.naa''ti.
text.2913: [03] 434^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, visuddhiyo''ti?  ``pa~ncimaa, upaali, visuddhiyo. katamaa pa~nca? nidaana.m  uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m aya.m pa.thamaa visuddhi, nidaana.m  uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m  aya.m dutiyaa visuddhi, nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani  uddisitvaa terasa sa"nghaadisese uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m  aya.m tatiyaa visuddhi, nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani  uddisitvaa terasa sa"nghaadisese uddisitvaa dve aniyate uddisitvaa  avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m aya.m catutthaa visuddhi, vitthaareneva pa~ncamii  -- imaa kho, upaali, pa~nca visuddhiyo''ti.
text.2914: [03] 435^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^P5.0190^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  bhojanaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, bhojanaa ^a^T0.0465^ea^. katame pa~nca?  odano, kummaaso, sattu, maccho, ma.msa.m -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca  bhojanaa''ti.
text.2921: [03] 436^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 399; a0 ni0  10.44} ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  kati dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo''ti?  ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m ^a^V0.0351^ea^   paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca? codakenupaali,  bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m --  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi kaayasamaacaarena  samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, sa.mvijjati nu kho me ^a^M0.0329^ea^  eso dhammo udaahu no''ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhu  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhena kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato  acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava  aayasmaa kaayika.m sikkhassuu'ti itissa bhavanti vattaaro.
text.2922: [03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro nu khomhi,  parisuddhenamhi vaciisamaacaarena ^a^T0.0466^ea^ samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena,  sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti. no ce, upaali,  bhikkhu parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhena vaciisamaacaarena  samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro --  `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa vaacasika.m sikkhassuu'ti itissa bhavanti  vattaaro.
text.2923: [03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `metta.m nu kho me citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m  sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu  no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhuno metta.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti  sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava  aayasmaa sabrahmacaariisu metta.m citta.m upa.t.thaapehii'ti itissa bhavanti  vattaaro.
text.2924: [03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `bahussuto nu khomhi sutadharo sutasannicayo,  ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m  sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaa  me dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa  di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu  no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo  sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa  pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m ^a^T0.0467^ea^ sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupassa dhammaa na bahussutaa honti dhaataa  vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, tassa  bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa aagama.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti  itissa bhavanti vattaaro.
text.2925: [03] ``puna ^a^M0.0330^ea^ ^a^V0.0352^ea^ capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m  codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ubhayaani kho me  paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini  suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso  dhammo udaahu no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhuno ubhayaani  paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini  suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso, `ida.m panaavuso kattha vutta.m  bhagavataa'ti iti pu.t.tho na sampaayati {na sampaadayati (ka0), na sampaadeti  (syaa0)}, tassa bhavanti vattaaro --  `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa vinaya.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti itissa bhavanti  vattaaro. codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme  ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo''ti.
text.2926: [03] 437^b^.^eb^ ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  kati dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti?  ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m  upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca? kaalena vakkhaami no  akaalena ^a^T0.0468^ea^, bhuutena vakkhaami no abhuutena, sa.nhena vakkhaami no  pharusena, atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami no anatthasa.mhitena, mettaacitto  vakkhaami no dosantaroti -- codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m  codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti.
text.2927: [03] 438^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 400} ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena  kati dhamme ajjhatta.m manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo''ti?  ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m  manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca? kaaru~n~nataa,  hitesitaa, anukampataa, aapattivu.t.thaanataa, vinayapurekkhaarataa --  codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m  manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo''ti.
text.2928: [03] 439^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m  kaatu''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m. katamehi  pa~ncahi? aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti ^a^M0.0331^ea^,  aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti, aparisuddhaajiivo hoti, baalo hoti  abyatto, na pa.tibalo anuyu~njiyamaano anuyoga.m daatu.m -- imehi  ^a^P5.0191^ea^ kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m.
text.2929: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali ^a^V0.0353^ea^, a"ngehi ^a^T0.0469^ea^ samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m  kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti,  parisuddhaajiivo hoti, pa.n.dito hoti byatto pa.tibalo anuyu~njiyamaano  anuyoga.m daatu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti.
text.2930: [03] 440^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 398} ``attaadaana.m aadaatukaamena, bhante, bhikkhunaa  katiha"ngehi samannaagata.m attaadaana.m aadaatabba''nti? ``attaadaana.m  aadaatukaamenupaali, bhikkhunaa pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m {pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m (sii0  syaa0)} attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.  katame pa~nca {katamehi pa~ncahi (syaa0)}? attaadaana.m aadaatukaamena, upaali, bhikkhunaa eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo, kaalo  nu kho ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `akaalo ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m no  kaalo'ti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.
text.2931: [03] ``sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati --  `kaalo ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m no akaalo'ti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa  uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo  bhuuta.m nu kho ida.m attaadaana.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhuuta.m ida.m attaadaana.m no bhuuta'nti,  na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.
text.2932: [03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^T0.0470^ea^ eva.m jaanaati --  `bhuuta.m ida.m attaadaana.m no abhuuta'nti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa uttari  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo,  atthasa.mhita.m nu kho ida.m attaadaana.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali,  bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati ^a^M0.0332^ea^ --' anatthasa.mhita.m ida.m attaadaana.m no atthasa.mhita'nti, na ta.m, upaali,  attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.
text.2933: [03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati --  `atthasa.mhita.m ida.m attaadaana.m no anatthasa.mhita'nti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa  uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano  labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe udaahu  no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati --  `ima.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano ^a^V0.0354^ea^ na labhissaami sandi.t.the  sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe'ti, na ta.m, upaali,  attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.
text.2934: [03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati --  `ida.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte  bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe'ti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa uttari  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato bhavissati  sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado sa"nghabhedo  sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na.m udaahu no'ti. sace,  upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho me  attaadaana.m aadiyato bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho  viggaho vivaado ^a^T0.0471^ea^ sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m  sa"nghanaanaakara.na'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.
text.2935: [03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati --  `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato na bhavissati sa"nghassa  tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji  sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na'nti, ta.m aadaatabba.m, upaali, attaadaana.m.  eva.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m kho, upaali, attaadaana.m aadinna.m pacchaapi  avippa.tisaarakara.m bhavissatii''ti.
text.2936: [03] 441^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hotii''ti?  ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m  bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa hoti,  paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu  vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati ^a^M0.0333^ea^  sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo; ye te dhammaa  aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m  kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti tathaaruupassa dhammaa  bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa  suppa.tividdhaa, ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena  svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso  anubya~njanaso; vinaye kho pana .thito hoti asa.mhiiro; pa.tibalo  hoti ^a^T0.0472^ea^ ubho atthapaccatthike assaasetu.m sa~n~naapetu.m nijjhaapetu.m pekkhetu.m  pasaadetu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti.
text.2937: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^V0.0355^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi?  parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti,  parisuddhaajiivo hoti, pa.n.dito hoti byatto, pa.tibalo  anuyu~njiyamaano anuyoga.m daatu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti.
text.2938: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi?  vatthu.m jaanaati, nidaana.m jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m jaanaati ^a^P5.0192^ea^,  padapaccaabha.t.tha.m jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m jaanaati --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m  bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hotii''ti.
text.2939: [03] 442^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? sutta.m na jaanaati,  suttaanuloma.m na jaanaati, vinaya.m na jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m na  jaanaati, na ca .thaanaa.thaanakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2940: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena ^a^T0.0473^ea^ bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? sutta.m jaanaati, suttaanuloma.m jaanaati, vinaya.m  jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m ^a^M0.0334^ea^ jaanaati, .thaanaa.thaanakusalo ca  hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  anuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2941: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  naanuyu~njitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? dhamma.m na jaanaati, dhammaanuloma.m  na jaanaati, vinaya.m na jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m na jaanaati, na ca  pubbaaparakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2942: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? dhamma.m jaanaati, dhammaanuloma.m jaanaati, vinaya.m  jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m jaanaati, pubbaaparakusalo ^a^V0.0356^ea^ ca hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2943: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  naanuyu~njitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m na jaanaati, nidaana.m na  jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m na jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m na jaanaati,  anusandhivacanapatha.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2944: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m jaanaati, nidaana.m jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m  jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m jaanaati -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa ^a^T0.0474^ea^ anuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2945: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  naanuyu~njitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m na jaanaati,  aapattisamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa payoga.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa  vuupasama.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa na vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2946: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m jaanaati, aapattisamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati,  aapattiyaa payoga.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa vuupasama.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2947: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0335^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhikara.na.m na  jaanaati, adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa payoga.m na  jaanaati, adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa na  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa naanuyu~njitabba.m.
text.2948: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? adhikara.na.m jaanaati, adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati,  adhikara.nassa payoga.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa ^a^V0.0357^ea^ vuupasama.m jaanaati,  adhikara.nassa vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anuyu~njitabba''nti.
text.2953: [22] sutta.m dhamma.m puna vatthu~nca, aapatti adhikara.nena caati..
text.2955: [03] 443^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^P5.0193^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  aara~n~nikaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, aara~n~nikaa {a0 ni0  5.181; pari0 325}. katame pa~nca?  mandattaa momuuhattaa aara~n~niko hoti, paapiccho icchaapakato  aara~n~niko hoti, ummaadaa cittakkhepaa aara~n~niko hoti, va.n.nita.m  buddhehi buddhasaavakehiiti aara~n~niko hoti, api ca appiccha~n~neva  nissaaya santu.t.thi~n~neva nissaaya -- sallekha~n~neva nissaaya  paviveka~n~neva nissaaya ^a^V0.0358^ea^ idamatthita~n~neva nissaaya aara~n~niko hoti --  ime kho, upaali, pa~nca aara~n~nikaa''ti.
text.2956: [03] ``kati nu kho, bhante, pi.n.dapaatikaati...pe0... kati nu  kho, bhante, pa.msukuulikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  rukkhamuulikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  sosaanikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  abbhokaasikaati...pe0... kati ^a^M0.0336^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  teciivarikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  sapadaanacaarikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  nesajjikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  yathaasanthatikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  ekaasanikaati...pe0... kati nu kho, bhante,  khalupacchaabhattikaati...pe0... kati ^a^T0.0476^ea^ nu kho, bhante, pattapi.n.dikaati?  pa~ncime, upaali, pattapi.n.dikaa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa  pattapi.n.diko hoti, paapiccho icchaapakato pattapi.n.diko hoti,  ummaadaa cittakkhepaa pattapi.n.diko hoti, va.n.nita.m buddhehi  buddhasaavakehiiti pattapi.n.diko hoti, api ca appiccha~n~neva nissaaya  santu.t.thi~n~neva nissaaya sallekha~n~neva nissaaya paviveka~n~neva nissaaya  idamatthita~n~neva nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti -- ime kho, upaali,  pa~nca pattapi.n.dikaa''ti.
text.2963: [03] 444^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, musaavaadaa''ti?  ``pa~ncime, upaali, musaavaadaa. katame pa~nca? atthi musaavaado  paaraajikagaamii, atthi musaavaado sa"nghaadisesagaamii, atthi musaavaado  thullaccayagaamii, atthi musaavaado paacittiyagaamii, atthi musaavaado  dukka.tagaamii -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca musaavaadaa''ti.
text.2964: [03] 445^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno sa"nghamajjhe uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa  .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa ^a^T0.0477^ea^ bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m,  maa vivaada'nti ^a^V0.0359^ea^ omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa vaa  kaatabbaa''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  sa"nghamajjhe ^a^M0.0337^ea^ uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa .thapentassa --  `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m, maa vivaada'nti  omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa vaa kaatabbaa. katamehi  pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca,  caavanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno sa"nghamajjhe uposatha.m vaa  pavaara.na.m vaa .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa  viggaha.m, maa vivaada'nti omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa  vaa kaatabbaa.
text.2965: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  sa"nghamajjhe uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu,  maa bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m, maa vivaada'nti omadditvaa  sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa vaa kaatabbaa. katamehi pa~ncahi?  aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro ^a^P5.0194^ea^  hoti, aparisuddhaajiivo hoti, baalo hoti abyatto,  bha.n.danakaarako hoti kalahakaarako -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno sa"nghamajjhe uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa  .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m,  maa vivaada'nti omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho ^a^T0.0478^ea^ vaa pavaara.naa vaa  kaatabbaa''ti.
text.2966: [03] 446^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno anuyogo na daatabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno anuyogo na daatabbo. katamehi  pa~ncahi? aapattaanaapatti.m na jaanaati, lahukagaruka.m aapatti.m na  jaanaati, saavasesaanavasesa.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m  na jaanaati, sappa.tikammaapa.tikamma.m aapatti.m na jaanaati -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno anuyogo na  daatabbo.
text.2967: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno anuyogo  daatabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapattaanaapatti.m jaanaati, lahukagaruka.m  aapatti.m jaanaati, saavasesaanavasesa.m aapatti.m jaanaati, du.t.thullaadu.t.thulla.m  aapatti.m jaanaati, sappa.tikammaapa.tikamma.m aapatti.m jaanaati -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno anuyogo  daatabbo''ti.
text.2968: [03] 447^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^M0.0338^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  aakaarehi bhikkhu aapatti.m aapajjatii''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, aakaarehi  bhikkhu aapatti.m aapajjati. katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjitaa,  a~n~naa.nataa, kukkuccapakatataa, akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaa, kappiye  akappiyasa~n~nitaa -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncahaakaarehi bhikkhu  aapatti.m aapajjati.
text.2969: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncahaakaarehi bhikkhu aapatti.m aapajjati.  katamehi pa~ncahi ^a^T0.0479^ea^? adassanena, assavanena, pasuttakataa,  tathaasa~n~nii, satisammosaa -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncahaakaarehi  bhikkhu aapatti.m aapajjatii''ti.
text.2970: [03] 448^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, veraa''ti?  ``pa~ncime, upaali, veraa. katame pa~nca? paa.naatipaato ^a^V0.0360^ea^,  adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaaro, musaavaado, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaana.m  -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca veraa''ti.
text.2971: [03] ``kati nu kho, bhante, verama.niyo''ti? ``pa~ncimaa,  upaali, verama.niyo. katamaa pa~nca? paa.naatipaataa verama.nii {verama.ni (ka0)},  adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii, musaavaadaa  verama.nii, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nii -- imaa kho, upaali,  pa~nca verama.niyo''ti.
text.2972: [03] 449^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, byasanaanii''ti?  ``pa~ncimaani, upaali, byasanaani. {pari0 325; a0 ni0  5.130} katamaani pa~nca?  ~naatibyasana.m, bhogabyasana.m, rogabyasana.m, siilabyasana.m, di.t.thibyasana.m --  imaani kho, upaali, pa~nca byasanaanii''ti.
text.2973: [03] ``kati nu kho, bhante, sampadaa''ti? ``pa~ncimaa, upaali,  sampadaa. {pari0 325; a0 ni0  5.130} katamaa pa~nca? ~naatisampadaa, bhogasampadaa,  aarogyasampadaa, siilasampadaa, di.t.thisampadaa -- imaa kho, upaali,  pa~nca sampadaa''ti.
text.2980: [03] 450^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^M0.0339^ea^ nu kho, bhante,  a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m  kaatabba''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m kaatabba.m, avandiyo so bhikkhu  bhikkhunisa"nghena. katamehi pa~ncahi? vivaritvaa kaaya.m bhikkhuniina.m  dasseti, uuru.m dasseti, a"ngajaata.m dasseti, ubho a.msakuu.te dasseti,  obhaasati, gihii ^a^V0.0361^ea^ sampayojeti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m kaatabba.m.  avandiyo so bhikkhu bhikkhunisa"nghena.
text.2981: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m kaatabba.m, avandiyo so bhikkhu  bhikkhunisa"nghena. katamehi pa~ncahi? bhikkhuniina.m alaabhaaya  parisakkati, bhikkhuniina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuniina.m avaasaaya  parisakkati, bhikkhuniyo akkosati paribhaasati, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniihi  bhedeti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m kaatabba.m, avandiyo so bhikkhu  bhikkhunisa"nghena.
text.2982: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno  bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m kaatabba.m, avandiyo so ^a^T0.0481^ea^ bhikkhu  bhikkhunisa"nghena. katamehi pa~ncahi? bhikkhuniina.m alaabhaaya  parisakkati, bhikkhuniina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuniina.m avaasaaya  parisakkati, bhikkhuniyo akkosati paribhaasati, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniihi  sampayojeti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa  bhikkhuno bhikkhunisa"ngheneva kamma.m kaatabba.m, avandiyo so bhikkhu  bhikkhunisa"nghenaa''ti.
text.2983: [03] 451^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagataaya  bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba''nti? pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagataaya  bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? vivaritvaa kaaya.m  bhikkhuuna.m dasseti, uuru.m dasseti, a"ngajaata.m dasseti, ubho a.msakuu.te  dasseti, obhaasati, gihii sampayojeti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagataaya bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2984: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0340^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagataaya bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  bhikkhuuna.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m anatthaaya parisakkati,  bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati,  bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuhi bhedeti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagataaya bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba.m.
text.2985: [01] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagataaya  bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? bhikkhuuna.m alaabhaaya  parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m anatthaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya ^a^V0.0362^ea^   parisakkati, bhikkhuu akkosati ^a^T0.0482^ea^ paribhaasati, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuhi  sampayojeti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^P5.0196^ea^  samannaagataaya bhikkhuniyaa kamma.m kaatabba''nti.
text.2986: [03] 452^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo.  katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca,  caavanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na  .thapetabbo.
text.2987: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi?  aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti,  aparisuddhaajiivo hoti, baalo hoti, abyatto, na pa.tibalo  anuyu~njiyamaano anuyoga.m daatu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo.
text.2988: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? kaayikena  anaacaarena samannaagato hoti, vaacasikena anaacaarena samannaagato  hoti, kaayikavaacasikena anaacaarena samannaagato hoti, bhikkhuniina.m  akkosakaparibhaasako hoti, bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m sa.msa.t.tho viharati  ananulomikena sa.msaggena -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena ^a^T0.0483^ea^ bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo.
text.2989: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0341^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na .thapetabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi?  alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca, bha.n.danakaarako ca hoti  kalahakaarako, sikkhaaya ca na paripuurikaarii -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na  .thapetabbo''ti.
text.2990: [03] 453^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na gahetabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na gahetabbo.  katamehi pa~ncahi? kaayikena anaacaarena samannaagato hoti,  vaacasikena anaacaarena samannaagato hoti, kaayikavaacasikena  anaacaarena samannaagato hoti, bhikkhuniina.m akkosakaparibhaasako ^a^V0.0363^ea^ hoti,  bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m sa.msa.t.tho viharati ananulomikena sa.msaggena --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m  ovaado na gahetabbo.
text.2991: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  bhikkhuniina.m ovaado na gahetabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca  hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca, gamiko vaa hoti, gilaano vaa --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa bhikkhuniina.m  ovaado na gahetabbo''ti.
text.2992: [03] 454^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^T0.0484^ea^ nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena  bhikkhunaa saddhi.m na saakacchitabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m na saakacchitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi?  na asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena  samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena  samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti,  na asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m na  saakacchitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m  saakacchitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? asekkhena siilakkhandhena  samannaagato hoti, asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti,  asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti ^a^M0.0342^ea^,  asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena  vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena ^a^P5.0197^ea^ samannaagato hoti --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m  saakacchitabbo.
text.2993: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa  saddhi.m na saakacchitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? na  atthapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, na dhammapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, na  niruttipa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, na pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti,  yathaavimutta.m citta.m na paccavekkhitaa -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m na saakacchitabbo.  pa~ncahupaali ^a^T0.0485^ea^, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m saakacchitabbo.  katamehi pa~ncahi? atthapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, dhammapa.tisambhidaapatto  hoti, niruttipa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti,  yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhitaa -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m saakacchitabbo''ti.
text.2997: [27] bhikkhuniina.m tayo kammaa, na .thapetabbaa dve dukaa.
text.2998: [22] na gahetabbaa dve vuttaa, saakacchaasu ca dve dukaati..
text.3000: [03] 455^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi?  na atthakusalo hoti, na dhammakusalo hoti, na niruttikusalo  hoti, na bya~njanakusalo hoti, na pubbaaparakusalo hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na  sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya  sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? atthakusalo hoti, dhammakusalo  hoti, niruttikusalo ^a^M0.0343^ea^ hoti, bya~njanakusalo hoti,  pubbaaparakusalo hoti ^a^T0.0486^ea^ -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.
text.3001: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? kodhano hoti  kodhaabhibhuuto, makkhii hoti makkhaabhibhuuto, pa.laasii hoti  pa.laasaabhibhuuto, issukii hoti issaabhibhuuto, sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti  aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi  pa~ncahi? na kodhano hoti na kodhaabhibhuuto, na makkhii hoti na  makkhaabhibhuuto, na pa.laasii hoti na pa.laasaabhibhuuto, na issukii hoti  na issaabhibhuuto, asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti anaadhaanaggaahii  suppa.tinissaggii -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.
text.3002: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^P5.0198^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi?  kuppati, byaapajjati, pati.t.thiyati, kopa.m janeti, akhamo hoti  apadakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo ^a^V0.0365^ea^. katamehi  pa~ncahi? na kuppati, na byaapajjati, na pati.t.thiyati, na kopa.m  janeti, khamo hoti padakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^T0.0487^ea^ samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.
text.3003: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? pasaaretaa hoti  no saaretaa, anokaasakamma.m kaaretvaa pavattaa hoti, na yathaadhamme  yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye  yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti, na yathaadi.t.thiyaa byaakataa hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na  sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya  sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? saaretaa hoti no pasaaretaa,  okaasakamma.m ^a^M0.0344^ea^ kaaretvaa pavattaa hoti, yathaadhamma.m  yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, yathaadhamme yathaavinaye  yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti, yathaadi.t.thiyaa byaakataa hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya  sammannitabbo.
text.3004: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m  gacchati, dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati,  alajjii ca hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi?  na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati,  na bhayaagati.m gacchati, lajjii ^a^T0.0448^ea^ ca hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.
text.3005: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m  gacchati, dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati,  akusalo ca hoti vinaye -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi  pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na  mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati, kusalo ca hoti vinaye  -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya  sammannitabbo''ti.
text.3006: [03] 456^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^V0.0366^ea^ nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  sutta.m na jaanaati, suttaanuloma.m na jaanaati, vinaya.m na jaanaati,  vinayaanuloma.m na jaanaati, na ca .thaana.thaanakusalo hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m  gacchati. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva  sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? sutta.m jaanaati, suttaanuloma.m  jaanaati, vinaya.m jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m ^a^M0.0345^ea^ jaanaati,  .thaanaa.thaanakusalo ca ^a^T0.0489^ea^ hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.3007: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? dhamma.m na jaanaati,  dhammaanuloma.m ^a^P5.0199^ea^ jaanaati, vinaya.m na jaanaati,  vinayaanuloma.m na jaanaati, na ca pubbaaparakusalo hoti -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m  gacchati. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva  sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? dhamma.m jaanaati, dhammaanuloma.m  jaanaati, vinaya.m jaanaati, vinayaanuloma.m jaanaati, pubbaaparakusalo ca  hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.3008: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m na jaanaati,  nidaana.m na jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m na jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m na jaanaati,  anusandhivacanapatha.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  vatthu.m jaanaati, nidaana.m jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m  jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.3009: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato ^a^T0.0490^ea^ bhikkhu  baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m na  jaanaati, aapattisamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa payoga.m na jaanaati,  aapattiyaa vuupasama.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa na vinicchayakusalo hoti  -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu baalotveva  sa"nkha.m gacchati. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m jaanaati ^a^V0.0367^ea^,   aapattisamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa payoga.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa  vuupasama.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
text.3010: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0346^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhikara.na.m  na jaanaati, adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa payoga.m na  jaanaati, adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa na  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu baalotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi?  adhikara.na.m jaanaati, adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa  payoga.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu pa.n.ditotveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti.
text.3013: [21] na ^a^T0.0491^ea^ atthakusalo ceva, kodhano kuppatii ca yo.
text.3016: [22] dve dve pakaasitaa sabbe, ka.nhasukka.m vijaanathaati..
text.3018: [03] 457^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi?  aapatti.m ^a^P5.0200^ea^ na jaanaati, aapattisamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati,  aapattiyaa payoga.m na jaanaati, aapattiyaa vuupasama.m na jaanaati,  aapattiyaa na vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? aapatti.m ^a^V0.0368^ea^ jaanaati, aapattisamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati,  aapattiyaa payoga.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa vuupasama.m jaanaati, aapattiyaa  ^a^M0.0347^ea^ vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3019: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m ^a^T0.0492^ea^  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhikara.na.m na jaanaati,  adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa payoga.m na jaanaati,  adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m na jaanaati, adhikara.nassa na  vinicchayakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3020: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhikara.na.m jaanaati,  adhikara.nasamu.t.thaana.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa payoga.m jaanaati,  adhikara.nassa vuupasama.m jaanaati, adhikara.nassa vinicchayakusalo hoti  -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3021: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, alajjii ca  hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m gacchati,  na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati,  lajjii ca hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3022: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati ^a^T0.0493^ea^, appassuto  ca hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m  gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m  gacchati, bahussuto ca hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3023: [03] ``aparehipi ^a^M0.0348^ea^ ^a^V0.0369^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m na  jaanaati, nidaana.m na jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m na jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m na  jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.  pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.  katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m jaanaati, nidaana.m jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m  jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m jaanaati -- imehi  kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasametu.m.
text.3024: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, akusalo  ca hoti vinaye -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na  chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na  bhayaagati.m gacchati, kusalo ca hoti vinaye -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3025: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, puggalagaru  hoti no sa"nghagaru -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. pa~ncahupaali ^a^P5.0201^ea^,  a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m ^a^T0.0494^ea^. katamehi  pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na  mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati, sa"nghagaru hoti no  puggalagaru -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m.
text.3026: [03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m  adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati,  dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, aamisagaru  hoti no saddhammagaru -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato  bhikkhu naala.m adhikara.na.m ^a^M0.0349^ea^ vuupasametu.m. pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu.m. katamehi  pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na ^a^V0.0370^ea^   mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati, saddhammagaru hoti no ^a^T0.0495^ea^  aamisagaru -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu  ala.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametu''nti.
text.3027: [03] 458^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, aakaarehi sa"ngho  bhijjatii''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, aakaarehi sa"ngho bhijjati.  katamehi pa~ncahi? kammena, uddesena, voharanto, anussaavanena,  salaakaggaahena -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncahaakaarehi sa"ngho  bhijjatii''ti.
text.3028: [03] ``sa"ngharaaji sa"ngharaajiiti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu  kho, bhante, sa"ngharaaji hoti no ca sa"nghabhedo? kittaavataa ca pana  sa"ngharaaji ceva hoti sa"nghabhedo caa''ti? ``pa~n~natteta.m, upaali,  mayaa aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aagantukavatta.m. eva.m supa~n~natte kho,  upaali, mayaa sikkhaapade aagantukaa bhikkhuu aagantukavatte na vattanti.  evampi kho, upaali, sa"ngharaaji hoti no ca sa"nghabhedo.  pa~n~natteta.m, upaali, mayaa aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aavaasikavatta.m. eva.m  supa~n~natte kho, upaali, mayaa sikkhaapade aavaasikaa bhikkhuu  aavaasikavatte na vattanti. evampi kho, upaali, sa"ngharaaji hoti  no ca sa"nghabhedo. pa~n~natteta.m upaali mayaa bhikkhuuna.m bhattagge  bhattaggavatta.m -- yathaavu.d.dha.m yathaaratta.m yathaapatiruupa.m aggaasana.m aggodaka.m  aggapi.n.da.m. eva.m supa~n~natte kho, upaali, mayaa sikkhaapade navaa  bhikkhuu bhattagge theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m aasana.m pa.tibaahanti. evampi kho,  upaali, sa"ngharaaji hoti no ca sa"nghabhedo. pa~n~natteta.m, upaali,  mayaa bhikkhuuna.m senaasane ^a^T0.0496^ea^ senaasanavatta.m -- yathaavu.d.dha.m yathaaratta.m  yathaapatiruupa.m. eva.m supa~n~natte kho, upaali, mayaa sikkhaapade navaa  bhikkhuu theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m pa.tibaahanti. evampi kho,  upaali, sa"ngharaaji hoti no ca sa"nghabhedo. pa~n~natteta.m, upaali,  mayaa bhikkhuuna.m antosiimaaya eka.m uposatha.m eka.m pavaara.na.m eka.m  sa"nghakamma.m eka.m kammaakamma.m. eva.m supa~n~natte kho, upaali, mayaa  sikkhaapade tattheva antosiimaaya aavenibhaava.m {aave.nibhaava.m (sii0 syaa0)} karitvaa ga.na.m bandhitvaa  ^a^M0.0350^ea^ aaveni.m {aave.ni (sii0 syaa0)} uposatha.m karonti  aaveni.m pavaara.na.m ^a^P5.0202^ea^ karonti aaveni.m sa"nghakamma.m karonti  aaveni.m kammaakammaani karonti. eva.m kho, upaali, sa"ngharaaji ceva  hoti sa"nghabhedo caa''ti.

text.3033: [22] bhijjati sa"ngharaaji ca, sa"nghabhedo tatheva caati..
text.3035: [03] 459^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 354-355; a0 ni0  10.38 aadayo} ``katihi  nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  sa"nghabhedako aapaayiko nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho''ti?  ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato sa"nghabhedako aapaayiko nerayiko  kappa.t.tho atekiccho. katamehi pa~ncahi? idhupaali, bhikkhu adhamma.m  dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipeti, avinaya.m vinayoti  diipeti, vinaya.m avinayoti ^a^T0.0497^ea^ diipeti, vinidhaaya di.t.thi.m kammena --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato sa"nghabhedako aapaayiko  nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho.
