text.3066: [03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? na chandaagati.m  gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m  gacchati, sa"nghika.m na puggalikaparibhogena paribhu~njati -- imehi kho,  upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti.
text.3067: [03] 462^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, adhammikaa  vinayabyaakara.naa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, adhammikaa  vinayabyaakara.naa. katame pa~nca? idhupaali, bhikkhu adhamma.m  dhammoti pari.naameti, dhamma.m adhammoti pari.naameti, avinaya.m  vinayoti pari.naameti, vinaya.m avinayoti pari.naameti ^a^V0.0376^ea^, apa~n~natta.m  pa~n~naapeti, pa~n~natta.m samucchindati -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca  adhammikaa vinayabyaakara.naa. pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa  vinayabyaakara.naa. katame pa~nca? idhupaali, bhikkhu adhamma.m  adhammoti pari.naameti, dhamma.m dhammoti pari.naameti, avinaya.m ^a^T0.0504^ea^  avinayoti pari.naameti, vinaya.m vinayoti pari.naameti, apa~n~natta.m na  pa~n~napeti, pa~n~natta.m na samucchindati -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca  dhammikaa vinayabyaakara.naa''ti.
text.3068: [03] 463^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0  5.272-285} ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali,  a"ngehi samannaagato bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.  katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m gacchati, dosaagati.m gacchati,  mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, uddi.t.thaanuddi.t.tha.m na jaanaati --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

text.3070: [03] 464^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  senaasanapa~n~naapako...pe0... bha.n.daagaariko...pe0...  ciivarapa.tiggaahako...pe0... ciivarabhaajako...pe0...  yaagubhaajako...pe0... phalabhaajako...pe0... khajjabhaajako...pe0...  appamattakavissajjako...pe0... saa.tiyaggaahaapako...pe0...  pattaggaahaapako...pe0... aaraamikapesako...pe0... saama.nerapesako  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi  samannaagato saama.nerapesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.  katamehi pa~ncahi? chandaagati.m ^a^T0.0505^ea^ gacchati, dosaagati.m gacchati,  mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati, pesitaapesita.m na jaanaati --  imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato saama.nerapesako yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m niraye. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato  saama.nerapesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi?  na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati,  na bhayaagati.m gacchati, pesitaapesita.m jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali,  pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato saama.nerapesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m  sagge''ti.
text.3078: [03] 465^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, aanisa.msaa  kathinatthaare''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, aanisa.msaa kathinatthaare.  katame pa~nca? anaamantacaaro, asamaadaanacaaro, ga.nabhojana.m,  yaavadatthaciivara.m, yo ca tattha ciivaruppaado ^a^M0.0357^ea^ so nesa.m  bhavissati -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca aanisa.msaa kathinatthaare''ti.
text.3079: [03] 466^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, aadiinavaa  mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m ^a^T0.0506^ea^ okkamato''ti? ``pa~ncime,  upaali, aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamato.  katame pa~nca? dukkha.m supati, dukkha.m pa.tibujjhati, paapaka.m supina.m  passati, devataa na rakkhanti, asuci muccati -- ime kho, upaali,  pa~nca aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamato.  pa~ncime, upaali, aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa sampajaanassa nidda.m  okkamato. katame pa~nca? sukha.m supati, sukha.m pa.tibujjhati, na  paapaka.m supina.m passati, devataa rakkhanti, asuci na muccati -- ime  kho, upaali, pa~nca aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa sampajaanassa nidda.m  okkamato''ti.
text.3080: [03] 467^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, avandiyaa''ti?  ``pa~ncime, upaali, avandiyaa. katame pa~nca? antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho  avandiyo, racchagato avandiyo, otamasiko avandiyo,  asamannaaharanto avandiyo, sutto avandiyo -- ime kho, upaali,  pa~nca avandiyaa.
text.3081: [03] ``aparepi, upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa. katame pa~nca?  yaagupaane avandiyo, bhattagge avandiyo, ekaavatto avandiyo,  a~n~navihito avandiyo, naggo avandiyo -- ime kho, upaali,  pa~nca avandiyaa.
text.3082: [03] ``aparepi ^a^V0.0378^ea^, upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa. katame pa~nca?  khaadanto avandiyo, bhu~njanto avandiyo, uccaara.m karonto avandiyo,  passaava.m karonto avandiyo, ukkhittako avandiyo -- ime kho,  upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa.
text.3083: [03] ``aparepi, upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa ^a^T0.0507^ea^. katame pa~nca? pure  upasampannena pacchaa upasampanno avandiyo, anupasampanno avandiyo,  naanaasa.mvaasako vu.d.dhataro adhammavaadii avandiyo, maatugaamo  avandiyo, pa.n.dako avandiyo -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa.
text.3084: [03] ``aparepi, upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa. katame pa~nca?  paarivaasiko avandiyo, muulaayapa.tikassanaaraho avandiyo,  maanattaaraho avandiyo, maanattacaariko avandiyo, abbhaanaaraho  avandiyo -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca avandiyaa''ti.
text.3085: [03] 468^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^P5.0206^ea^ ^a^M0.0358^ea^ nu  kho, bhante, vandiyaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, vandiyaa. katame  pa~nca? pacchaa upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo, naanaasa.mvaasako  vu.d.dhataro dhammavaadii vandiyo, aacariyo vandiyo, upajjhaayo  vandiyo, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya  sadevamanussaaya tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho vandiyo -- ime kho,  upaali, pa~nca vandiyaa''ti.
text.3086: [03] 469^b^.^eb^ ``navakatarena, bhante, bhikkhunaa vu.d.dhatarassa  bhikkhuno paade vandantena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paadaa  vanditabbaa''ti? ``navakatarenupaali, bhikkhunaa vu.d.dhatarassa  bhikkhuno paade vandantena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paadaa  vanditabbaa. katame pa~nca? navakatarenupaali, bhikkhunaa vu.d.dhatarassa  bhikkhuno paade vandantena eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa, a~njali.m  paggahetvaa ^a^T0.0508^ea^, ubhohi paa.nitalehi paadaani parisambaahantena, pema~nca  gaarava~nca upa.t.thaapetvaa paadaa vanditabbaa -- navakatarenupaali bhikkhunaa  vu.d.dhatarassa bhikkhuno paade vandantena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m  upa.t.thaapetvaa paadaa vanditabbaa''ti.
text.3090: [22] pure ca paarivaasi ca, vandiyo vanditabbakanti..
text.3094: [22] codanaa ca dhuta"ngaa ca, musaa bhikkhunimeva ca..

text.3100: [03] pa.thama.m paaraajika.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? pa.thama.m  paaraajika.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati. kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato.
text.3101: [03] dutiya.m paaraajika.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? dutiya.m  paaraajika.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca ^a^T0.0510^ea^ vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3102: [03] tatiya.m paaraajika.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? tatiya.m  paaraajika.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3103: [03] catuttha.m ^a^V0.0381^ea^ paaraajika.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? catuttha.m  paaraajika.m tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati ^a^M0.0360^ea^, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati.
text.3106: [03] 471^b^.^eb^ upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocentassa sa"nghaadiseso  katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? upakkamitvaa asuci.m mocentassa  sa"nghaadiseso ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thaati, na vaacato.
text.3107: [03] maatugaamena saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso  katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? maatugaamena saddhi.m kaayasa.msagga.m  samaapajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato  ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato.
text.3108: [03] maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi obhaasentassa sa"nghaadiseso  katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? maatugaama.m du.t.thullaahi vaacaahi  obhaasentassa sa"nghaadiseso tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati -- siyaa  kaayato ca ^a^T0.0511^ea^ cittato ca samu.t.thaati na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ^a^P5.0208^ea^  ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3109: [03] maatugaamassa santike attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasantassa  sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? maatugaamassa santike  attakaamapaaricariyaaya va.n.na.m bhaasantassa sa"nghaadiseso tiihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.3110: [03] sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati? sa~ncaritta.m samaapajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso chahi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thaati, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa  vaacato samu.t.thaati, na kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato  ca samu.t.thaati, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na  vaacato; siyaa ^a^V0.0382^ea^ vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati ^a^M0.0361^ea^, na  kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3111: [03] sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kaaraapentassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? sa~n~naacikaaya ku.ti.m kaaraapentassa  sa"nghaadiseso chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.3112: [03] mahallaka.m vihaara.m kaaraapentassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thaati? mahallaka.m vihaara.m kaaraapentassa sa"nghaadiseso chahi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.3113: [03] bhikkhu.m amuulakena paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msentassa  sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? bhikkhu.m amuulakena  paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msentassa sa"nghaadiseso tiihi samu.t.thaanehi ^a^T0.0512^ea^  samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.3114: [03] bhikkhu.m a~n~nabhaagiyassa adhikara.nassa ki~nci desa.m lesamatta.m  upaadaaya paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msentassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? bhikkhu.m a~n~nabhaagiyassa adhikara.nassa ki~nci  desa.m lesamatta.m upaadaaya paaraajikena dhammena anuddha.msentassa  sa"nghaadiseso tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati...pe0....
text.3115: [03] sa"nghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati?  sa"nghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3116: [03] bhedakaanuvattakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantaana.m sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati?  bhedakaanuvattakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantaana.m sa"nghaadiseso ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati --  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3117: [03] dubbacassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na  pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati?  dubbacassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantassa ^a^V0.0383^ea^   sa"nghaadiseso ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3118: [01] kuladuusakassa ^a^M0.0362^ea^ bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya na pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso katihi  samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? kuladuusakassa bhikkhuno yaavatatiya.m  samanubhaasanaaya ^a^T0.0513^ea^ na pa.tinissajjantassa sa"nghaadiseso ekena samu.t.thaanena  samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati.
text.3120: [03] 472^b^.^eb^ ...pe0... anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa  passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karontassa dukka.ta.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati?  anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  karontassa dukka.ta.m ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato  ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato.
text.3123: [03] 473^b^.^eb^ cattaaro paaraajikaa katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thanti? cattaaro paaraajikaa tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa  kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti.
text.3124: [03] terasa ^a^P5.0209^ea^ sa"nghaadisesaa katihi samu.t.thaanehi  samu.t.thanti? terasa sa"nghaadisesaa chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti --  siyaa kaayato samu.t.thanti, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa vaacato  samu.t.thanti, na kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato na  samu.t.thanti, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na  vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa ^a^T0.0514^ea^  kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti.
text.3125: [03] dve aniyataa katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? dve aniyataa  tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti ^a^V0.0384^ea^ -- siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; ^a^M0.0363^ea^ siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti.
text.3126: [03] ti.msa nissaggiyaa paacittiyaa katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti?  ti.msa nissaggiyaa paacittiyaa chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa  kaayato samu.t.thanti, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa vaacato samu.t.thanti,  na kaayato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thanti, na  cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; siyaa  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca  vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti.
text.3127: [03] dvenavuti paacittiyaa katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? dvenavuti  paacittiyaa chahi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato samu.t.thanti,  na vaacato na cittato; siyaa vaacato samu.t.thanti, na kaayato na  cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca samu.t.thanti, na cittato; siyaa  kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa ^a^T0.0515^ea^ kaayato ca vaacato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti.
text.3128: [03] cattaaro paa.tidesaniiyaa katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti? cattaaro  paa.tidesaniiyaa catuuhi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato  samu.t.thanti, na vaacato na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca  samu.t.thanti, na cittato; siyaa kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na  vaacato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca samu.t.thanti.
text.3129: [03] pa~ncasattati sekhiyaa katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti?  pa~ncasattati sekhiyaa tiihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thanti -- siyaa kaayato ca  cittato ca samu.t.thanti, na vaacato; siyaa vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti, na kaayato; siyaa kaayato ca vaacato ca cittato ca  samu.t.thanti.

text.3570: [03] 482^b^.^eb^ cattaari ^a^T0.0538^ea^ ^a^P5.0220^ea^ ^a^M0.0380^ea^ ^a^V0.0406^ea^   kammaani. apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m,  ~natticatutthakamma.m -- imaani cattaari kammaani. katihaakaarehi  vipajjanti? imaani cattaari kammaani pa~ncahaakaarehi vipajjanti --  vatthuto vaa ~nattito vaa anussaavanato vaa siimato vaa parisato vaa.
text.3571: [03] 483^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^vatthuto kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  sammukhaakara.niiya.m kamma.m asammukhaa karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m;  pa.tipucchaakara.niiya.m kamma.m apa.tipucchaa karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m;  pa.ti~n~naaya kara.niiya.m kamma.m apa.ti~n~naaya karoti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m; sativinayaarahassa amuu.lhavinaya.m deti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m; amuu.lhavinayaarahassa tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m karoti,  vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; tassapaapiyasikaakammaarahassa tajjaniiyakamma.m  karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; tajjaniiyakammaarahassa niyassakamma.m  karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; niyassakammaarahassa  pabbaajaniiyakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m;  pabbaajaniiyakammaarahassa pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m; pa.tisaara.niiyakammaarahassa ukkhepaniiyakamma.m karoti,  vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; ukkhepaniiyakammaarahassa parivaasa.m deti,  vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m ^a^T0.0539^ea^; parivaasaaraha.m muulaaya pa.tikassati, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m; muulaayapa.tikassanaarahassa maanatta.m deti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m; maanattaaraha.m abbheti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; abbhaanaaraha.m  upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; anuposathe uposatha.m karoti,  vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; apavaara.naaya pavaareti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m. eva.m vatthuto kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3572: [03] 484^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^a^V0.0407^ea^ ^b^~nattito kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  pa~ncahaakaarehi ~nattito kammaani vipajjanti -- vatthu.m na paraamasati,  sa"ngha.m na paraamasati, puggala.m na paraamasati, ~natti.m na paraamasati,  pacchaa vaa ~natti.m .thapeti -- imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi ~nattito kammaani  vipajjanti.
text.3573: [03] 485^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^a^M0.0381^ea^ ^b^anussaavanato  kammaani vipajjanti^eb^? pa~ncahaakaarehi ^a^P5.0221^ea^  anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti -- vatthu.m na paraamasati, sa"ngha.m na  paraamasati, puggala.m na paraamasati, saavana.m haapeti, akaale vaa saaveti  -- imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3574: [03] 486^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^siimato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  ekaadasahi aakaarehi siimato kammaani vipajjanti -- atikhuddaka.m  siima.m sammannati, atimahati.m siima.m sammannati, kha.n.danimitta.m siima.m  sammannati, chaayaanimitta.m siima.m ^a^T0.0540^ea^ sammannati, animitta.m siima.m sammannati,  bahisiime .thito siima.m sammannati, nadiyaa siima.m sammannati, samudde  siima.m sammannati, jaatassare siima.m sammannati, siimaaya siima.m  sambhindati, siimaaya siima.m ajjhottharati -- imehi ekaadasahi  aakaarehi siimato kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3575: [03] 487^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^parisato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  dvaadasahi aakaarehi parisato kammaani vipajjanti -- catuvaggakara.ne  kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m  chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti, catuvaggakara.ne  kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m  chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti, catuvaggakara.ne  kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m  chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti. pa~ncavaggakara.ne  kamme...pe0... dasavaggakara.ne kamme...pe0... viisativaggakara.ne kamme  yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando  anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti, viisativaggakara.ne kamme  yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa, te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando  anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti, viisativaggakara.ne kamme  yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa, te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m ^a^T0.0541^ea^ chando  aaha.to hoti sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- imehi dvaadasahi  aakaarehi parisato kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3576: [03] 488^b^.^eb^ catuvaggakara.ne kamme cattaaro bhikkhuu pakatattaa  kammapattaa, avasesaa pakatattaa chandaarahaa ^a^V0.0408^ea^. yassa sa"ngho kamma.m  karoti so neva kammapatto naapi chandaaraho, api ca kammaaraho.  pa~ncavaggakara.ne ^a^M0.0382^ea^ kamme pa~nca bhikkhuu pakatattaa  kammapattaa, avasesaa pakatattaa chandaarahaa. yassa sa"ngho kamma.m  karoti so neva kammapatto naapi chandaaraho, api ca kammaaraho.  dasavaggakara.ne kamme dasa bhikkhuu pakatattaa kammapattaa, avasesaa  pakatattaa chandaarahaa. yassa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti so neva kammapatto  naapi chandaaraho, api ca kammaaraho. viisativaggakara.ne kamme  viisati bhikkhuu pakatattaa kammapattaa, avasesaa pakatattaa chandaarahaa.  yassa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti so neva kammapatto naapi chandaaraho,  api ca kammaaraho.
text.3577: [03] 489^b^.^eb^ cattaari ^a^P5.0222^ea^ kammaani --  apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m.  imaani cattaari kammaani katihaakaarehi vipajjanti? imaani cattaari  kammaani pa~ncahaakaarehi vipajjanti -- vatthuto vaa ~nattito vaa  anussaavanato vaa siimato vaa parisato vaa.
text.3578: [03] 490^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^vatthuto kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  pa.n.daka.m upasampaadeti ^a^T0.0542^ea^, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. theyyasa.mvaasaka.m  upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. titthiyapakkantaka.m  upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. tiracchaanagata.m upasampaadeti,  vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. maatughaataka.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m. pitughaataka.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m.  arahantaghaataka.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m.  bhikkhuniduusaka.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. sa"nghabhedaka.m  upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. lohituppaadaka.m upasampaadeti,  vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. ubhatobya~njana.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m. uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m  adhammakamma.m. eva.m vatthuto kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3579: [03] 491^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^~nattito kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  pa~ncahaakaarehi ~nattito kammaani vipajjanti. vatthu.m na paraamasati,  sa"ngha.m na paraamasati, puggala.m na paraamasati, ~natti.m na paraamasati,  pacchaa vaa ~natti.m .thapeti -- imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi ~nattito kammaani  vipajjanti.
text.3580: [03] 492^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  pa~ncahaakaarehi anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti -- vatthu.m na  paraamasati, sa"ngha.m na paraamasati, puggala.m ^a^M0.0383^ea^ na  paraamasati, saavana.m ^a^V0.0409^ea^ haapeti, akaale vaa saaveti -- imehi  pa~ncahaakaarehi anussaavanato kammaani ^a^T0.0543^ea^ vipajjanti.
text.3581: [03] 493^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^siimato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  ekaadasahi aakaarehi siimato kammaani vipajjanti. atikhuddaka.m  siima.m sammannati, atimahati.m siima.m sammannati, kha.n.danimitta.m siima.m  sammannati, chaayaanimitta.m siima.m sammannati, animitta.m siima.m sammannati,  bahisiime .thito siima.m sammannati, nadiyaa siima.m sammannati, samudde  siima.m sammannati, jaatassare siima.m sammannati, siimaaya siima.m  sambhindati, siimaaya siima.m ajjhottharati -- imehi ekaadasahi  aakaarehi siimato kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3582: [03] 494^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^parisato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^?  dvaadasahi aakaarehi parisato kammaani vipajjanti -- catuvaggakara.ne  kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m  chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti, catuvaggakara.ne  kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m  chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti. catuvaggakara.ne  kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m  chando aaha.to hoti sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti. pa~ncavaggakara.ne  kamme...pe0... dasavaggakara.ne kamme...pe0... viisativaggakara.ne kamme  yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te ^a^T0.0544^ea^ anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando  anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti. viisativaggakara.ne kamme  yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando  anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti. viisativaggakara.ne kamme  yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammapattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando  aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- imehi dvaadasahi  aakaarehi parisato kammaani vipajjanti.
text.3583: [03] 495^b^.^eb^ apalokanakamma.m kati .thaanaani gacchati?  ~nattikamma.m kati .thaanaani gacchati? ~nattidutiyakamma.m kati .thaanaani  gacchati? ~natticatutthakamma.m kati .thaanaani gacchati? apalokanakamma.m  pa~nca .thaanaani gacchati. ~nattikamma.m nava .thaanaani gacchati.  ~nattidutiyakamma.m satta .thaanaani gacchati. ~natticatutthakamma.m satta  .thaanaani gacchati.
text.3584: [03] 496^b^.^eb^ apalokanakamma.m ^a^M0.0384^ea^ katamaani  pa~nca .thaanaani gacchati? osaara.na.m, nissaara.na.m, bha.n.dukamma.m,  brahmada.n.da.m, kammalakkha.na~n~neva pa~ncama.m -- apalokanakamma.m imaani pa~nca  .thaanaani gacchati ^a^V0.0410^ea^. ~nattikamma.m katamaani nava .thaanaani gacchati?  osaara.na.m, nissaara.na.m, uposatha.m, pavaara.na.m, sammuti.m, daana.m, pa.tiggaha.m,  paccukka.d.dhana.m, kammalakkha.na~n~neva navama.m -- ~nattikamma.m imaani nava  .thaanaani gacchati. ~nattidutiyakamma.m katamaani satta .thaanaani gacchati?  osaara.na.m, nissaara.na.m, sammuti.m, daana.m, uddhara.na.m, desana.m,  kammalakkha.na~n~neva sattama.m -- ~nattidutiyakamma.m imaani satta .thaanaani  gacchati. ~natticatutthakamma.m ^a^T0.0545^ea^ katamaani satta .thaanaani gacchati?  osaara.na.m, nissaara.na.m, sammuti.m, daana.m, niggaha.m, samanubhaasana.m,  kammalakkha.na~n~neva sattama.m -- ~natticatutthakamma.m imaani satta .thaanaani  gacchati.
text.3585: [03] 497^b^.^eb^ catuvaggakara.ne kamme cattaaro bhikkhuu pakatattaa  kammapattaa, avasesaa pakatattaa chandaarahaa. yassa sa"ngho kamma.m  karoti so neva kammapatto naapi chandaaraho, api ca kammaaraho.  pa~ncavaggakara.ne ^a^P5.0223^ea^ kamme pa~nca bhikkhuu pakatattaa  kammapattaa, avasesaa pakatattaa chandaarahaa. yassa sa"ngho kamma.m  karoti so neva kammapatto naapi chandaaraho, api ca kammaaraho.  dasavaggakara.ne kamme dasa bhikkhuu pakatattaa kammapattaa, avasesaa  pakatattaa chandaarahaa. yassa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti so neva kammapatto  naapi chandaaraho, api ca kammaaraho. viisativaggakara.ne kamme  viisati bhikkhuu pakatattaa kammapattaa, avasesaa pakatattaa chandaarahaa.  yassa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti so neva kammapatto naapi chandaaraho,  api ca kammaaraho.

text.3597: [03] 501^b^.^eb^ navasa"ngahaa ^a^V0.0413^ea^ -- vatthusa"ngaho, vipattisa"ngaho  aapattisa"ngaho, nidaanasa"ngaho, puggalasa"ngaho, khandhasa"ngaho,  samu.t.thaanasa"ngaho, adhikara.nasa"ngaho, samathasa"ngahoti.
text.3598: [03] adhikara.ne samuppanne sace ubho atthapaccatthikaa aagacchanti  ubhinnampi vatthu aarocaapetabba.m. ubhinnampi vatthu aarocaapetvaa  ubhinnampi pa.ti~n~naa sotabbaa. ubhinnampi pa.ti~n~na.m sutvaa ubhopi  vattabbaa -- ``amhaaka.m imasmi.m adhikara.ne vuupasamite ^a^T0.0550^ea^ {vuupasamepi (ka0)} ubhopi tu.t.thaa  bhavissathaa''ti. sace aaha.msu -- ``ubhopi tu.t.thaa bhavissaamaa''ti,  sa"nghena ta.m adhikara.na.m sampa.ticchitabba.m. sace alajjussannaa hoti,  parisaa ubbaahikaaya vuupasametabba.m. sace baalussannaa hoti, parisaa  vinayadharo pariyesitabbo yena dhammena yena vinayena yena  satthusaasanena ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati. tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m  vuupasametabba.m.
text.3599: [03] vatthu jaanitabba.m, gotta.m jaanitabba.m, naama.m jaanitabba.m, aapatti  jaanitabbaa.

text.3610: [03] mahallaka.m vihaara.m kaaraapananti vatthu ceva gotta~nca --  sa"nghaadisesoti naama~nceva aapatti ca.

text.3617: [03] anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa  kara.nanti vatthu ceva gotta~nca -- dukka.tanti naama~nceva aapatti caati.
